column3: Jises ruwani kohan ta aseben taha, ya na kandriyen iy amekes, taha ndratana taha, kandriyen ta tikisiy ma aso-ok ndramak ari ja. Eme ma taha ale kalokou taha ta adeu koha taha ta aseben ndramak ari ja.

Len ndrabun iri aloh Pasoba ma hawe nyamon tinan ndrame mirihik. Jises ndratanan, udu bolo len doh eme kameh iy ruwani kon munyak ta iy iu ili loken hawe taman. Iy aso-ok iri lau tan marakon ado bolo kon munyak tinan labai, ili winiya le iy imek.
Kindrei ibolosen hawe lau heh mene udu bolo jaha ma hanoh (40)? Iy ibolosen ili tiri lau mwan ma badih marakon nane amekes kandriyen ndra-in are kon lomale an, ma iri amak.

Aha kasahan ndramak ta anuhun sahou, tasah aha ndrasahan buku nadu Kindrei. Bwena mene aha budon mwasin bwe, ma aha an hamon ta budon ndra-in. Arile, na dah, aha sa-en hamon ta budon hawe kandriyen ndra-in taha bwena mene ja ai.
Ma eme ta sendrehendreh ta sahou, jo asehek i buku doh: Kindrei mene alelei lau mari tebelese badeh, ta katin doh: Ta iy kaleheya tikisiy tan keme lewen la-u lau mari.

Ma jo anuhun lakou buku boho ari ndramak udu ndrokowa oro lakou ma mulin ma hahuw nane. Iy tiye i buku doh, “Ou ala leheya iri gok tam, ma iri lau kameh niri nyamon bwe. Eme ma ndramas nane iri lau akohok ta len ari, idoh kameh winiyan ta sihinei nadu kun wit ari o nadu kun bali ma taloh le kabwe. Arile, aha salobwai kei olip ma waen mara-ei sa-au, eme ma ndrelekei ta olip hawe waen kameh udu luluwen kahis.”
Ta mada Kindrei badeh, aha katehei aha ka-au kala andri mara-ei. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, iy kameh mani ndra-in taha, ma suruni aha au ala loken mara-ei labai.

Tasah, iy ndrasani len ta iy kameh aleben lau badu kon munyak mari, na ndramak ari mwasin labai iy ndratehei lahou dah ndra minen. Iy badeh ndraleheyani lakou doh ndrasahan handru ndrame len mada lau mari i san ta iy suni iy amak ta imek tan eme loken.”
Iri lau ta bahun tabuwi bada malou bobodon i se buku none barak ma atehei ili batun. Ano iri atehei kolau ra-ei saraman lawe-en ili la-un.
Eme, jo abudon ta badih nyau bihin badeh, katasou ja kamekes nah ma katondrok oro. Kora-on iri lau ale budon tiri ndra-in udu ta to, sasehek to.
Aha katehei budon taha keme tek ta sahou jo asehek anya, jo udu hawe tama, ma tama udu hawek ale. Buku sah, aha katehei budon taha kili le ta sahou jo asehek, tasah aha ndranyolom iri gok jo amekes.
Ano, iy ndramak nane manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin badeh, eme akahei imek hawe kon ta ndrahune lau amak are aliy badeh, ala bolo lek ta jih. Lek ta jih doh badeh, ta imek hamon ja ai.

Buku iy amekes san solo-an, idah kameh iy kabwese maha-an san solo-an labai, udu ndra bada len Kindrei amekes kon munyak asahan eme ano dah. Arile, na dah taha ndratanan, Krais ndrame kon munyak san rasan le ta edeu iy le amwenen ili ta Kindrei i nyara salom ta talou iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha iu.
Ma na bolo jaha hanoh (40) badeh, iy bwese maha-an ta kandriyen tiri ado kon lomale an.
Aha kawas tek handru, i buku aha atukum ta aimon nyamon, aha sabotatahan ta aimon nyamon mwena, aha katondrok lau marakon kasahan op, ano aha baraimon nyamon.

Idoh ano le badeh, jo anyolom Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei asoh tobwe ari ja nane tobo-ei buk iu. Idoh ili asahan i buku onoh ai. Iy amekes i buku doh, ma jo atou ma atona ndroi tinan labai asahan kon munyak. Ma mada an ilik, ma asahan i bokodon mara-ei, i buku kolau bokodon, ma mada bun ale asaram, ma asahan i saraman i buku ndra.

Oro badih rayah badeh, atehei budon toro handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma lowa oro badih nane ndramak, amak ame awas ja. Oro lau rayah mene ala bolo asiu lulik, ma iri lau ta amekes bahun badeh, bwidi bada oro mara-ei andra-i labai, amekes ili ili winiya le oro amak. Tasah, iri lau ta amekes bahun ndratiye toro, buku oro katubuni kona oro kili ta Kindrei, iri kameh winiyan tolowei oro au laleyah. Arile, oro bwale oro ta adeu kona oro i ta Kindrei, eme ma oro aso-ok ta are ndra bolo asiu lulik, winiya le oro amak. Oro abudon anya, oro kameh amak are bolo lek toro ame awas ja, ma oro kameh akohok koha oro mwasin labai ja.

Arile, Pol eme tiye i tiri lau ta mwena tiri lulik anya, “Aru badeh, lau badu baha tondrok ma kandriyen ta Rom. Ya, i buku sah oro lau ta anuhun sahou doh bwale oro ma banuhun sahou taru bwe. Aru bamekes se ari lakou bandra-i bwe, arile iri ame adai aru udu mada lau mari. Ano oro akahei aru laleyah ame bolo kou dah. Ya, na dah oro anya katone aru ka-au ai? Winiyan bwe, handru en! Oro le kame katiye aru ka-au.”

Tasah, taha tanan, batanau malen mene ndratorowenei tiye i buku doh, “Ou sateu badih udu mwan, ya ou sadai ndramak samak, ya ou sabahana, ya madam salikis lakou ta ndramak ari ja.” Ma saba batanau malen ja badu hawe oro doh badeh, sukik le bada batanau ari le doh: “Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le.”
Eme ma iri lau mwan ma badih ale atondrok Krais ta eme hamon ja, iri badeh, winiyan bala bolo ndraka-an ja bwe, tasah iri atondrok bada iri ma budon tiri udu mwasin, buku le kandriyen ta Krais.
Ya udu bolo budon tek jo abudon anya batanau malen ta Kindrei badeh, mwasin, ya eme taha kasekesek ma ka-en hamon le ta aliy;
Eme jo katandra-un tado ja, ado kasekesek Laban kudu le buku doh. Tasah, ado ndra ari buruwen hawe Laban.
Eme, jo tubuni jo ta anya kanyolom ndramak nane asehek sahou eme tek doh. Jo tubuni madak, ma jo anyolom ndru-u sun ma ndro taloh ales, ndru-u sun doh iri amekes na bek nyikilikin.
Kindrei mene tandrakan ta lau rayah winiyan bala bolo kon ta amunyau tan bwe. Ya, iy tandrakan lau heh handru? Iri le lau mwan ma badih marakon mene banuhun sahou tan bwe.
Iri lau rayah ndrame bwena badeh, iri lau ta bahana ma iri ta akohok lakou laleyah, eme ma bwidi iri sipsip banuhun boho iri bwe.

Aha bonyo-ou ma lau ta gok, aha ka-en bahandra iri lau an bwena ta atondrok aha, ma aha kanuhun sahou ma kanoh iri. Aha kamekes ki buku doh ki tiri, buku none iri amekes mwasin ewek taha, o, iri amekes ndra-in, ma a-um aha ale.
Eme iri amekes budon laleyah ma iri wasai anya, “Iy lau doh badeh, asehek sahou ndra-in i bada kandriyen malen hawe kon ndrabun.

Kindrei le amwenen, kati iri lakou marakon doh. Bwena mene ahi ta amekes bahun i tan, arile na gok Krais amekes, Kindrei aseben ahi asahan mwasin hawen. Ma iy edeu gok dah eme tahi ta aseben iri mwan ma badih rayah ame asahan mwasin.

Aha nadu tine, aha kabudon oro propet bwena mene, oro mene atiye sahou ta nyara Laban. Kandriyen tiri badeh, mwasin labai ta aseben taha. Iri lau ta kaliu badeh, banuhun sahou toro bwe, ma iri amekes kandriyen ndra-in i toro propet doh. Arile, oro atehei ndrine oro udu mwasin ta bwese iri maha-an. Aha badeh, kandrei kandriyen toro doh, ma ka-en hamon ta aliy.
Ya lau amekes salom na nyara Laban ma ndremenya iy ta seben kameh, iy winiyan sebenei iri.’

Ma iri mara-ei tiye i buku doh: “Handru labai! Taha mara-ei sekesek labai ta Kindrei tataha, nyaran laba tinan labai! Budon marakon mwasin udu tan le ari, ma taha kadeu wurah kili tan, ma katudun nyaran kili loken mara-ei. Iy nyamun labai! Iri boto-on mara-ei udu tan! Iri lakou marakon nane doh badeh, tan le ari ta udu le buku doh! Handru labai!”
Aha sanyosowaniy le bada aha badu manan, kandriyen buku aha tapwiu batu aha, hawe aha adeu iri nyasou ere bada aha, buku none lakou lomadan labai, ma hawe iri kolau sowa iri tinan labai.

Eme ma, bwilim sama ta atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban tataha. Jo kada-ah udu bolo asiu lulik, tasah jo atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban. Eme ma, bwilim sama jo. Ou andrei boto-on ta Kindrei, ma ou alokou ou ta bwese maha randrah le, buku jo bwese maha-an ta bolo gok tek ta atiye sahou mwasin.
Jo anya kaseben oro, eme ma jo atehei jo mara-ei ewek tam, ta oro katehei oro mara-ei kewek tam, ma ta oro kameh asahan oro lau tam handru.

Aha kasuri aha ja, ma aha kabudon kamwenen op! Saba kandriyen tek ale aha a-en hamon ta aliy badeh, jo aso-ok aha katawiy kihis, kandriyen doh anya kimek ai! Tasah, iri lakou mara-ei aha amekes kede-eh badeh, rayah bamwenen ta mada Kindrei tek ja bwai.
Uru angelo la-uh ndrano ai, iy ari eme len ja solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e gwa lakon ma kaloh mara-ei. Bwekei doh asahan ili taloh ai. Eme ma gwa mara-ei asahan ndra.

Jises badeh, ndrasihi san ta taha lau mwan ma badih atehei budon in ta Kindrei, eme ma taha kameh winiyan ala bolo tikisiy tan, na idah taha areu aliy. Ma taha atondrok Kindrei ta akohok taha, idah kameh taha manyah ado lomadan tan mwasin ado kandrah. Ma idoh bwidi taha sekesek ta aliy.

Jo asehek amwenen ewek taha. Iri mwan o badih, a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta karei, o, a-en hamon ta kandriyen bolo-an, o, a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta madalakis (idoh i buku le kandriyen ta atudun iri kindrei ta wasai); iri mwan ma badih doh kameh, winiyan bame bolon hawe iri lau ta Krais, ma Kindrei kameh winiyan batondrok iri, bwe.

Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma bwidi iy anuhun boho Kindrei aloh iy ta ili kon ari nane doh, Kindrei ndratandrakan ta edeu ili tan. Iy ruwani kon tan amwenen, iy bala tanan saba kon handru kameh iy ili aliy bwe.
Aha sa-un waen solo-an ta amekes aha abo lolo-ou. Arile aha badeh, kadih mara-ei na le Malawin Ndrabun.
Iri lau solo-an labai kameh a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in tiri, ma bwidi iri lau rayah ja amekes sahou wasai ili bolo sahou handru.
Sahou doh handru. Tasah, na Krais le ari, taha lau marakon akohok Malawin ari le nane doh, ndrasihi san, ta taha winiyan asahan hawe tama taha Kindrei.

Ahi ndratorowenei la-ukei ramen, ma ndratiyaniy ndrala tiri lau ta Kindrei badu leheleh, ma ahi tiye tiri i buku doh, ‘Aha saimon nyamon ala ndrala ta salom tiri kindrei nane iri asehek na sukumada kei. Ma aha saimon oda iri katin haka ndra udu ta aliy, ma hawe sa-un ndraye iri. Ma aha samekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei.’ ”
Ano Pita tiye i ta Ananayas anya, “I buku sah handru tama balik Satan ewek ndrinem ma mesekei ou wasai Malawin Ndrabun. Ya eme ou tone luk ranah mene ta munyak ou atehei i ta sisih.

Buku taha asahan i buku doh, badeh, taha winiyan bado buku nadu nah bwisik ja, ta budon taha ateu bwe. Ma iri sahou wasai marakon tiri lau ta tamar winiyan batoroyani budon tataha bwe, ma taha winiyan asahan buku ndron udu bolo bayau. Ma idoh ale winiyan baruwi taha buku jor aluhi ndron bwe, ma taha winiyan bateheh laleyah bwe, ma mani budon handru.

Aha tanan bwe nadeh? Iri lau ale ta amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in doh, iri kameh winiya bala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei bwe. Aha sawendreya ndrine aha amwenen. Iri lau marakon ale amekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei, iri lau ale asolom ili ta sukumada kei, iri lau ale amekes karei hawe iri badih tasou, iri lau ale ta amekes iri kandriyen ta bwilima udu aliy hawe iri lau rayah ja,

Taha samani kandriyen tataha ta atukum taha marakon a le se, ta atudun Kindrei. Taha sala buku iri lau rayah ndramekes, arile taha kabadok ta amekes ndrine iri lau ta Kindrei kudu mwasin. Tasah, taha ndratanan ta len ta Laban anya keme hamon ja badeh, ndrame mirihik.

Aha badeh, ndramak hawe Krais. Eme ma, aha winiyan ba-en hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe. Aha badeh, kadai iri kandriyen mari badu kon munyak udu ndrine aha ki-iu. Jo asehek ta kandriyen buku: Kandriyen ta karei, ma kandriyen ta amadin hawe badih o mwan tasou, ma kandriyen ta kereyani ndrine ndramak ta amekes karei, ma kandriyen ta ndrakok. Idoh i buku aha atehei bwili ndru-u aha i andri ili ta kindrei, iri amekes na sukumada kei. Tasah, lakou badu kon munyak badeh, akohok kon ta Kindrei udu bolo koha aha ja.

Arile, taha lau ta Kindrei, taha buku iri lau ta len, eme ma mwasin ta taha kabudon kamwenen buku ndramak ba-un gwa lolo-ou bwe. Eme ma, taha katehei budon tataha kamwenen kili ta Kindrei, ma taha kaso-ok nadu tine taha ari, ari. Kandriyen doh i buku ndramak ta bahun, iy asini awin hayen udu batalan ta amekes bahun. Ma taha ale kales, ma katadau taha boto-on ta atondrok Kindrei akohok taha ame hamon ja. Buku taha amekes kandriyen doh, taha a buku ndramak ta bahun atehei barak, iri amekes na hayen udu batun ta amekes bahun.

Ou tutuni ndramas badeh, ma ou amekes gok Kindrei ndratiye ndrawek tam. Tasah, Malawin Ndrabun, Kindrei atehei eme tataha doh, iy winiyan babwidi taha banoh bwe. Iy badeh, ndranyuhi taha marakon na boto-on tan ta amekes gok tan, ma taha winiyan tikisi iri lau mari, ma taha winiyan atondrok ndrine taha amwenen.

Buku ari ndramak asehek anya, “Jo ta Kindrei handru ma jo tanan iy,” arile, iy ba-en hamon tiri sahou, nane Kindrei edeu eme tataha ta a-en hamon ta aliy bwai, sebwe iy ndramak doh ta wendreya. Ma sahou ta Kindrei handru badeh, bado ndrinen bwe.
Jises asehek sahou le badeh, eme iri lau rayah ame anya kateu iy. Arile ari ndramak batehei minen bala badan bwe, tasah idoh bamwenen ta len tan bwe le.
Ou batanau oro ta oro badeh, kadih na kandriyen mwasin hawe kandriyen ta anyohan lakou i tiri lau ari ari.
Eme iri marakon asumon sahou tan, “I buku iy ndramak ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in bwe, ahi winiyan bandrei iy bame hawem bwe.”

Are lau oro abudon ma aleben anya, “Len rayah badeh, ndrabun ta len rayah” badeh, oro amekes ta atudun Laban; ya are oro ta kaniya nyamon mari badeh, oro amekes ta atudun Laban ale, tasah iy edeu wurah i ta Kindrei ta nyamon nane doh. Ma hawe are lau oro beleben ta baimon nyamon rayah bwe badeh, amekes ta atudun Laban hawe adeu wurah i ta Kindrei i le buku oro ale.

Na len ou anyolom bohon i bwena ta lakou Jises kameh edeu tam badeh, ou sekesek. Buku none maha ma isi katok tam, ou sanunu-uh ma ou ado le. Ma, na len mari, ou amekes salom ma ou ado le ta salom; ou sabudon anya Kindrei kameh winiyan bamesekei bwe, ndri-iy.

Eme ma kabin tinan doh tiye ta tinan ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun nane androkei ta Pol i buku doh, “Ou hawe oro lau tam katehei ndrokei ta Pol kamwenen, arile ado sabawei iy mara-ei. Ado karuwani iy kedek, ma oro lau badu hawen kame kanyolom iy ma katiye nan nyamon.”

Ta aso-ok ta ndramak ari, ari, iy udu le bwese iri maha-an. Buku maha-an asahan tan badeh, iy winiyan baruwani budon tan handru bwe, iy atondrok le Kindrei ta aseben iy. Handru, iy udu le ma iy ales boto-on na len mari.

Udu bolo buk Wari ta bolo buk ndrabun, ndramak ari torowenei i buku doh, “Jo atehei budon tek handru, Kindrei kameh in hamon le ta sahou tan. Eme ma, jo asehek iy ili tiri mwan ma badih.” Ahi aposel ale, budon tahi i buku le ta ndramak doh. Eme ma, ahi badeh, atiye sahou mwasin ta Laban.

Aha nadu tine aso, na dah, aso anya kabatanau aha boto-on buku doh: Aha badeh, kabatanau iri lau ta gwaman, samanyah laleyah. Ma aha ale kamekes gok ta atadau ndrine iri lau ta anoh kabadok, ma kaseben iri lau nyamu iri bwe, katehei budon tiri kili ta Kindrei. Aha badeh, kamekes kamunum kili tiri lau marakon.

Ya, iy angelo ari ja eme ili solowei bwekei tan amwenen ili bwele-e koyeu ta nyabwe munyak. Ya bwekei doh ili asahan limeh ai. Eme ma lulik asahan tubuluhi tondrok ta nyabwe munyak. Eme ma bwidi iri lau atohei kalime iri, ta sisi-in tiri nane doh.
Ya, are lau oro an hamon ta kandriyen doh, mondrei ma tikisiy kudu hawe oro mara-ei. Oro le badeh, Isra-el handru ta Kindrei.
Iy badeh, tanan labai ta san ta Laban ma abe-ei iy asehek sahou ta nyala Jises ndra mwasin le. Arile, iy badeh, tanan le lahou ta Jon ta alomwa.
Eme ma, buku ou anya aimon nyamon, o, a-un gwa, o, amekes saba lakou ja, ou amekes iri lakou marakon doh ta atudun nyara Kindrei le ari.

Arile, aha badeh, barah ta tanan bwe. Aha ndrakohok Malawin Ndrabun ta Krais, eme ma iy doh leheya aha ta lakou mari ta Kindrei. Ya sahou tan doh handru, iy bawasai bwe. Eme ma aha katawi Krais kihis, buku none le Malawin Ndrabun ndraleheya aha.

Taha ndratanan, buku malawi taha ruwani bada taha mwan o badih, badeh basa taha le kameh erah udu api. Buku le, are mwan o badih atehei budon laleyah, ya budon tan doh bamekes ari kandriyen mwasin bwe, budon ta iy mwan o badih doh badeh, ndrasahan i buku bada kei, kohan aliy bwe.
Pol asehek sahou i tiri ano, iy andrei jabi ramen rayah udu minen, iy edeu salom i ta Kindrei udu mada iri, ano iy boso-ei ma iy aimon.

Arile, to atorou ki toro ma katandra-un toro saimon nyamon iri ndratehei ndra mine kindrei ta wendreya, iri amekes na sukumada kei; oro samekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei; oro saimon oda iri lakou buku me ma bulumakau ndra udu ta aliy, ma sa-un ndraye iri ale.

Pol tiye ili ta Ananayas i buku doh, “Kindrei kameh a-um ou. Buku ou badeh, atehei awin tiri tinan, arile bahandran ta aliy badeh, ou ndramak ndra-in, ma budon tam ndrandra-i. Ou anya ou ndramak ari handru ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma aseben ta amekes sahou tek, ya i buku sah, nadah ja ou ndrasakalawi kandriyen malen, ma ou tiye iri lau are kada-ah ta a-um jo laleyah?”
Ya eme sendrehendreh ta lakou mari i buku doh: Are lau asahan ari buruwen hawe Krais Jises badeh, batanau malen ta Kindrei winiyan batiyani iy bala ta mada sahou ma badeu maha-an bala tan ja bwe.

Handru, aha sanoh, Kindrei batehei taha ta akohok isi na len ta losen tan doh asahan eme lewan, bwe. Iy atehei taha badeh, ta akohok seben ta Jises Krais, iy Laban tataha, ma na iy le, iy andrei taha ame hamon.

Iy kameh eme len ta wendreya iri lau marakon atalan laleyah ado bolo kon munyak mara-ei. Iri lau badu kon Gok ma Magok. Satan kameh tukumwi iri marakon doh ala le se ta amekes bahun. Kane iri mara-ei ili le se badeh, i buku on mamarin badu bada babi, winiyan bandromwei bwe.

Aha rayah bwena mene i buku iri lau doh. Arile, na dah ja, nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais ma hawe boto-on ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei tataha, anyuwi aha, lebelei aha, ma bwidi aha asahan iri lau tan mwasin ta madan.

Eme ma, jo bwese maha-an doh, ma jo eme udu bolo asiu lulik kada-ah. Arile, bwilik bama ta udu bolo asiu lulik ma bwese maha-an kada-ah, bwe. Tasah, jo ndratanan Krais Jises, ma jo atehei budon tek handru in tan. Ma jo tanan, iy winiyan tondrokei gok ta atiye sahou tan dah udu mwasin, iy ndratehei ndrame minek, ma gok doh kameh udu mwasin mara-ei ili winiyan le len iy eme hamon ja.

Iri lakou doh, aha kamekes hawe salom, ma kandremenya Kindrei ta aseben aha. Aha badeh, kasolom ta iri lakou marakon aha amekes, na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun. Ma aha ale katehei ndrokei kamwenen labai, ma aha winiyan bajos bwe. Len marakon aha kasolom ta aseben iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei.

Jo Pol, jo atorou la-ukei dah. Sailas uru Timoti badeh, are hawek ale. Eme ma, aso ma taloh atehei la-ukei ramen dah ewek taha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei are bolo kon tinan Tesalonaika. Aha lau mwan ma badih ta tama taha Kindrei, aso aso-ok Kindrei hawe Laban Jises Krais, uru katikisi aha, ma ndrine aha kudu mwasin.
Ya bale ado samaniy, Laban mirihik eme ai. Eme kandriyen mwasin tado ta ado le, badeh, ado kamekes ki ta lau mari.
Len marakon aha aimon jabi ramen, ma aha a-un na bwesam doh, aha badeh, leheya iri lau ta imek ta Laban. Aha kamekes kili, winiya le len tan, ta iy eme hamon ja.

Buku aha asolom, ma atehei budon taha in ta Kindrei handru, badeh kameh, winiyan bwidi ndramak amwenen ja. Ya, buku none iy ndrataku ta kandriyen ndra-in, Laban winiyan mani kandriyen ndra-in tan doh.

Bwena mene, tubu oro badeh, a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Kindrei ma atudun nyaran. Eme ma, jo ale ki-in hamon tan ta ndrinek, jo atona kandriyen jo in hamon ta aliy doh ta amekes gok tan, idoh amwenen handru. Na len dah badeh, jo abudon ou, ma jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei, tasah ou badeh, atehei budon tam handru in tan, ma ou a-en hamon ta kandriyen tan.
Iri aloh ili tiri mandrei ma bek mara-ei i buku doh, “Aha katohou kame andri bwele-e ahi, ma katubuluhi ahi kamai ta mada Kindrei, iy manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin, ma ta losen ta Nadu Sipsip!

‘Buku ndranye aha udu aliy, jo aso-ok aha kanuhun saba lakou handru Malawin Mwasin asehek ili tiri lau ta Kindrei. Buku are mwan o badih ale ales boto-on udu bolo bahun nane balik amekes i tiri, ma iri baruwani budon tiri handru bwe, jo kameh edeu niri mana, amai labai udu kon tek. Ma jo ale kameh edeu bek belen mara-ei i tiri ari, ari. Ma udu bwele-e bek doh, jo kameh torowenei nyaran ha-un udu aliy. Ma ari ndramak ja winiyan bala tanan ta kati nyaran doh bwe. Are lau, iy nane akohok bek doh, iy le kameh winiyan i tanan moson ta aliy ai.’ ”

Ma iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai badeh, ta ndrakok, ya iri kameh wendreya ado ta kadeu luk i tiri ta oro leheya ado. Iri kameh asehek kundruh ta wasai na budon tiri le. Eme ndra bwena bwena ndra-au, Kindrei ndrasani len ta kadeu iri ka ta sahou, ma idah kameh, maha-an tiri ta lakou iri mesekei atondrok iri.
Eme ma, Kindrei kameh atehei boto-on ta wendreya ili tiri, ma iri kameh atehei budon tiri in ta sahou wasai.
I buku none ndratorowenei anya, “Na ou le badeh, iri lau badu leheleh bobose nyara Kindrei.”

Iri lau ta leheya wasai badeh, a buku le Janes hawe Jambres bwena mene. Uru badeh, ta tebelese sahou handru Moses mene asehek. Ya, iri lau ta leheya wasai doh a buku le aliy. Iri abudon, arile, ta lakou rayah ndra-in le, ma Kindrei atehei konan ili tiri, tasah iri batehei budon tiri ba-en ta sahou handru bwe.
Jo ibolosen i tiri lau, ma asehek nyala kandriyen iri amekes, tasah jo badeh, aso-ok iri labai. Eme ma, aha katubuni ndrine aha, ma katehei budon taha kirih ta a-en hamon ta Kindrei.

Taha ndratehei budon tataha ndra tan ma Kindrei ndraloh taha lau mwasin mara-ei ta madan. Eme ma Laban tataha Jises Krais bwidi ndrokowa Kindrei ma ndrokowa taha badeh, udu mwasin, ma iy bwidi ndrine taha kamunum kudu le hawe Kindrei.
Balem ki tam kamwenen ma balem ki ta sahou ou leheya. Ou saruwaniy labai; tasah lakou ou amekes badeh, winiyan sebenei koha iri are anuhun sahou, ma winiyan sebenei ou ale.

Ma len solo-an badeh, jo iu ili bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis, ma jo abwiyeh iri lau ta Jises doh. Ma jo atehei sahou ili ta lau rayah ta a-um iri, ma nohowa iri ta iri kabobose Kindrei. Eme ma ndrinek ibolosen labai, ma jo in hamon tiri ili, ili bolo iri kon udu len labai ta Jerusalem.
Kandriyen ta bada taha badeh, i buku doh: Kandriyen ta karei i buku mwi, kandriyen ndra-in ta sumukok;
Eme ma, are lau ta atah ma ta asolou gwa, idoh ari nyara uru bwe. Kindrei amwenen bwidi salin asahan, eme ma iy le ari nyaran udu aliy.
Ta idoh le, aha barah ta ari nyosowan ta Malawin Ndrabun bwe. Aha ado le ta atondrok len ta Laban tataha Jises Krais eme hamon ja, ma ta iy edeu iri lau badu kon munyak ala ta sahou.
Ma jo anuhun nyaro sahou ari doh mwasin labai udu kandrah eme i buku nyaro goi laba tinan, ma buku kuruh atohou. Jo anuhun nyaro lakou doh, i buku iri lau adi ndran solo-an doh, iri aloh hap.
Iri propet badeh, tiye nyalan ale, buku none are lau atehei budon handru in tan badeh, karei ma lomondra ndra-in tan kameh, iy maniy i san ta nyaran.”

Iri lau rayah amekes gok boto-on ta a-en hamon le ta kandriyen mwasin, tasah iri anya kado bolo lomadan hawe masiye ta Kindrei, ma iri ale anya kakohok kohan handru winiyan bamak bwe. I tiri le kameh Kindrei winiyan edeu kohan handru ta udu le buku doh.

Jo Jon, jo atorou sahou dah ewek taha mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu kon ma ndro taloh udu bada kon tinan Esiya. Jo anya kedeu bada-an mwasin kewek taha ta nyara Kindrei. Na len dah iy udu hawe taha kada-ah, bwena, bwena iy udu aliy ale, ma hamon kameh iy eme hawe taha. Ma jo anya kedeu bada-an mwasin kewek taha ale ta nyara malawin mwasin ma ndro taloh, na len mara-ei oro manyah ado mirihik ta koyeu ta Kindrei. Ma jo anya kedeu bada-an kewek taha ale in ta nyara Jises Krais, iy ta atiye iri sahou marakon ta Kindrei. Iy le ari badeh, amak udu bolo lek tan eme awas ja ma mwena handru ta lau mara-ei. Ma iy asahan tinan ja tiri kabin marakon ado kon munyak. Tikisiy ma manyah mwasin ta Kindrei uru nadun Jises hawe Malawin Ndrabun badeh, kudu hawe aha. Jises Krais badeh, aso-ok taha mwan ma badih tinan labai, ma ta ndrayen amou udu bada kei tondreh eme andri, ma ndrasikinei kandriyen ndra-in tataha mara-ei ndra-au.

Eme Pol anya, “Alomwa ta Jon amekes badeh, ta i buku none ou tubuni ndrinem ta kandriyen ndra-in tam. Eme iy tiye i tiri lau badeh, katehei budon tiri handru ki-in ta ndramak ari in kona Jon eme. Iy badeh, Jises.”

Ya, i buku idoh handru eh, badeh, Kindrei tanan labai ta aseben iri lau ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ado ta bolo iri maha-an. Ma iy ale tanan labai ta tawi iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in ado abe-en len ta sahou, ma iy kameh edeu maha-an i la-u iri. Maha-an hawe isi i tiri badeh, kameh udu la-u iri udu le gwek ai, ta abe-en le len ta mada sahou ta Kindrei barasahan.
Arile, koha iri ndrapwe ta ala kon mwasin labai ja udu kandrah. Ta idoh le, Kindrei bwilin bama ta iri aloh iy Kindrei tiri bwe. Tasah, iy ndranyuri kon tinan labai ta iri ala ado aliy.
Ou sa-en hamon ta kundruh tiri lau ta wasai ma hawe ou sa-en hamon ta sahou laleyah. Arile, ou abadok ou ta bolo manyah mwasin ta Kindrei.
Iri kameh, adek ala bolo kon munyak mara-ei, ma iri atehei kenyer ta ndrahune iri lau ta Kindrei hawe kon tinan iy aso-ok labai. Arile, jih udu kandrah anya eme andri badeh, sulumwi iri amak ano au.
Ya, eme iy tiye ta kalomwa oro na boto-on ta nyara Jises Krais. Ano oro tiye Pita udu hawe oro len sabe op.
Ou anya ou ndratanan handru ta ou winiyan sariye iri lau mada iri bwe, ma ou winiyan asahan buku sun tiri lau ado bolo lulik,
Ma, iy ndratandrakan ta edeu kohan handru eme tataha, kameh ta udu le buku doh.

Arile, iri tanan ma lakou mara-ei mwasin taha akohok badeh, udu kandrah eme leheya taha kamekes kandriyen mwasin ki buku doh: Taha kasahan ha-un, ma taha kamekes mwasin ki ta nadu tine taha iri rayah ja, taha kanuhun sahou tiri mwan ma badih rayah ja, taha katikisiy lau rayah ja, taha kamekes mwasin ki tiri, ma taha badeh, sawasai.
Taman badeh, aso-ok nadun tinan labai, ma iy eme atehei lakou marakon ili minen.

Eme ya Laban badeh, bamunum ta budon tan nane iy tandrakan ta amekes bwe. Bala buku none bale taha lau ala lomondra ta aliy anya amunum kede-eh bwe. Arile, iy badeh, udu le atondrok taha, tasah iy badeh, aseken taha mari katubuni ndrine taha ta kandriyen ndra-in, ya taha sala bolo jih.

Handru, jo sekesek ta aha bala tasou bwe, aha i buku le jo. Arile, Kindrei edeu ndramas ma tanan eme tataha bala le randra bwe. Iri rayah akohok ndramas ma tanan ta bala tasou bwe, ya iri rayah ja akohok ndramas ma tanan ta anya katasou.

Ya, aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta adeu ndrine aha ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari. Kandriyen le doh udu bwele-en mara-ei. Ma aha ale kaso-ok labai ta akohok iri ndramas, Malawin Ndrabun edeu eme tataha. Handru, ndramas ari le mwasin labai, aha ale asa-ar ma atehei budon taha ta akohok badeh, gok propet. Idoh le badeh, iy katin ta atiye sahou mara-ei ta Kindrei.

Ehe, ahi atiye sahou ta Jises. Tasah, bwena mene Kindrei bwidi munyak dah anya, “Sun kanya bolo lulik.” Kindrei amwenen doh irek labai ta sun, ma iy akohok ahi ame hamon ja. Jises Krais, iy le sun doh udu ndrine ahi. Eme ma sun doh aseben ahi leheya iri mwan ma badih, Kindrei i buku sah handru.
Udu bolo len doh, ndramak ari badu Juwis nyaran Apolos, ya atehei iy eme len udu Aleksandriya eme kon Epesus. Iy badeh, tanan tan ndrala labai, ma iy tanan bolo sahou ta Kindrei mwasin labai.

Jises ale akohok sisi-in tinan labai udu manan loboho madasan ta kon tinan, bado bolo kon amwenen bwe. Iy amekes i buku doh, ta amekes iri lau marakon asahan ndrabun, ma ndrayen amou ta akunoh taha ame hamon ja.

Eme oro tanan mari doh badeh, ou leheya oro na len mari, ma ou batanau oro, ma aliu oro, are ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe, kame hamon. Ou amekes lakou mari doh, i buku none ou ndramak handru, ta anoh bwe. Ya iri sabudon anya, ou badeh ari ndramak laleyah, ndri-iy.
Kindrei badeh, nadun ari le, ya iy atehei iy eme kon munyak, ta aseben taha ta akohok kohan mwasin handru. Ta kandriyen doh, Kindrei leheya taha, buku none iy aso-ok taha handru.

“Tama! Ou ndratehei oro ndrame tek, eme jo aso-ok oro kame kare hawek, kare kon kameh jo udu aliy. Ma jo aso-ok oro kanyolom lomadak mene ou adeu eme tek, tasah ou aso-ok jo bwena labai, ano kon munyak barasahan.
Bolo len mara-ei iri abo gok ta bokoro-ei lakou solo-an, ma adeu maha-an ili tiri mwan ma badih.
Tinan tiri pris tataha badeh, in aliy. Nyaran Jises, iy Nadu Kindrei. Iy ndra-au ndrala kandrah hawen. Eme ma taha katawi iri budon marakon nane taha ndrasehek ndrala tiri lau badeh, kihis mara-ei.

Na bolo iri len mara-ei doh ale, tama taha Kindrei badeh, atudun ma suri Laban tataha Jises Krais iu ili loken mara-ei, ma iy atehei lomadan mwasin labai doh i tan, ma iy asahan i randrah labai. Aso badeh, areu aliy anyolom iy. Ma Kindrei badeh, udu bolo kandrah ma lomadan, asehek i buku doh: “Iy ndramak badeh, naduk. Jo aso-ok iy labai. Jo badeh, sekesek tinan labai tan.”
Malawin Mwasin ari le nane adeh, amekes iri lakou marakon. Ta so-ok tan le, iy apwai ndramas tan marakon ili ta ndramak ari, ari.

Iy nane doh ano le badeh, iy ari eme len oloh ndrah tan ja. Idoh ili asahan hahuw ai. Eme ma bwidi mada an, ma mada bun ma hawe mada ndrau andra-i; eme ma bwidi lomada oro banya bamwenen bwe; eme ma awa hahuw ta bolo len ma awa hahuw ta bolo ben badeh, asahan lulik le ai.
Eme iri Korin tawi tinan ta atondrok ndrahu tukum tiri Juwis nyaran Sostenes ma adai iy udu mirihik ta mada sahou. Arile, Galiyo batehei budon bala ta aliy bwe.
Eme ma bwidi iri anya kateu iy, arile iy eme atobwak iri.

Ahi abudon ta lakou doh kameh asahan. Eme ma, ahi bawoyah ta amekes gok ta Kindrei bwe. Idoh handru, oda ahi sudi boto-on ta nyamu iri, ma hamon kameh iri andra-i. Arile, ndri-iy ai, kohan mwasin Kindrei edeu eme tahi, iy bwidiy asahan ha-un mara-ei ta iri len ari, ari.

Ano Mariya andrei bwisi ndrau ari, suluw irek udu bolon. Suluw doh iri amekes na kandro kei aloh nat. Manahun ma sowan badeh, tinan labai. Iy eme asolou ili kati Jises, ano iy owei abosar na lami batun. Ma manahu bubure suluw nane doh tuhi bolo asiu mara-ei.

Abraham atehei iri budon tan mara-ei handru, eme ma iy manyah i buku ndramak badu kon leheleh udu bolo kon ta tandrakan nane doh. Ndrahunen badeh, udu bolo balei, i buku le Aisik uru Jekop. Uru akohok tandrakan ta Kindrei i buku le Abraham le mene akohok.
Eme ya ado nadu tine badu hawek i san ta budon handru, ado ka-en le hamon ta kandriyen tek, ma ado ale ka-en hamon ta kandriyen toro lau mene na len aso ado hawe ado.
Aha badeh, kabwese maha-an ta nadu tine aha ari ja. Ya i buku none aha kamekes kandriyen doh, aha an hamon ta kandriyen ta Krais.
Ya idah aha ndratana aha, Kindrei basehek anya ndramak kameh asahan mwasin na budon tan le bwe, iy badeh, aso-ok budon tam hawe kandriyen ta gok tam ale kudu mwasin ta madan.
Ya eme taha kasehek ki buku sah bah? Kandriyen ma lomondra ta Kindrei bamwenen bwe? Bwe handru en!
Aha kaseken are lau budon tan handru babadok bwe, kewek hawe aha. Ma aha sandres budon tan.
Ano, bahun laba tinan atohou udu kandrah, ya Maikel hawe oro angelo tan amekes bahun hawe mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy, ma mwak hawe iri angelo tan amekes bahun ili hamon ili toro ale.

Ma ale, buku aha andra-i ta lakou, ya, bale aha kudu aliy! “Kora-on aha kandra-i ma amekes kandriyen ndra-in.” Kora-on losen taha udu aliy, winiya le an amai iu ili andri na beyeh, ma aha tawi losen doh udu le gwek kahis.

Buku none iri lau amekes ndra-in ewek taha, aha samekes ndra-in sala hamon sala tiri. Ma buku none iri aluhe aha, aha saluhe sala hamon, arile aha kasolom ki ta Kindrei, ta iy kanyosowani iri. Tasah, Kindrei mene ndraluhi aha, ma iy ndratandrakan ta edeu nyosowan mwasin ewek la-u aha.
Are lau iy nane suni jo eme dah iy udu hawek. Iy winiyan bamani jo bwe, tasah jo amekes iri lakou in hamon ta budon tan.”

Ya, aha badeh, kasin iri awin ta bahun doh kudu le ai: Sahou ta Kindrei handru badeh, i buku balaban aha apeu ndrukulu aha na aliy. Ma kandriyen mwasin aha a-en hamon ta aliy, idoh i buku awin kapa iri amekes na hayen, aha asin ta aturuk ade aha ta bahun.

Ou ndranyolom ndrau ma ndro taloh udu minek salin ma hawe ndru-u sun ma ndro taloh ai. Idoh i buku sahou sokek le, arile moson ta aliy i buku doh: Ndrau ma ndro taloh doh i buku iri angelo atondrok lau ta Kindrei badu kon ma ndro taloh. Ya, ndru-u sun ma ndro taloh doh, i buku iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badu kon ma ndro taloh doh amwenen.”

Arile taha ndranyolom Jises, iy akohok boto-on tan. Bwena mene iy udu bahandra tondrok tiri angelo luluwen bwe, iy imek ta akohok kon ta lau marakon, ma tikisiy ta Kindrei kameh winiyan sebenei iri lau marakon. Jises bwese maha-an tataha tinan labai ma iy imek. Arile na dah, Kindrei ndrasuruni iy, ma ndratehei lomadan nyaran ndra tinan labai udu bwele-e iri lakou marakon.
Tasah, Kindrei le badeh, edeu boto-on i tado ta amekes lomondra mwasin ta sasah iy aseken ado ta amekes ma edeu boto-on i tado ta amekes.
Jo ndrasehek tado ta lakou marakon doh, ta iri sekesek tek kudu taha, ma kidih bolo oda aha.
Jo Pol: Jo badeh, aposel ari ai, ta Krais Jises. Idoh badeh, asahan na sahou boto-on ta Kindrei, ndramak ta seben taha ma hawe Krais Jises, iy ndramak ta taha katehei budon handru ki tan.

Ya aha badih, aha kalomondra kolau taha, ma aha kanyasou aha kamwenen; ma aha sanyasou batu aha sala buku none aha adeu lakou i bada aha, i buku none bek nyikilikin, i ndranye aha, hawe buwandralou, ma hawe kolau lomadan sowan tinan labai.

Jises eme andrei malou ranah, iy bawei i le se. Iy eme tikahei iri lau ma bulumakau, hawe sipsip tiri au ala manan. Iy eme bukudi iri sau tiri nane ondrek luk udu bwele-en, amou ili andri, ma luk marakon udu bwele-en atalan laleyah.

Tasah, Kindrei le amwenen amekes taha, ma ta gok mene Krais Jises amekes, Kindrei bwidi taha asahan ha-un ja, eme ma taha winiyan amekes kandriyen mwasin buku bwena mene iy lowosa taha, ma aseken taha kamekes, ma ka-en hamon ta aliy.

Aha kawas tek, na idah aha akohok iri maha-an, ma iri lakou solo-an asahan taha, ta none taha ta budon taha. Mani aha satur, ndri-iy. Ma aha sasehek anya, “Aden! Idah saba lakou handru? Sebwe iri lau ra-on ja ta Kindrei bakohok iri maha-an buku none ahi dah bwe, nadeh?”
Nadah badeh, ndrine taha kudu mwasin ma taha kasekesek, ma katudun nyaran! Tasah, len ta tasou ta Nadu Sipsip badeh, ndrasahan. Ya, badih tan badeh, ndranyosowani iy.

Kindrei andrei aha ndrame hamon. Eme ma, budon doh aha katehei buku barak iri amekes na hayen ta tubuloh bwisi batu aha. Ma aha kakohok iri sahou ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei nane edeu ewek taha. Sahou doh kameh asahan i buku samen kasoh madan madan labai, aha kandrei kudu mine aha ta asan iri sahou ta bahun.
Eme iy anyolom ndramak ari badu Ijip badeh, idi ndramak ari badu Isra-el andra-i labai. Eme Moses suri iy ili badeh, aseben lau tan badu Isra-el ma iy idi ndramak nane imek.
Aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih rayah ja, aha sawoyah ta amekes kandriyen mwasin.
Aha katehei ndrokei kamwenen ta Krais kameh eme hamon ja. Ma aha kales boto-on ta budon taha ari le. Aha kabadok kado le, ma aha sanoh.

Bwe handru! Asiu balei mene aha bwese, tek bwe, ta kindrei ta wasai Molek le, ma sukumada kei i buku ndrau ta kindrei taha ta wasai aloh Repan; oro sukumada kei doh ado asah, ta aha atudun iri. Ya eme idah kameh, jo kameh tikahei aha au a len ala kon munyak tinan Babilon.’
Eme ma, aha nadu tine aso, aha kales boto-on. Ma iri sahou marakon ta Kindrei aso mene leheya aha ta aliy, na boho aso, o, na la-ukei aso atorou ewek taha, sahou doh aha ka-en hamon ta aliy.

Kindrei le ari badeh, ndralokowani taha ta akohok koha taha ha-un doh. Ma iy ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun ndrame tataha. Handru labai, Malawin Ndrabun, iy i buku sahou tandrakan ta Kindrei, ta iy kameh edeu iri lakou hamon, iy mene tiye ta edeu eme ta taha.
Aha badih kakohok kandriyen ta kado le bahandra mwan.

Ya, i buku none ou anuhun sahou laleyah, iri kasehek tam, ta sahou ndra-in i bada iri lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei badeh, ndranyem ki-iu ai. Ki buku none uru la-uh deh, oro taloh kasehek badeh, ou baranuhun ai.
Na len aha atukum, aha kadeu lim ma kasekesek aha ari ari. Ya oro lau ta budon toro handru tiye sahou sekesek ewek taha are badeh.

Iri kameh atah koloweh ili batu iri, iri aden, ma iri tikisiy tinan labai. Eme ma iri asehek i buku doh, “ ‘Ahi tikisiy, ahi tikisiy tinan labai, ta kon tinan doh! Tasah sisi-in tinan labai ndrame ndrala la-un. Tama iri ndron mara-ei ale atas bolo ndras asahan iri nadu batun ta luk, badeh, na le kon tinan nane doh. Ahi tikisiy tinan labai! Tasah, udu bolo awa ari le badeh, iy ndratohou mara-ei ndrano ndra-au!

Aha katou, tama taha Kindrei badeh, tikisiy ma aso-ok taha labai, eme ma iy aloh taha nadun handru. Ehe, idoh handru! Taha nadu Kindrei handru. Iri lau badu munyak ale amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ya iri batehei budon ba-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei bwe. Eme ma iri tana iri Kindrei bwe, ma ta kati budon doh iri tana iri, buku taha ndrasahan nadu Kindrei, ma taha a-en hamon ta kandriyen tan mwasin.

Eme ma aha loweu, aha kanuhun sahou tiri lau-en, ma ka-en hamon ta aliy. Aha sala ta bar ndra-in, ndri-iy. Aha mari kamekes kandriyen ta adeu ndrine aha ma so-ok taha ki andri bahandra so-ok ta nadu tine aha ari ja. Tasah, aha ndratana aha in bolo buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh, “Kindrei badeh, bwalen iri lau ta atudun nyara iri amwenen i loken, arile iy badeh, tikisiy, ya iy amekes mwasin i tiri lau ale atehei nyara iri, ma so-ok tiri i andri mara-ei.”

Winiyan bwe! Buku lau marakon kamekes kandriyen ta wasai, Kindrei le ari badeh, bwe! Iy badeh, asehek le sahou handru len marakon, i buku none ndratorowenei, “Kindrei, na saba len ou asehek, idah kameh, ou aleben sahou, ndra handru le; ya buku none ari ndramak anya katuw ou a ta mada sahou, idah kameh, ou winiyan bakunoh bwe, iy le kameh kakunoh mara-ei.”
Iy akohok boto-on badu mine iri tinan tiri pris ta aseu iri lau ala aloh nyaram udu bolo salom tiri.”

Arile idah kameh, i buku le bwena mene ndra-au, iri propet ta wasai mene are ndrokowa iri Isra-el kameh, iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai asahan ndrokowa ado i buku le aliy. Iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai doh kameh leheya ado na tanan handru bwe, ya idah kameh, ado winiyan baseleyaniy bwe. Iri kameh sekere-ei lau a len ta Kindrei i buku ndramak atehei budon tan handru i ta aliy. Ma idah kameh, iri bisini lahou ta Jises Krais, ndramak handru ta akunoh iri ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Ya eme, na boho iri le doh, kameh tiyani ndra-in atok tiri, ma idah kameh, se nawin bwe iri akohok andra-i labai.
Idoh le badeh, bwidi iri Juwis abadok ta adai iy. Iri anya, “Ma bwena handru iy ba-en hamon ta len ta amunyau bwe, ano ja, iy anya, taman handru badeh, Kindrei. Iy amekes iy ja i buku le Kindrei.”
Jo atudun aha labai, tasah len marakon badeh, aha abudon jo le ai, ma aha a-en hamon ta leheya jo ndratehei ndrawek taha.
Tasah, Debit mene asehek nyalan i buku doh: ‘Jo badeh, anyolom Kindrei udu madak na len mari. Tasah, iy badeh, udu loboho lim salin hawek ya jo winiyan banoh bwe.

Kindrei ndratehei kohan mwasin ndrawek la-u aha. Ma aha ndrasahan randrah ja, buku none le buwa kei ha-un ateh ereu bolo bilin. Arile, aha basahan na buwa kei badu kon munyak dah bwe. Buwa kei badu munyak dah kameh, imek ma amai iu. Aha asahan na buwa kei Kindrei le mesekei, ma iy kameh ereu le buku doh. Buwa kei doh badeh, sahou ta Kindrei. Sahou doh atehei kohan mwasin i la-u iri lau tan, ma iy winiyan bano bwe.

Eme ma, aha ari ari badeh, kasehek nyala kandriyen ndra-in taha nane ki tiri lau ta Kindrei ra-on ja. Ya aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei ta iy kamesekei aha kasahan kamwenen ja. Tasah, buku are mwan o badih, iy mwasin mara-ei ta mada Kindrei, ya salom tan nyamun labai, badeh kameh winiyan sebenei lau solo-an labai asahan mwasin.
Handru labai jo tiye taha. Are lau iy atehei budon tan eme tek, idah kameh kohan handru winiyan bano bwe ta udu le buku doh.
“Buku jo iu, ado kameh winiya barah bwe. Jo kameh eme hamon eme hawe aha ja.

Seben solo-an solo-an udu aliy oh! Ya, ari ma bwena badeh, i buku doh: Kindrei mene atehei sahou tan amwenen i tiri Juwis ta atondrok ma aseben iri mwan ma badih winiyan atanan ta iri sahou tan marakon.
Aha bonyo-ou badeh, kabudon iri tinan taha, ma ka-en hamon ta sahou tiri. Aha winiyan bawasai bwe. Aha ka-en hamon ta sahou tiri i le buku aha anuhun, ma a-en hamon ta sahou ta Krais.

Ya eme ou abudon anya, “Bolo tikisiy tan tinan labai, ya iy udu le abe-en lau katubuni ndrine iri, ma iy badeu ndramas ndra-in bala tiri suwi bwe. Idah kameh, jo winiyan bala bolo maha-an ta Kindrei bwe.” Sebwe ou abudon kandriyen mwasin tan doh, i buku lakou laleyah nadeh? Ya eme ou baseleyani se bwai, ta tikisiy tan badeh, ta anya katubuni ndrinem ma katiye ou ame hamon ja.
Buku taha asolom i ta Kindrei, budon tataha winiyan abadok, tasah taha tanan, buku taha asolom ta ari lakou, ya buku Kindrei aso-ok ta taha kakohok, iy winiyan anuhun salom tataha.

Ya jo aseken Kindrei, ndramak ta edeu lakou mwasin, kamesekei bolo oda aha kidih na sekesek, ma hawe oda aha kudu mwasin ki-in hamon ta budon taha handru in tan. Ya eme ma budon taha kameh abadok ta anyolom bohon i bwena ta lakou mwasin na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun. Pol asehek nyala gok tan amwenen, ma iy edeu bada-an tan mwasin ili tiri lau badu Rom (Kalan 15:14–16:27)
Mirihik ta kon tinan nane iri adi Jises, bilin ari udu mirihik ta aliy. Ya udu bolo bilin doh, munu bek ari ma ha-un le, iri badeu ari ndramak imek bala aliy bwe le.

Arile, iy ndramak doh tawi nyabwe munyak doh, ma atehei iy udu bolo asiu lulik hawe propet ta wendreya. Iy propet ta wendreya doh mene, amekes iri kalem solo-an ma lahou tinan labai udu mada nyabwe munyak, ma hawe malawin. Ma, na iri kalem solo-an ma lahou tinan doh, iy wendreyani iri lau mene ndrandrei kalem ta nyabwe munyak, hawe atudun malawin. Nyabwe munyak ma hawe propet ta wendreya doh badeh, iri akahei uru ma mulin au ala andri bolo lek ta jih anya na bek solpa, asun uru.

Idoh handru, ya mwasin labai ta ou amekes i buku doh, “I buku none ndramak ta amekes bahun i tam kimeson badeh, ou anyohan iy na nyamon; Ma i buku none iy anyar ta gwa badeh, ou adeu gwa ki wa-in. I buku none ou amekes kandriyen mwasin doh i tan, ou kameh winiyan amekes bwilin ama ma tubuni kandriyen tan ndra-in doh iu.”

Sahou ta Krais badeh, kihis handru kudu bolo ndrine aha. Aha badeh, kaleheya, ma kabatanau aha kamwenen na tanan handru doh. Aha kayah wari ta Debit, ma iri wari rayah ja ta salom, ma iri wari Malawin Ndrabun atehei udu ndrine aha ta atudun Kindrei.
Ya, aha mwan tasou, aha badeh, kaso-ok udu aha iri, ma aha samekes ndrine iri sandra-i.

Arile, ki buku none ari badih ta Kindrei ya ari badih nyau kudu hawen badeh, iy badeh, katondrok iy. Iy satehei maha doh sala la-u lau ta Kindrei. Eme ya iri lau ta Kindrei ja, bale iri ki tiri badih nyau rayah ja, ala iri lau ta atondrok iri bwe, ya iri katondrok iri.

Ya sahou handru Kindrei asehek i buku doh: Iy ndramesekei san ta taha ta akohok kohan mwasin ta udu le buku doh. Ya san ta akohok kohan mwasin ta udu le buku doh badeh, asahan ta gok, nadun mene ndramesekei ereu ta kei tondreh.
Are lau ihis hawe Nadu Kindrei, iy ndrakohok kohan mwasin ale winiyan bano bwe. Arile, are lau bahis hawe Nadu Kindrei bwe, iy winiyan bakohok kohan mwasin ta ereu le buku doh, bwe.
Ya, buku Nadu Ndramak Awas ndrabwidi aha ndramani iri gok taha bonyo-ou, badeh, kameh aha winiyan bamekes gok ta bonyo-ou ja bwe.

Eme ma, jo kasehek taha ai: Sisi-in jo bwese dah, aha sabudon ta aliy ma ndrine aha sandra-i ta aliy. Tasah, iri maha-an doh leheya buku Kindrei tikisiy ma aseken aha mwan ma badih badu leheleh tinan labai, ma iri kameh aseben aha asahan buku Krais.

tasah oro lau i buku doh, baleheya tanan handru ta lahou ta Laban bwe. Oro leheya tanan randrah labai ta abulum le ndrine oro. Oro asehek sahou nyaman nyaman ta asan bale aha, ma hawe amekes sahou mwasin mwasin ta atamar aha; ma oro bolowani budon tiri lau tana iri lakou mwasin o ndra-in bwe, ka-en hamon toro.

Eme iri badeh, ndradah ta kandriyen ndra-in mari. Iri adah na kandriyen ta aseken lakou tiri rayah. Iri amekes budon ta amekes isi i tiri lau. Iri amekes madalakis i tiri lau, iri andra-i i la-u iri lau, ma adai iri lau amak. Iri sokolowa ta katehei budon tiri ki ta lakou handru bwe. Iri bahana sahou ndra-in asehek i tiri lau. Iri asehek sahou ta wasai tiri lau udu ndranye lau mari.
Ou atondrok sahou mwasin doh kamwenen, Kindrei mene ndratehei ndrawek minem. Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei doh, iy udu bolo taha, iy kameh aseben ou ta atondrok lakou badeh.

Are lau anya ki-in hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in badu badan, iy kameh akohok kunoh ma imek ta aliy; arile, are lau anya ki-in hamon ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei, ma amekes iri kandriyen mwasin le, eme ma Malawin Mwasin le kameh winiyan edeu kohan handru ta udu le buku doh.
Ma taha sanone Laban, sala buku iri bwena mene amekes, eme ma mwak ndra-in ini iri rayah amak.

Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari, iy winiya bamekes lakou laleyah bwe. Iy winiya babudon iy le bwe, ma ndrinen winiya babolosen suwi bwe. Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari iy winiya babudon ndra-in iri nane amekes i tan bwena bwe.
Iri tubuluhi batala iri na awin iri amekes na kapa o hayen, ma kurutuwe bani iri badeh, i buku nyaro iri hos ariu karis ili ta bahun.
“Iri winiyan batona kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe, buku jo bame basehek tiri bwe. Arile, na dah, jo asehek iri lakou ili tiri, eme ma iri ari madasan ta tone ndra-in tiri bwai.

Buku aha are hawe iri mwan ma badih nane, ba-en hamon ta Kindrei bwe, aha badeh, ka-en hamon le ta budon mwasin, ma kamekes iri kandriyen amwenen le. Len mara-ei aha kalokou aha le ta amekes kandriyen ari le, Krais ndramekes ndrala tiri mwan ma badih, kabatana iy mene udu kon munyak, kora-on len mwasin ta asehek sahou mwasin kamai laleyah.

Sahou doh handru, tasah taha ndratanan ta kandriyen ndra-in ta ndrine taha malen badeh, ndratahiy i bada kei tondreh hawe Krais. Eme ya, bada taha ndra-in ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ano, ma taha winiyan bala bonyo-ou ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ja bwe.

Buku none aha anya katana aha, are lau handru nadu Kindrei, ma are lau handru badu hawe tama balik Satan, san in aliy: Iri lau mwan ma badih ale bamekes kandriyen mwasin bwe, ma iri batehei ndrine iri mwasin bala ta nadu tine iri ari ja, ta Krais bwe, badeh, iri nadu Kindrei bwe. Taha ari, ari badeh, kaso-ok handru iri lau rayah ja (Kalan 3:11–5:21)

Ya, are lau atehei karei ma lomondra ndra-in udu bolo budon tan badeh, kameh mesekei le bahun hawe Kindrei. Tasah, are lau amekes kandriyen i buku doh, iri lau doh badeh, batehei oro bala bahandra tondrok ta batanau malen ta Kindrei bwe, ya iri winiyan ba-en hamon ta batanau tan bwe.
Eme bwidi ndrinek sekesek ma jo asehek ta aliy, Ma jo ale atondrok ta lakou mwasin handru kameh asahan hamon.

Bwe! Idoh wasai handru. Jo asehek i buku doh: Lakou iri lau ta Kindrei bwe adeu i nyara salom, idoh iri adeu ili tiri balik. Iri badeu bala ta Kindrei bwe. Eme jo bwalek ta aha atukum ala hawe malawi iri balik.

Udu bolo iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei badu Antiyok badeh, iri propet rayah, ma hawe iri lau ta leheya rayah ale ado aliy. Nyara oro badeh, Banabas, Simiyon iri aloh iy Nijer, Lusiyus badu Sairini, hawe Mana-en iy mene asahan kawas ta kabin Herot na len iy atondrok kon, ma hawe Sol.

Aha katondrok aha kamwenen. Kora-on aha ka-en hamon ta sahou wasai tiri lau anya kariu aha ta a-en hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in doh, jo mene ndrasehek ta aliy. Tasah, ndrine Kindrei irih tiri mwan ma badih nane tebelese sahou tan, ma a-en hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in buku doh.

Eme ou ma hawe oro lau ta batun badeh, kabarah oro kandru-uk, tasah oro badeh, sekere-ei iri boho kamen satehei budon tiri handru sa-en hamon ta sahou handru. Oro amekes leheya doh ta amekes madasan ta lau kanyohan oro na luk. Ya kandriyen doh badeh, ndra-in labai.
Iy ndratanan are lau handru kameh edeu sa-oh tan, ta idoh le ma iy eme asehek, “Bada ado ndra bele, arile jo basehek bada ado marakon bwe.”
Jises tiye ja i buku doh, “Jo tiye taha handru, are lau iy badek madasan ta kowah tiri sipsip bwe, iy inyek o iy apou ja san kabede kowah, idoh iy ndramak ta bahana.

Iri ndraruwani san mwasin, ya iri ndra-en hamon ta san ta Balam nadu Be-or. Iy badeh, tanan kandriyen ta aseken labai ta iri lau kanyohan iy luk, buku iy kamekes kandriyen ndra-in ta aseben iri; arile iy anya ndra mwasin le, iy amekes ili le ai.
Ano, iri Juwis hawe iri lau badu leheleh ala atilik sahou hawe iri lau ta bwena tiri anya, kadai uru ma anya korou uru na bek.

Ili san tulusin ai, Jises asehek sahou le nane ili tan ja, “Saimon, nadu Jon, ou kede-eh aso-ok jo handru?” Eme bwidi Pita tikisiy, tasah Jises badeh, ndremenya iy san tulusin ai, ta sahou randra le doh, “Ou kede-eh aso-ok jo handru deh?” Eme iy asehek i tan, “Laban, ou tanam lakou marakon; ou ale ndratanam jo, jo badeh, aso-ok ou labai!” Jises eme asehek sahou ili tan ja, “Mwasin, ou atondrok iri sipsip tek.

Arile, iri lakou ndraka-an, hawe iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri lau ta karei, ma iri lau ta amekes sahou wasai, iri mara-ei doh kameh winiyan bala bolo kon tinan doh bwe. Iri lau le nyara iri udu bolo buk ta Nadu Sipsip, iri le lau doh kameh akohok kohan handru ma winiyan ala bolo kon tinan don ai.

Ya, jo atou iy badih doh badeh, nyosowani iy na awin saraman ma lu-ei, ma iri nyasou nyikilikin solo-an labai tubuluhi iy, ma iri bek nyikilikin, hawe iri buwandralou sowa iri tinan labai. Ya, iy tawi raben bwesam nyikilikin labai udu minen. Ya, waen badeh, irek udu bolo bwesam nyikilikin doh, leheya iri kandriyen ndra-in solo-an abola labai ta budon ta Kindrei, ma hawe iri kandriyen mara-ei ta karei, i badih doh amekes.

Kandriyen ta aso-ok iri mwan ma badih badeh, ere bwele-en labai mara-ei ja tiri kandriyen rayah ja mene ndrasehek ndrawek taha. Ma iy badeh, atehei iri kandriyen mwasin marakon ili le winiyan, ma iy tawi ndrine aha mari i le se.
Jises eme tiye toro, “Len dah ndrasahan ta Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh akohok lomadan.

Ou tiye anya, “Ado sateu badih udu mwan,” ya ou bateu se badih udu mwan bwai? Ou asehek sahou nyarahan i tiri lau satudun sukumada kei, ya ou bakohok lakou ta atudun sukumada kei badu asiu ta atudun bwai?

Arile, kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in silahei san ta bokoro-ei jo. Ya iri kandriyen doh i madasan ta batanau malen ma mesekei budon tek towodau ta amekes madak alikis lakou ari, ya lakou ari doh. Tasah, buku none batanau malen mene basehek tek bwe, idah nane karei ma lomondra ndra-in winiyan batowodau boto-on bwe.
Jo kameh sebenei ou, buku ou ala ado bolo iri lau tam amwenen, ma iri lau leheleh. Jo kameh suni ou ala bolo iri,

Na len ndra-au bwena mene, taha ale i buku aliy. Taha badeh, bale taha bwe. Taha banuhun sahou bwe, ma taha atehei budon tataha i ta sahou wasai. Bolo manyah tataha badeh, ta amekes bada taha sekesek ta kandriyen ndra-in le. Eme taha mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in na len mari. Ma taha ale badeh, mada taha alikis ta lakou tiri lau, ya taha aseken. Ma idoh amekes budon tiri lau badeh, andra-i eme tataha, ma hawe amekes budon tataha andra-i i ta ndramak ari ari.

Udu mada Kindrei ma hawe udu mada Jises hawe iri angelo ndrabun badeh, jo tiye sahou boto-on dah i tam, ta ou badeh, a-en hamon ta sahou batanau dah. Ma ou abudon kamwenen, ou sala mwasin ta ndramak mwasin tam le, ndri-iy. Ou badeh, a mwasin ta ndramak ndra-in ale, i buku le ndramak mwasin tam. I buku none ou manyah anuhun sahou turu, ou areu le alih turu, ta aseben uru ari ari. Ma budon doh badeh, kudu bolo lahou tam mari ou amekes.
Aha sanoh! Buku aha ales boto-on are le ta budon taha, idah kameh aha winiyan akohok sihine aha tinan labai.
Taha tanan, buku taha amekes gok ta ari ndramak, taha badeh, ka-en hamon le ta iri tanan tan.
Ya eme Pita badeh, udu hawe ndramak ari lahou tan ta asereh ku-i iri katin haka, nyaran Saimon, iy udu gwek sese.
Aha marakon ndratanan ndramwenen ta aha badeh, asiu ndrabun handru ta Kindrei, ma Malawin Mwasin tan in hawe aha.
Ado nadu tine, ndraye Jises le badeh, ndrasikinei iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha ndrano ndra-au, eme ma taha sanoh ta ala bolo asiu ndrok ndrabun, ndrabun labai ta Kindrei.
Jises asehek sahou ili tiri lau ja, “Jo kameh iu ai. Aha kameh asilah jo, arile aha kameh amak ta kandriyen ndra-in taha. Aha kameh winiyan bame kon kameh jo ilih aliy bwe.”

Aha badeh, lau ta Kindrei; iy aso-ok aha labai, ma iy ndrandrei aha ndrasahan iri lau tan amwenen. Eme ma, aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta kandriyen buku: Aha katikisi iri lau mwan ma badih marakon, ma kamekes mwasin kili tiri. Aha badeh, katehei so-ok ta bada aha ki-iu kili andri, ma amekes kandriyen kamunum le kili tiri mwan ma badih, ma kalelei iri kamekes ndra-in kewek taha.
Are lau iy anya kamekes gok tek, iy badeh, ki-in le hamon tek, eme ma kon heh jo udu aliy, iy kameh udu hawek ale. Buku are lau iy amekes lahou tek, tama kameh atehei lomadan tinan ili tan.”
Ma iy ale badeh, katondrok udun ma nadun kudu mwasin ma iy badeh, kaleheya nadun kanuhun sahou hawe kinoh iy.
Eme ma, aha marakon kabwidi ndrine nadu tine aha iri ari, ari, ta sahou mwasin doh, ma katadau ndrine iri kili le se, i buku aha amekes dah.
Bwena handru kala aha mene anuhun sahou mwasin dah, ma aha atehei budon taha i aliy, aha anuhun sahou i buku doh: Taha kaso-ok nadu tine taha ari ja.
Taha ndrado bolo maha-an solo-an labai, eme ma, jo abudon i buku doh: Mwasin ta aha kamanyah i buku le aha ado aliy na len dah.
Ndramak ari nyaran Nikodemus, iy badu Parasi, iy lau tinan ari ta atondrok kandriyen tiri Juwis. Iy badu hawe iri kansol ta atondrok kandriyen tiri Juwis.

Buku Rahap badeh, badih ta madasarah, iy tone uru lau ma la-uh mene Josuwa suni uru ala ta anyolom bolo kon Jeriko, ya Rahap leheyani uru a hamon a san ari ja. Ya idoh le, iy asahan mwasin na kandriyen tan ta tone uru lau ma la-uh nane doh. Ya Kindrei bwetenei kandriyen ta Rahap nane, ma iy aloh iy badih mwasin ta madan.

Arile, iri badih katawi kandriyen ta budon handru, ma hawe kandriyen ta tikisiy, ma hawe kandriyen mwasin ta are mada Kindrei, ma iri sala badih ta atudun iri ta anyasou bada iri. Ya buku none iri amekes i buku doh kameh, na len iri adeu nah kameh iri adeu udu mwasin.

Kindrei tiri lau badu Isra-el badeh, tiye tama taha iri ma mesekei iri asahan tinan labai, udu bolo len mene iri manyah ado Ijip, ano na le boto-on ta Kindrei, iy andrei iri ado bolo kon Ijip ame len.
Eme ya Kindrei badeh, tanan ndrine iri ma leheyani iy aseken iri i san ta iy atehei Malawin Ndrabun i tiri, i buku none iy amekes eme tato mene.

Taha ndratanan, Kindrei badeh, asehek anya, “Aha tasou badeh, samekes kandriyen ta karei.” Ma iy ale asehek anya, “Ou sadai ndramak samak.” Ya, i buku ou bamekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei bwe, arile ou adai ndramak ari imek, ou amwenen badeh, asahan ndramak ari ndra-in labai ta bokoro-ei batanau ta Kindrei.
Jo atehei kohak handru ili tiri, ma iri kameh winiyan bamak bwe, ma ari ndramak winiyan baruwi iri ado minek bala len bwe.

Kindrei badeh, ndramak ta isan mondrei ndrokowa aha ma amekes manyah taha kudu mwasin. Ma, na nawin bwe kameh iy atisih tama balik Satan abwesek udu bolo kati aha. Ya eme jo aseken tikisiy ta Laban tataha Jises kudu hawe aha.

Iri kameh atukum ta salom hawe iri mwan ma badih, ma tiye iri ka-en hamon ta budon tiri lau ta Kindrei. Arile, ta ndrine iri, iri adeu kona iri ili ta kandriyen ta Kindrei nane tubuni koha iri mwan ma badih. Handru, ou are ndra len labai tiri lau doh!
Ya eme taha badeh, i le buku aliy. Taha badeh, solo-an, arile taha asahan ari buruwen ahas hawe le Krais. Ma taha ari ari badeh, kaseben iri rayah ja.

Eme sahou, jo tiye tam dah badeh, handru. Ou ales ya asehek sahou boto-on ki toro lau ala ndratehei budon toro handru ndra ta Kindrei badeh. Eme ma oro katehei budon toro ki ta amekes kandriyen mwasin. Eme ya leheya dah badeh, mwasin labai ta aseben lau mari.

Buk ndrabun badeh, asehek i buku doh, “Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin mara-ei ta madan.” Ya Kindrei ale aloh Abraham badeh, i buku, “Kawas tan handru.” Ya, kati sahou “atehei budon tan mara-ei in ta Kindrei” doh badeh, asahan eme lewan ta kandriyen nane Abraham amekes i ta nadun Aisik.

Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih tek amwenen, aha ndratehei budon taha ndra-en ta tinan tataha Laban Jises Krais. Iy Laban ta lakou mwasin mara-ei badu kandrah. Eme ma, kora-on aha kabo gok ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ili le tiri lau nyara iri tinan, ma aha atehei kona aha ili tiri mwan ma badih nyara iri bwe. Aha badeh, kamekes kandriyen mwasin randra le kili tiri mari.

“Boho iri badeh, i buku lek ta lau amak bohon apwa le, tasah iri sihi boho iri ta amekes sahou wasai.” “Iri amekes sahou solo-an labai ta bokoro-ei ndramak ari ja, i buku mada lihi mwak ndra-in ta atoh ndramak imek.”
Eme ma, aha mwan badeh, kaso-ok udu aha iri i buku le aha aso-ok bada aha amwenen. Are lau mwan aso-ok udun badeh, iy aso-ok ma atondrok iy amwenen.

Ya eme taha kasehek ki buku doh: Iri lau badu leheleh bamekes lahou boto-on ta asilah madasan ta Kindrei kaloh iri mwasin mara-ei ta madan bwe, arile iri badeh, ndratakalahei madasan ta Kindrei kaloh iri mwasin mara-ei ta madan. Ya, san doh badeh, i san ta budon handru le.
Oro katawi sahou handru mene Kindrei tiye ta budon handru ma budon toro kaleu kudu mwasin.

Ya iri lohowan rayah tiri lau ta Kindrei badeh, sakohok budon anya, “Mwasin ai, ndramak ta Kindrei badeh, nadu tine to labai.” Ndri-iy, ado sakohok iri budon doh; budon doh badeh, bamwenen bwe. Arile, oro lohowan kakohok doh: “Bwe, ndramak ta lau ta Kindrei ta to doh badeh, ndramak ta Kindrei labai, eme ma to kaseken iy. Ma hawe to kamekes lahou boto-on ja ta aseben iy.”

Handru labai! Iri rayah batehei budon tiri ba-en hamon ta sahou dah bwe. Arile aha abudon i buku sah bah? Sebwe budon ndra-in nane iri a-en hamon ta aliy kameh amekes Kindrei tubuni budon ma karuwani sahou tan ai?
Arile ndramak tiri ari ta bahun eme aso-ei kabede Jises na nyah. Eme ma ndra hawe gwa amou eme len.
Sahou batanau tek i buku doh: Aha kaso-ok nadu tine aha ari, ari i buku le jo aso-ok aha labai.

Aha badeh, sadeu sese bada aha sala buku none ndron ta ndrole karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Arile aha kadeu bada aha ki mine Kindrei, i buku none oro lau mene amak, ano Kindrei mesekei oro amak ame loken ja, ma aha kadeu bada aha mari ki buku ndron ta ndrole kandriyen mwasin.

Ya, taha bala buku iri lau rayah ale ndratobwak ndra-au, ma ndra-au kede-eh, bwe. Arile, taha a buku le iri lau atehei budon tiri in ta Kindrei, idah kameh taha winiyan bamak bwe, ma taha kameh ta are le buku doh. Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha handru kili ta Kindrei ma taha kales boto-on (Kalan 11–13)

Ma i san doh kameh, buku kane iri lau badu leheleh winiyan eh, Kindrei kameh akohok iri Isra-el mari ame hamon, ma iri kameh ado mwasin i buku none ndratorowenei mene ndra-au, “Ndramak ta seben kameh asahan udu Sayon eme. Iy kameh tikahei kandriyen ta tunuhun sahou tan au a len ta lundriye Jekob oro.

Iri Juwis badu Isra-el le doh, mene adai iri propet, ma adai Laban Jises ale. Eme ma, na len idah badeh, iri amekes ndra-in eme tahi, ma tikahei ahi are bolo kon mara-ei, ma iri tebelese ta kandriyen nane Kindrei aso-ok labai. Handru, iri badeh, asahan lau ta amekes bahun ili ta lau marakon,
Buku taha ndratanan sahou handru ta Krais, arile udu ja, budon tataha boto-on labai anya kili hamon tiri kandriyen ndra-in, taha winiyan bamekes ari salom ta sikine iri kandriyen ndra-in iu ja bwe.
Kindrei mene mete-ei taha ame awas ja hawe Krais Jises. Ma ta Krais le badeh, Kindrei aso-ok taha katondrok iri lakou marakon udu kandrah, hawe Krais.
Eme ya, aha sasehek sahou wasai ja ai. Aha kasehek le sahou handru kili tiri mwan ma badih, tasah aha ado bada ndramak ari le.

Iri aseken taha mara-ei ka-en hamon ta kandriyen tiri Juwis, arile aso banuhun se sahou ta nyala iri lau doh, bwai! Aso badeh, basekesek ta sahou tiri doh bwe. Buku aso mene ka-en hamon tiri lau ta wasai doh badeh, sebwe sahou handru nane aso ndrasehek ndrawek taha badeh, iu laleyah.
Ta katin doh le, i buku taha asehek sahou ili boho kon rakon ja, eme lau rayah tana iri bwe, taha badeh, kasolom kili ta Kindrei ta boto-on tan keme tataha ta tobolowe moso iri sahou kamwenen.
Na bolo len doh, Sol badeh, alohou ta idi iri lau ta Laban marakon kamak ka-au. Eme ma iy amwenen ili hawe batun tiri pris,
Na len dah jo ewek hawem, arile jo udu ndra kon munyak kahis, jo asehek iri lakou dah ili toro, ta sekesek tek tinan kirek ndrine oro.
Arile, aha kasekesek, tasah aha bwese iri maha-an buku none le Krais mene bwese. Ya, buku none iy eme hamon, ma nyaran i tinan, ma lomadan asahan eme lewan, aha kameh sekesek labai.
Jo anyolom ili badan badeh, jo atou iri katin haka, randrah randrah, ma hawe iri lakou ta seselek badu bada munyak, iri ndriliu ma hawe iri sirih badu rewa kandrah.

Arile, na dah badeh, aha karuwani iri kandriyen marakon doh: Aha sandra-i sala hawe iri lau rayah ja, ma samekes losen sasahan, o, ndrinem andra-i ili tiri mwan ma badih rayah ja. Ma aha sasondrokonya iri na sahou ndra-in.
Eme Pol edek ili selesen uru ma iy udu hawe uru amekes lahou ta asereh asiu balei, tasah lahou turu doh badeh i se buku lahou tan amwenen.
Eme ya, taha samokon karei ma lomondra ndra-in satondrok bada taha. Bada taha doh kameh imek le. Kora-on kandriyen ndra-in ariu budon tataha ma aha a-en hamon le ta seken ta bada taha.
Ta nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais le badeh, aso batanau iri boto-on, i buku doh: Aha kamanyah kamwenen, kamekes gok ta atondrok manyah taha.
“Eme nadu tine Josep oro ma ronoh ari badeh, mada oro alikis iy, ma oro atehei iy i ta sisih i buku bonyo-ou ili Ijip. Arile, Kindrei udu hawen,

Eme iy ari badu hawe oro badeh, nyaran Agabus, ales ere loken asehek sahou na boto-on ta Malawin Ndrabun anya, “Idah kameh, kon mari badu loboho tondrok ta Rom kameh nyamon bwe.” Idoh badeh, asahan na len Klodiyas atondrok kon).
Sahou ta Pol ano le badeh, iy atehei bwili ndru-un i andri hawe iri mari, ta adeu salom ma wurah i ta Kindrei.
Eme, are lau oro badu hawe Jises Krais badeh, ndrasani san ta kandriyen ta bada oro satondrok oro. Idoh i le buku oro ndratahi so-ok ndra-in ta bada oro kimek ki-in bada kei tondreh.
Ya, ado nadu tine, buku iri none ndra-in solo-an asahan tado, mwasin ta ado kasekesek le.
Buku taha ari ari anya, “Ndrinek udu mwasin hawe Kindrei, ma jo edek hawen handru,” arile, iy edek bolo lulik kahis le, iy badeh wasai, ma iy ba-en hamon ta sahou handru bwe.
Eme iy anyolom kandrah asak ya lakou i buku none ra-ei kolau tinan suwin ma hahuw udu kandrah eme munyak.
To badeh, badu kon munyak tinan Partiya, Midiya, ma Elam. To ale badu kon munyak tinan Mesopotemiya, Judiya, Kapadosiya, Pontus hawe Esiya.

Aru amekes salom doh, ta aha winiyan adek buku iri mwan ma badih handru ta Laban, ma iy kameh aso-ok iri kandriyen taha marakon. Ma aha kameh winiyan amekes iri gok mwasin. Eme ma, aha kameh winiyan atanan Kindrei amwenen.

Eme naduk Timoti, jo atehei sahou batanau ewek kanim. Tasah idoh amwenen le, ta sahou mene iri propet ta Kindrei mene ndrasehek ndra-au ta nyalam. Ou andrei sahou dah ki nyara beteleu tam, ta ou kameh asahan nyekelen mwasin ta bolo bahun.

Udu hamon ta lakou nane doh ano, jo anuhun nyaro lakou doh, i buku iri lau solo-an labai asehek sahou boto-on udu bolo kandrah. Boho iri i tinan labai ma iri aloh i buku doh, “Haleluyah! Tasah, Laban Kindrei tataha iy le ari mene andrei taha ame hamon. Nyaran badeh, laba tinan ma iy boto-on labai.
Bwena mene aha mwan ma badih ado buku iri lau ndramak. Tasah, aha tebelese sahou ta Kindrei, ma amekes iri kandriyen solo-an ndra-in.
Aha winiya ba-un na bwesam ta Laban ma hawe bwesam tiri malawin ndra-in i le rasan bwe. Ma aha ale winiya baimon nyamon bado bada sau ta Laban, ano bada sau tiri malawin ndra-in bwe ale.

Eme ma, kandriyen ta karei, ma lomondra ndra-in marakon, ma hawe kandriyen ta madalakis sasahan ndrokowa aha. Aha mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, kora-on aha kasihi san tiri mwan ma badih, korou sahou kewek taha amekes kandriyen i buku doh.

Ya kati tanan handru i buku doh: I buku none tekedek ta lau udu mwasin ta mada Kindrei, sasah lau beleben badeh, winiyan badai iy bwe, idoh badeh, ndra mwasin le. Arile, i buku none tekedek ta lau bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe, ma hawe iri batehei budon handru ba-en tan bwe; iri beleben sasah, arile idoh badeh, bamesekei iri bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe le. Ma laba tinan ta aliy badeh, budon toro bala mwasin ja bwe. Oro bala tana oro ndra-in udu heh bwe, hawe oro bala tana oro mwasin udu heh bwe. Eme sasah ndra-in oro amekes badeh, oro batona anya idoh ndra-in bwe. Oro anya ndra mwasin le ai.

Eme iri are anuhun iy asehek sahou badeh, mani iri atur anya, “Kede-eh iy ndramak mene udu Jerusalem idi iri lau mene aloh i ta nyaran doh i buku iy asehek kede-eh! Ma iy kede-eh eme ta ateu iri lau kala hawe iri tinan tiri pris ma iri kala bolo kou ai.”

Arile idah, Jises ndrateu gok i buku pris udu bwele-en labai tiri rayah ja. Tasah, iy ndrala buku ndramak ta ere le alih ta sahou randra le ha-un, nane Kindrei amekes hawe iri lau. Sahou randra le ha-un ja doh ere bwele-en labai ja ta sahou randra le bwena mene Kindrei edeu i ta Moses. Tasah, iri lakou mwasin asahan ta sahou tandrakan ha-un badeh, udu bwele-en labai ja tiri lakou mene asahan ta sahou tandrakan malen.
Eme ya, i buku none jo bamak bwe badeh, jo udu le hawe Krais atiye sahou tan, ya, i buku none jo kimek badeh, kameh jo akohok lakou mwasin labai ja.
Tasah, jo badeh, tanan i mwasin handru ta aliy, ta Kindrei mene mesekei lahou udu bolo ado, ma ado a lau tan, winiya le barano na len ta Krais Jises kameh eme hamon ja.

Taha tanan, buku Nadu Kindrei ndrame, ma iy ndratehei budon mwasin ndrame tataha, eme ma taha ndratanan Kindrei badeh, handru. Taha ndrahas handru hawe Kindrei uru Nadun Jises Krais. Jises badeh, Kindrei handru ma iy kati kohan ta ereu le buku doh na len mari.
Ou samekes losen sala ta ari ndramak, ndri-iy; arile i buku winiyan eh, ou manyah amunum le ado hawe iri.

Taha ndrasehek iri budon tataha ndrame len, eme ma taha atondrok iri lakou mwasin nane Kindrei anya kedeu keme tataha. Taha katawi kihis iri lakou doh, ma taha sanoh ta aliy. Tasah, taha ndratanan, lakou marakon Kindrei ndratandrakan ta amekes o edeu, idah kameh, iy bwidiy handru.
“Mondrei jo ruwani ndrado hawe ado badeh, mondrei tek amwenen. Jo badeu bala buku kon munyak edeu bwe. Aha satikisiy, aha sabudon solo-an ma aha sanoh.
Eme ma, ndri-iy ta saba lakou kameh asahan. Taha banoh ta aliy bwe. Taha tanan bada taha na idah i buku asiu taha ado aliy are kon munyak dah. Na bolo len dah, taha bado hawe Laban bare kon tan bwe.

“I buku iy are lau iy anuhun sahou tek, arile iy ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe, jo winiyan badeu maha-an bala bwele-en bwe. Jo bame ta edeu maha-an ili ta lau marakon badu kon munyak bwe; jo eme dah ta aseben iri.

Eme ma aha sa-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Ken mene mesekei, ndri-iy. Iy badeh, in hamon ta tama balik Satan, ya iy idi nadu tinen Ebol imek. Tasah handru, iy idi nadu tinen? I buku doh: Iy badeh, kandriyen tan ndra-in, ma Kindrei atehei konan i tan, arile kandriyen ta nadu tinen badeh, mwasin, ya Kindrei aso-ok labai. Eme ma, Ken ibolosen, ma iy idi nadu tinen imek.

Ya, ndroi laba tinan nane asahan badeh, ndratolomwani iri busu mara-ei udu bolo ndras laba tinan, badeh ndratuh ndra-au ndrala baha ndras. Ma iri mandrei mari ale arou ame le andri, ma atohou iu laleyah, ari madan bwe.

Handru, Abraham ndrasahan alon ai, ma iy ari nadun bwe. Ma iy ale mirihik ta imek, arile lundriyen iri badeh, ndrasahan solo-an labai, i buku le iri ndrau anya udu kandrah, ma i buku le on udu bada babi, ari ndramak winiyan bandromwei bwe.

Eme ya masiye ma tudun badeh, ki ta kabin ta udu le buku doh, ma hawe ki ta kabin ta winiyan ta ano bwe, ma hawe ki ta kabin taha batou iy bwe. Ki ta Kindrei le ari doh, masiye ma tudun ki tan kudu le buku doh. Handru!

Iy badeh, aloh boto-on labai i buku doh, “Len badeh, ndrasahan ta Kindrei aleben iri mwan ma badih mara-ei are ta mada sahou. Eme ma aha kanoh iy, ma aha katudun nyaran. Aha mara-ei badeh, katehei bwili ndru-u aha kili andri ki ta Kindrei, iy le badeh, bwidi kandrah ma munyak, hawe ndras ma mana munu iri gwa mara-ei.”

Na len doh badeh, kane iri lau nane a-en hamon ta Jises ma atehei budon tiri handru i ta Kindrei i sola le ai. Eme ma iri Juwis nane asehek boho iri Grik badu bolo iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, tebelese hawe iri Juwis rayah nane asehek boho Aramek. Iri Grik anya iri badih nyau tiri badeh, bakohok nyamon sola bwe.
Ta kandriyen doh, Kindrei ndraluhi aha, tasah Krais mene ndrabwese-ei maha-an hawe sisi-in tinan labai ta aseben aha, eme ma iy ndraleheyani san ndrame tataha, ya taha ka-en hamon ta mweleke katin.
Aso mene ado hawe ado badeh, aso atehei batanau boto-on labai ewek taha i buku doh, “Are lau, buku iy bamekes gok bwe, iy winiyan bakohok nyamon bwe.”

“Sahou doh handru, tasah Kindrei aso-ok taha lau marakon badu kon munyak tinan labai. Iy eme tikisi taha, ma iy atehei nadun mwan ari le eme tataha. Buku are lau iy atehei budon handru in tan, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe, ma kohan handru kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Arile, na len ari, iri amekes lahou toro badeh, ma malawin ndra-in tiye i toro anya, “Jises hawe Pol badeh, jo tanan uru ai, ya ado, are lau bah?”
Ano ja, jo anyolom nyabwe munyak hawe iri kabin badu kon munyak, ma iri lau tiri mara-ei ta bahun atukum ala le se ta amekes bahun hawe i ndramak nane sakaliye hos hawe iri lau tan ta bahun.

Ahi sandroh ala ndron ra-ei badu kon tinan Adramitiyum. Ndron doh anya kalakak lawe-e le bada kon tinan mara-ei loboho Esiya. Eme ma ahi alakak au a len. Ndramak ari nyaran Aristakus, badu Tesalonaika udu bolo kon munyak tinan Masadoniya badeh, udu bolo ahi ale.

Aha kabudon iri lau ta Kindrei rayah ado bolo asiu lulik. Aha kabudon iri, i buku aha ado bolo asiu lulik hawe iri ale. Aha kabudon iri lau ado ta maha-an solo-an, aha katehei aha i buku aha bwese maha-an hawe iri ale.
Lakou marakon aha amekes ma asehek badeh, aha kamekes ki-in bwele-e nyara Laban Jises, ma aha kadeu wurah kili tan, ma ta tama taha Kindrei.
Are lau akohok tanan ta ndramak ta leheya iy na sahou ta Krais, mwasin ta iy kaseben ndramak ta leheya tan na lakou mwasin tan.

Ma iy badeh, badeu se ranah munyak bala tan bwe. Arile, Kindrei badeh, tandrakan iy hawe lundriyen oro kameh, iy kameh edeu munyak i tan ma hawe lundriyen oro asahan hamon. Na len Kindrei tandrakan doh badeh, Abraham ari nadun bwe le.
Iy eme wendreyani iri lau tataha, ma amekes kandriyen ndra-in handru i ta tubu taha iri. Iy indrek iri badeh, kakeh nadu iri ma borolak le kamak ka-au.
Eme aru Pita adek ala mada lek anya kanyolom.
Eme ma, na len mari, jo aseken budon tek badeh, kaleu, ma jo ki-in hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta ere mada Kindrei, ma hawe iri lau badu munyak.

Iri lau ta karei doh badeh, bwilima tiri buku le goi laba tinan atohou ma tebeya sisoh eme le babi. Iri ale, buku ndrau udu kandrah edek ili eme, ba-en hamon ta san tan amwenen bwe. Iri lau doh badeh, Kindrei ndralowosani kon lulik labai, ta iri kameh ala are aliy ta udu le buku doh.

Jo badeh, bakohok ma banuhun sahou mwasin dah badu boho ari ndramak bwe. Ma ari ndramak baleheya sahou mwasin dah bame tek bwe. Jises Krais le amwenen badeh, leheyani jo ta iri sahou mwasin mara-ei doh.

Tasah, bwena mene, kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in badu bolo taha badeh, ndratondrokei taha. Ma batanau malen mesekei kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in doh towodau udu bolo oda taha eme loke; eme ya ta katin doh taha mene adek san ta tiyani taha ala bolo imek.
Eme ta katin doh baden adeh, jo asahan aposel ta atiye sahou, ma ta leheya iri lau badu leheleh. Ma iy atehei jo ta atiye sahou ta budon handru dah. Eme ya jo bawasai bwe, jo tiye sahou handru.

Iri lau ale anuhun sahou batanau tan, iri an hawen, ma iy in hawe iri. I buku sah handru taha winiyan atana taha, buku none sahou doh handru? Kindrei ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun ndrame la-u taha, ma Malawin Ndrabun doh leheya taha, buku none Kindrei in hawe taha.
Taha satehei budon ta aseben taha le amwenen. Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha ta aseben iri rayah ja.

Ou manyah ado le, nono-ou ndri-iy hawe iri ari ari. Ou satudun ou, ndri-iy, arile ou amekes ou badeh, ala nah nadu bwisik ala hawe iri lau nyara iri bwe. Ya ou samekes ou anya ou tanan labai, ndri-iy.
Eme ma, taha karuwani iri kandriyen ta ndrine taha ndra-in, losen, ndrinem ato-ou, sahou tebelese, sahou sondrokonya. Ma aha samekes bahun laleyah sala tiri lau.
Kindrei amwenen mene ndralebelei jo, ta jo katiye iri sahou tan marakon kewek ta aseben aha. Eme ma, jo badeh, asahan buku ndramak ta lohowa aha mwan ma badih marakon ta Kindrei.
Lami batun belen mara-ei, i buku asi kandrah, ma madan anya i buku jih.

Iri lakou ndra-in doh mene asahan tahi ta aseben aha. Udu hamon, so-ok ma tikisiy ta Kindrei andrei iri mwan ma badih solo-an labai ame hamon ja, iri kameh winiyan adeu wurah amwenen ili ta Kindrei, ma iri winiyan atudun nyaran.
Are lau iy aimon odak ma iy a-un ndrayek, iy badeh, in hawek ma jo in hawen.
Iy tiye i tan, “Ehe Laban, jo atehei budon tek in tam, tasah ou Mesaya, ma ou Nadu Kindrei. Ou le mene, Kindrei suni ou ame andri bolo kon munyak.”
Eme iri badeh, aso-ok labai ta a-en hamon ta leheya toro aposel ma atukum ta atudun hawe abo-os jabi ramen ma asolom.

Ou aso-ok kandriyen mwasin tinan labai, ou bwalem iri kandriyen ndra-in. Eme ma Kindrei tam amwenen ndranyahani ou ndrala loken labai, bwele-e oro lau tam mwasin. Ma iy mene solowei ndrelekei ta sekesek ndrawek bwele-em.”
Iy badeh, tiye ndramak tan ari ta bahun ili mwetehei Jemis, nadu tine Jon, imek na samen gwak iri aloh bainat.
Bohom sala tiri sahou ndra-in, ari moson bwe. Tasah, iri sahou doh, iri lau amekes ta ariu lau a sola ala le san ta adeu kona iri ili ta Kindrei.

Ndramak ndrinen ndra-in deh, iy bwalen nadu tinen ari ja, iy badeh, idih ta kandriyen ndra-in, buku none le iy ndradai nadu tinen ari ja ndramak. Ya aha ndratana aha, are lau ndradai nadu tinen ari ndramak badeh, iy winiyan bakohok koha Kindrei mwasin ta ereu la-un ereu le buku doh bwe.

Udu hamon ta nyamon toro ano, Jises eme ndremenya Saimon Pita, “Saimon, nadu Jon, ou kede-eh aso-ok jo tinan labai ja, toro rayah kede-eh ja nadeh?” Pita anya, “Ehe Laban, ou ndratanam jo, jo badeh, aso-ok ou tinan labai i buku ari kawas.” Jises eme tiye i tan ja, “Ou atondrok iri nadu sipsip tek.”
Taha lau rayah badeh, winiya asehek sahou ta budon. Ya iri rayah ja winiya asehek sahou ta tanan, arile iri ndramas marakon doh badu mine Malawin Ndrabun le ari.
Ano oro ala san lusan ja badeh, Josep baranyowonya, iy are lau handru barala ta nadu tinen oro ai. Ma Parou barala tanan nadu tine Josep oro ai.
Taha ndratana taha, buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh, “Are lau aso-ok kohan mwasin hamon, hawe manyah tan kudu mwasin, iy badeh, saluhe hawe iy sawasai, ndri-iy labai.
Eme iri lau ta Kindrei, budon tiri hawe ndrine iri i le ari. Iri mari badeh, bamekes ndrakok bala ta sanuw tiri bwe. Arile, iri mari badeh, anyohan lakou tiri, i tiri ari ari.

Jo ndrasehek taha ta sahou laba tinan labai, sahou nane doh jo akohok bwena. Moso sahou nane i buku doh: Krais mene imek badeh, ta talou taha ado ta kandriyen ndra-in tataha marakon ame len, i buku le ndratorowenei udu bolo buk ndrabun ta Kindrei.

Ma Kindrei anyolom kon tinan Babilon doh badeh, maha-an ndra-in labai ta adai iri propet, hawe iri mwan ma badih tan badeh, udu aliy. Ma iri mwan ma badih mara-ei badu kon munyak, ala iri lau ndra-in mene, ndradai iri ndramak badeh, bundruwe iri lakou marakon doh ale udu kon tinan Babilon le.”

Eme na len doh iri lau badu leheleh anuhun sahou doh badeh, iri sekesek ma atudun sahou ta Laban. Eme oro lau le Kindrei ndralebelei oro ta akohok koha oro ta udu le buku doh badeh, atehei budon toro handru i ta Kindrei.
Iy lau doh asehek sahou ta nyala iri lakou marakon nane anya, “Ehe, jo kameh ewek, nawin bwe!” Handru! Laban Jises, ou ame!

Eme ya saba lakou le mene ado ndratou jo ndramekes, ya ado ndratanan ta aliy, ado katehei ki ta lahou ma kamekes. Ya, i buku none ado amekes kameh, Kindrei, ndramak ta edeu tataha kandriyen ta ado le, kameh udu hawe ado aseben ado.
Arile, aha sabudon kaliu tiri udu bwele-e aha, ndri-iy. Aha badeh, kabatanau iri, ki buku nadu tine aha iri handru.

Ya, aha katondrok aha kamwenen. Kora-on iri lau rayah kadeu sahou laleyah, ma sahou yoyou kewek taha ta iri budon solo-an ta aha ka-en hamon ta aliy. Ma iri kameh kawendreyani aha ta sahou dah, ma aha kameh anuhun boho iri. Iri lau doh badeh, akohok tanan ta tubu iri, ma tiri malawin ndra-in ale atondrok iri lakou badu kandrah, ma kon munyak. Iri tanan sahou ta Krais bwe.
Winiya le jo barasos, ya Kindrei le kameh baradeu lakou doh barame tek, na len iy aloh taha ala hawe Krais Jises.

Iy le badeh, atehei iy imek i saluwe taha ta akunoh taha ta lakou ndra-in taha amekes, ma sikinei taha amwenen mara-ei, ma mesekei taha asahan lau tan handru, ma mesekei taha anya kamekes kandriyen mwasin le.

“Handru labai, jo katiye tado: Are lau iy anuhun sahou tek ma iy atehei budon in ta iy nane suni jo eme, kohan handru kameh winiyan bano bwe, iy kameh ta udu le buku doh. Iy winiyan bala ta mada sahou bwe. Iy ndrasakalawi imek, ma iy akohok kohan handru.
Iy angelo nane asehek sahou eme tek badeh, tawi bala kei ari nyikilikin labai, udu minen ta tumundroh tinan ta kon tinan doh, ma kou hawe kowah awudi kon tinan nane doh.

Eme ya sendrehendreh tiri badeh, Kindrei le kameh anuhun sahou tiri ma tiye iri ala bolo jih ta udu le buku doh. Tasah, Kindrei tiye tiri ta amekes kandriyen mwasin, arile bwai. Iri a-en hamon ta budon ndra-in ta ndrine iri ala amekes kandriyen ndra-in ta bwilima. Eme bwili iri sama ta aliy? Iri badeh, masiye iri ja ta aliy, i tiri ari ari. Budon tiri badeh, idih labai ta lakou badu munyak.

Iy ale winiyan batondrok lau ta Kindrei bwe, buku iy barasahan lau ta Kindrei ai, bwe kameh, budon ta atudun iy kameh i tinan ma idah kameh iy anya, iy le. Ya, buku none iy amekes i buku aliy, idah kameh iy akohok maha-an kameh i le buku balik.

Wurah lomada ado kawas tek, jo ndrabwetenei ta atorou la-ukei ewek, ta tiye nyala aha ta gok, Kindrei mene amekes ta akohok taha mari. Arile, nadah ja badeh, jo abudon ta atorou sahou randra ja ewek taha i buku doh: Aha kabadok ta aseben ma atondrok iri budon handru, Kindrei mene ndratehei ndrame tataha lau tan. San rasan le, Kindrei mene atehei budon doh, eme tataha mwan ma badih tan.

Ya ndrine iri badeh, ibolosen i toro aposel. Tasah, oro badeh, leheya iri lau ta nyala Jises Krais ndramak ndrame awas ja ta imek tan, eme ma iri lau mari ale kameh winiyan amak ame awas ja ta imek tiri.
Suhuye iri kandriyen ndra-in tan mara-ei badeh, ili isos kandrah, eme ma Kindrei bwetenei iri kandriyen ndra-in mara-ei ta kon doh.
Jises edek eme hamon eme Kana loboho Galili. Loboho doh mene iy tubuni gwa asahan ili waen ja udu aliy. Iy udu kon tinan Kapena-um badeh, ndramak ari ta atondrok, nadun ibo sik in andri.
Ou saliliy ma ou sawoyah ta amekes lahou ta Laban. Arile ou alelei Malawin Ndrabun aseben ou amekes lahou le kili.

Handru, aha mara-ei badeh, batou Jises bwe le, arile aha aso-ok iy labai, eme ma na idah, aha batou iy bwe le, arile aha atehei ndrine aha ma budon taha mara-ei, ma sekesek taha laba tinan labai in tan. Sekesek doh badeh, sakalawi iri sekesek mari badu kon munyak mara-ei, ya taha winiyan basehek na boho taha bwe-en!
I buku sah handru taha kameh atana taha, buku taha an hawe Kindrei? Ya Kindrei in hawe taha? Taha atana taha, tasah iy ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun ndrame la-u taha.

Kun ari, waen titi-in udu bolon udu mirihik ta kei tondreh tan. Iri lau ta bahun andrei konyei, oro tolomwani i bolo waen titi-in nane doh, ano oro atehei ili no-o kei ari, iri aloh hisop. Ma oro adeu ili bohon.
Ma iy ndratolowei taha are mine balik ndrame len, ma iy ndratehei taha ndrala bahandra tondrok ta nadun Jises Krais, iy aso-ok iy labai.

Ya eme aha nadu tine, jo tiye sahou batanau doh ewek taha i buku doh: Aha badeh, mada aha kaleu tiri lau ta orou bolo lau andra-i ma ano lau aseker. Iri lau doh ta leheya tanan ta wasai bamwenen ta leheya mene aha ndrakohok bwe. Iri kameh aluwi aha rayah kameh ame len ta leheya handru mene. Aha kateleya oro;
Ya, i buku none iy tan ta anyo-ou iri lau ta Kindrei badeh, iy kanyo-ou oro kudu mwasin; ya, i buku none iy tan tanan ta leheya bolo budon ta sahou ta Kindrei badeh, iy kaleheya iri lau kudu mwasin.
