Buku len doh asahan, ado kameh bandremenya jo ta saba lakou ja bwai. Jo tiye tado handru. Tama kameh edeu tado iri saba lakou ado aso-ok, buku ado ndremenya iy in ta bwele-e nyarak.

Mwe-e ndru ta kon tinan doh badeh, ma ronoh la-uh, ma Kindrei nyosowani mwe-e ndru ari ari doh na iri bek, randrah, randrah sowa iri laba tinan labai. Mwe-e ndru ma bwena badeh, iy nyosowaniy na bek jaspa, ano bek sapaya iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru la-uh na aliy, bek aget iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru taloh na aliy, ano bek emeral iy nyosowani mwe-e ndru hahuw na aliy.
Aha kabudon kamwenen, buku aha ndratanan ta kandriyen mwasin aha anya kamekes, arile aha bamekes bwe, badeh, aha ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in kabwe.

Ano, nyaro boho ndramak ari udu loboho bada koyeu ta Kindrei asehek i buku doh, “Aha lohowan ta Kindrei, aha katudun iy, aha hawe iri mwan ma badih nyara iri tinan, ma aha lau nyara aha bwe, ma aha anoh iy. Aha mari badeh, katudun nyara Kindrei le ari!”
Taha badeh, ndrawoyah ta bada taha nane kada-an ai. Eme ma, taha tikisiy labai ta anya kakohok bada taha badu kandrah doh, kasini kili bwele-e taha i buku ndramak isin awin in bwele-en.
Ndramak ari ari kanyolom kandriyen tan kamwenen labai. Ya, i buku none kandriyen tan mwasin, iy le kasekesek ta lakou mwasin nane, iy amekes. Ya, iy sanyolom iy sala ta lakou, ndramak ari ja amekes.

Buku ndramak loweu ma badih bihin, lowa uru amekes san turu ta atasou. Uru amekes budon i le ari, ta uru sala tasou op. Arile, iy ndramak mwan abudon anya iy winiyan batondrokei kandriyen tan bwe, ma so-ok tan tinan labai ta iy ki tasou suwi, ma budon tan boto-on labai ta amadin hawe badih; mwasin ta iy ki-in hamon ta budon hawe tanan tan. Ndra-in ma sahou ta aliy bwe, uru ka turu le kabwe.
Iri kameh tikahei aha au ala manan ta asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis. Ano ma len asahan ta are lau iy idi aha amak, abudon anya, iri amekes gok doh ta atudun nyara Kindrei.

Udu ja badeh, jo anyolom lakou ari laba tinan labai asahan bolo kandrah, ma jo abudon solo-an labai ta aliy. Jo badeh, anyolom oro angelo ma ndro taloh, tawi lakou ma ndro taloh ndra-in labai doh udu mine oro ta amekes maha-an laba tinan ili tiri mwan ma badih. Hamon ta lakou doh ano, ari winiyan basahan ja bwai. Idoh ndrano mara-ei ai. Tasah, ta oro lakou ma ndro taloh ndra-in nane doh badeh, losen ta Kindrei kameh ano mara-ei, ma iy kameh winiyan bamekes bundruwe aliy ja bwai.

Jises eme asumon sahou tan ja, “Ya, i buku jo ndrasehek saba sahou bamwenen bwe, abo, jo aso-ok ou tiye tiri lau marakon nane ado kada-ah ta saba sahou handru jo asehek. Arile, i buku jo asehek sahou amwenen eh? Ya tasah handru ou a-um jo?”

Ehe, ou en, Sisikos, tasah nyaram badeh, moson ndramak ta lahou badu hawek. Jo aseken ou ala aseben budon turu badih ma la-uh badeh, ma ou tiye turu sasobobo uru. Tasah, uru mene are hawek aseben jo ta atiye sahou mwasin. Uru ma la-uh doh mene hawe Klemen ma oro lau rayah aseben jo ta amekes lahou; oro doh mene Kindrei ndratorowenei nyara oro mari ndra bolo buk tan hawe nyara iri lau kameh koha iri udu le buku doh.
Iri mwan ma badih mene ale adai ma bwidi ndraye iri lau ma hawe iri propet tam amou. Eme ma ou atehei ndraye iri lau badeh, ili wa-i iri. Eme ma iri akohok bundruwe ndra-in tiri amwenen.”
Bwe handru en! Taha badeh, buku lau ndramak, ma taha ndraruwani kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Eme ma, i buku sah handru, ya taha amekes kandriyen doh ili le gwek ai?

Ya, nyabwe munyak doh mene udu aliy, arile nadah ja badeh, iy bado kede-eh ja bwai, iy kameh asahan, buku kabin ma ndru la-uh. Iy badu le hawe oro kabin ma ndro taloh nane bwena, arile iy kameh amai iu mara-ei.

Arile, sahou bolo buk ndrabun tiye i buku doh, “Ou tikahei badih ta bonyo-ou ma nadun uru ka-au. Tasah, nadu badih ta bonyo-ou kameh, winiyan bakohok se lakou badu mine taman bwe. Nah le badu ndrine udun amwenen badeh, bonyo-ou bwe. Iy kameh akohok lakou mari.”

Arile, i buku none iri lau anya ka-en hamon tiri lau lakou tiri solo-an, ya kasahan i buku iri. Badeh kameh, iri taku ma arah are bolo kandriyen ta madalakis, ma iri kameh bale iri bwe, ma hawe amekes nono-ou laleyah ta aliu iri le, ma iri taku andra-i handru.

Ya, ou ndratou kasoh ma ronoh doh, oro marakon doh hawe nyabwe munyak kameh amekes bahun i ta badih laba tinan ta karei. Ya, oro kameh bokoro-ei iy ma andrei iri lakou solo-an tan, ma tarani awin udu badan mari iu. Ma oro kameh ani odan, ma sulumwi iy mara-ei i jih andrakak iu.
Arile Kindrei le ari tanan labai, are lau aso-ok iy handru.

Sendrehendreh ta aliy taha kasehek ki buku sah bah? Sebwe taha lau badu Juwis badeh, are mwasin labai ja tiri lau mwan ma badih rayah ja nadeh? Bwe handru en! Tasah, taha mene ndrasehek, iri Juwis hawe iri lau badu leheleh mari badeh, ado bahandra tondrok ta kandriyen ndra-in mari.

Na len doh badeh, iri mesekei sukumada lakou ari asahan i buku nadu bulumakau. Eme iri atiye lakou i nyara salom eme ta asun i tan, ma iri amekes tine nyamon ta atudun lakou iri amekes na mine iri doh.

Iri lau mwan ma badih rayah ma buruwen bamak ta lakou ndra-in nane bwe, iri ale badeh, batubuni ndrine iri bwe, ma batehei kona iri bala tiri lakou, iri nane amekes na mine iri amwenen bwe le. Ya, iri ale baruwani kandriyen ta atudun malawin ndra-in bwe, ma hawe iri kindrei ta wasai, iri amekes na bek nyikilikin, ma silba hawe bras, ma bek hawe kei. Iri lakou marakon doh badeh, winiyan banuhun sahou bwe, iri banyolom kon bwe, ma iri winiyan badek bwe.

Taha ndratanan, hamon kameh Krais aleben iri lakou marakon taha amekes mwena ndra-au. Eme ma taha anoh tinan labai, eme ma ahi amekes gok ta ariu budon tiri mwan ma badih katehei budon tiri kili le ta sahou mwasin. Kindrei badeh, tanan budon tataha ma iy tanan ndrine taha handru. Eme ma, ahi atehei budon tahi i buku doh: Aha mwan ma badih badu kon Korin tanan, ahi bamekes kandriyen ta wendreya bawek taha bwe.

Taha marakon mene badeh, asahan buku iri mwan ma badih doh, ma taha an ndra hamon ta so-ok ndra-in ta budon tataha malen. Ya, taha ndra-en hamon tiri lakou marakon, bada taha ma budon tataha anya kamekes. Taha ado buku le aliy, ma taha kameh winiyan akohok ndramas ndra-in doh, buku iri mwan ma badih rayah ba-en hamon ta Kindrei bwe.
Pita asehek sahou batanau i toro ma indrek oro anya, “Ado badeh, katondrok ado kamwenen, kora-on ado kala bolo maha kameh eme la-u iri lau ndra-in ado munyak dah.”

Tasah, i buku none aha katehei manyah taha mari badu bolo oda aha mari ki mine karei ma lomondra ndra-in, idah kameh, aha amak; arile i buku none aha katehei Malawin Ndrabun kasebenei aha katikahei karei ma lomondra ndra-in badu bolo oda aha ki-iu, idah kameh, aha winiyan bamak bwe, aha kameh ado le buku doh.
I le buku none buk ndrabun mene ndrasehek anya, “Are lau atehei budon tan handru in tan kameh iy winiyan bani bwilima bwe.”
Ma mwena handru jo edeu wurah i ta Kindrei tek i san ta Jises Krais ewek taha mari, tasah lau mari badu kon munyak asehek anya, aha badeh, ndratehei budon taha handru ndra-en ta Jises Krais.
Aha nadu tine aso, aso tanan buku Kindrei tikisi aha mari tinan labai, eme ma iy aloh aha ta asahan nadun amwenen.

Bwele-e lakou mari badu munyak, aha katehei kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari ja ta Kindrei kereu bwena. Tasah, kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari ja badeh, tubuluhiy ma sakalawi kandriyen ndra-in mari, ma mesekei aha mani kandriyen ndra-in tiri.

Iri atilik nyala iri ano, eme ma nyala iri ndra le randra, ta aso kakohok ndron ta ala kon tinan Rom udu bolo munyak tinan Itali. Iri ame atehei Pol ili hawe iri lau rayah ja nane badu bolo asiu lulik, i mine tinan ari nyaran Juliyus. Iy ta atondrok iri lau ta bahun, kane iri ma rinek (100). Iy badu hawe iri lau ta bahun ta Sisa amwenen.

Iri badeh, ayah wari ta Moses, lohowan ta Kindrei torowenei, ma wari wariye Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei, i buku doh, “Laban, ou Kindrei, ou tawi iri boto-on mara-ei. Iri gok mara-ei ou amekes, iri laba tinan labai, ma ahi ale anyolom, ma ahi abudon solo-an labai! Ou badeh, kabin ta boho kamen tiri mwan ma badih mara-ei, ma kandriyen tam badeh, amwenen mara-ei, ma handru labai!

Taha tana taha ta iri nah nadu bwisik badeh, anya ka-un le sur ta tine iri. Aha ka buku none le iri nah bwisik aso-ok sahou mwasin ta Kindrei, ta aseben aha ta ateh na len mari. Ya sahou tan doh bamalin ba-en bolo sahou ta wasai badu munyak dah bwe, sahou doh kameh mesekei aha ado mwasin hawen.

Ma jo anuhun boho ndramak ari udu kandrah asehek sahou i buku doh, “Ou atorou sahou ki buku doh: Iri mwan ma badih atehei budon tiri mara-ei in ta Laban, ma iri ndramak ta aliy, nadah, ma na len eme kahis, iri badeh, kasekesek!” Malawin Ndrabun ale asehek, “Ya, iri kameh ruwani lahou boto-on tiri, iri mene amekes, ma iri amunyau ta aliy. Iri bame dah laleyah bwe. Kandriyen mwasin mene iri amekes, idoh kameh ili hawe iri ale ili kandrah.”

Tasah, kandriyen ta lau ta Kindrei badeh, amwenen mara-ei, ma ari lomondra ndra-in bado budon ta tama taha Kindrei bwe, i buku doh: Taha badeh, kabudon ma katondrok iri nah, tama iri ma tine iri ndramak, ma hawe iri badih, udu iri ndramak, ma kaseben iri ta bwese maha-an tiri. Ya, lakou ari ale i buku doh, taha badeh, kantondrok tekedek tataha kamwenen, idah kameh kandriyen badu kon munyak winiyan baruwi taha bala bolo ndraka-an bwe.
Jo amekes sahou dah, tasah jo baso-ok ta lau rayah kameh wendreya aha ta iri sahou ta atamar ma aha kameh winiyan ba-en hamon ta sahou rayah ta Kindrei bwe.

Ano badeh, jo anyolom iri lakou mara-ei ma mulin udu kandrah, udu bwele-e munyak, udu bahandra munyak, udu ndrahune iri lau ndramak ndrasu-u, ma udu bwele-e ndras. Iri lakou mara-ei doh badeh, jo anuhun iri ayah wari i buku doh: “Kindrei manyah udu bada koyeu ta kabin, ma hawe Nadu Sipsip tan. Uru winiyan akohok wurah, ma nyara uru i tinan mara-ei. Ma sekesek hawe boto-on mari ta ere le buku doh winiyan bano bwe!”

Iy angelo ma mwena nane doh ano, iy ari ja udu hamon tan eme len oloh ndrah tan ja. Eme ma lakou ari i buku mandrei laba tinan anya buku jih ma atohou ales iu ili bolo ndras. Eme ma, buku ndras mara-ei apou i taloh, ndras ranah ma buruwen asahan i ndra.

ma aluwi iy eme len ta kon tinan, ma orou iy na bek. Ya iri lau nane amekes sahou wendreya, ta adeu Stiben i ta sahou, badeh, talou awin tiri iu, ya iri akahei ili udu kati iy ndramak loweu ari, nyaran Sol.
Ma buk ndrabun tiye ale i buku doh, “Aha lau mari badu leheleh katudun Laban, Ma hawe aha lau mari kayah wari ta atudun iy.”

Taha mara-ei winiyan bwe! Tasah, lakou mari asahan badeh, iy le amekes; Iy asehek na le bohon badeh, lakou asahan i le buku aliy; Ma iy amekes iri lakou mara-ei badeh, tan le ari. Ya ta katin le doh badeh, taha lau mari katudun iy kudu le buku doh. Handru! Pol asehek ta kandriyen iri mwan ma badih atehei budon tiri handru in ta Krais badeh, iri kamekes (Kalan 12:1–15:13)
Udu len ari ja, Jon anyolom Jises edek ales eme hawen, ma iy aloh, “Kede-eh Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei, iy le adeh andrei taha ame len ta kandriyen ndra-in badu kon munyak.

Rahap, iy badih ari ta bada belei, arile iy atehei budon tan boto-on handru in ta Kindrei, iy eme aseben uru lau la-uh badu Isra-el mene ala anya kanyolom saba lakou handru udu bolo kon Jeriko. Eme ma iy bamak bwe, bala buku iri lau nane banuhun boho Kindrei bwe.

Iy ndramak ta bahana, iy winiyan bame laleyah bwe, iy eme badeh, ta bahana iri sipsip ma ta adai iri marakon amak au. Jo eme dah badeh, ta edeu koha iri udu luluwen. Ma koha iri winiyan bapwe bwe, idah kameh udu luluwen labai.

Arile, kon tataha handru badeh, bado kon munyak dah bwe; kon tataha handru badeh, udu bolo kandrah. Ya eme taha abe-en ndramak ta aseben taha ta kandriyen ndra-in mene, ala Laban Jises Krais udu doh kameh eme.
Eme ya aha kaseken nadu tine aha oro ari ari, i buku none Krais mene aseken aha; ma idah kameh winiyan mesekei iri lau atudun Kindrei.

Ya, ou ala hawe oro ala bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma ado kamekes kandriyen ta Kindrei ta amekes ado kasahan ha-un ta mada Kindrei. Ma ou asih lakou toro ta asun i ta salom, ta oro winiyan asik batu oro. I buku ou amekes i buku doh, iri kameh anyolom ou amekes amwenen handru i buku le kandriyen tiri Juwis. Ma iri kameh winiyan batehei budon tiri ba-en ta sahou, iri anuhun lau rayah mene amekes ewek tam.

Iy ale badeh, tama iri lau rayah asan ku-i iri. Iri basani ku-i iri laleyah bwe, iri ale anyolom san tubu iri Abraham edek aliy. Ya iri ka le buku iy katehei budon tiri handru ki ta Kindrei i buku none mene na len basani iy bwe.
Ano oro asoh nyek. Eme nyek ihis ta Matiyas. Ya eme iy ili hawe oro aposel ma ronoh ari nane dah.
“Ou are lau ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ou badeh, sekesek, tasah Kindrei ndrasikine kandriyen ndra-in doh ndra-au. Handru, iy badeh, ndrasokosowei kandriyen ndra-in tam ndra-au.
Uru lau tek ma la-uh doh kameh, i buku kei olip ma lu-ei, ma ndru-u sun ma la-uh ales udu bwena ta mada Laban atondrok kon munyak mara-ei.

Buku aha ame mirihik ta Kindrei badeh, ndrine aha katikisiy, ma aha kaden handru ta kandriyen ndra-in nane aha ndramesekei. Aha are lau mwan ma badih ehe-en na idah, aha katubuni ehe-en kasahan ki ndrelen ja, ya sekesek ja badeh, kili ta tikisiy.

Kawas tek mwasin, wurah lomadam. Ou sa-en hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in nane iy amekes, ou a-en le hamon ta kandriyen mwasin. Are lau amekes kandriyen mwasin, iy badeh, ta Kindrei handru. Arile, are lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iy badeh, tanan Kindrei bwe.

Ano badeh, barasan ku-in i nyara kalem ta leheya buku Kindrei ndraloh iy ndramak mwasin ta madan. Tasah, iy atehei budon tan handru bwena, ya kandriyen ta asan ku-i taha badeh, udu hamon labai. Ya eme Abraham asahan tama iri lau mari iri an hamon ta san ta budon handru. Handru, iri basan ku-i iri ba-au bwe, arile Kindrei aloh iri lau mwasin mara-ei ta madan.
Tasah, are lau imek hawe Krais badeh, iy ndrano ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ma iri kandriyen ndra-in winiyan batondrok iy ja bwe.
Na len marakon, iri lakou abo gok ta adai ahi amak buku Jises mene imek. Arile, ahi bamak bwe le. Idoh leheya iri mwan ma badih buku Jises ale udu ndra awas kahis, ma atondrok ahi.
Tasah, iri lau mari anyolom le, i le bada lakou le ta aseben iri, ya iri babudon lahou ta Jises Krais bwe.

Abraham ndrasahan alon kabwe, ma Sara ale winiyan bato-ou nah bwe, arile Abraham atehei budon tan mara-ei handru udu ta Kindrei le ari, iy ta amekes iri lakou marakon badeh, in hamon le tiri tandrakan tan mwena. Eme ma Sara tuwi nadun mwan.
Idah badeh, budon tan, iy suni jo eme ta jo samani iri lau nane iy ndraleheyani iri ndrame tek. Buku len hamon, jo kameh kamete-ei iri ja.

Kindrei tataha badeh ari le. Iy badeh, tama taha mari. Iy bwidi iri lakou marakon ma taha tan amwenen. Jises Krais le ari badeh, iy Laban tataha. Iri lakou marakon iy amekes, iy le badeh, edeu kohan eme tataha.

Arile, bwe. Timoti mene ewek udu hawe aha, iy eme hamon, ma na le nane iy barasahan hawe aso ja ai. Ma iy asehek nyala aso, ta iri sahou mwasin le. Iy asehek eme taso i buku doh: Aha badeh, atehei budon taha mari in ta sahou mwasin, ma aha a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta aso-ok handru iri lau rayah ja badeh, kahis le. Iy asehek ale, anya, len mari badeh, aha abudon aso, ma aha sekesek ta len aha abudon aso. Ma aha aso-ok ta anyolom aso, i buku aso ale anya kanyolom aha ale.

Buku none aha amekes kandriyen doh bolo len mari, ya ndramak tinan handru ta atondrok sipsip asahan, aha kameh akohok ndramasi aha mwasin labai, i buku none le iri lau abo nyorei ta sakaliye, akohok ndramasi iri, buku none iri sakalawi iri lau mari, ma ano bwena. Ndramasi iri lau ta sakaliye doh kameh andra-i, ma amai iu, arile ndramasi aha doh badeh, winiyan bandra-i bwe-en.
Ehe, atondrok lakou doh kameh ta ere le buku doh. Eme ma, bwili ahi winiyan bama ta atiye sahou mwasin doh bwe.

Arile, iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai doh badeh, i buku iri lakou bondriliu. Iri balomondra bale iri bwe, ma iri amekes lakou le ta bada iri aseken ta aliy. Ya iri katin haka doh badeh, kadai iri ta nyamon. Eme ya iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai badeh, i buku le iri. Iri balomondra bale iri ta bolo sehek sahou tiri ta bobose ta lakou iri bala tanan bolon i buku sah, bwe. Ya eme ta kandriyen ndra-in iri amekes doh kameh, iri akohok maha-an ma iri kameh amak ta aliy.

Iy asehek sahou doh, arile iy babudon ta iri lau nane tiri lakou bwe. Tasah iy ndramak ari ta bahana, iy ta atondrok kohoya luk toro ale; iy akohok ta aseben iy amwenen ta saba lakou iy atehei udu bolo kohei doh.

Eme ya, taha ndratana taha, ma taha atehei budon boto-on in ta tikisiy hawe seken ta Kindrei eme tataha. Kindrei badeh, kati lahou handru ta aso-ok lau mari, ya buku none are lau aso-ok nadu tinen ari ja, iy kameh ereu hawe Kindrei, ma Kindrei ereu hawen.
Ya oro lau ta budon handru i ta Kindrei mene aseker ta iri mene adai Stiben badeh, iri rayah aseker ala kon munyak tinan Ponisiya, ma busu Saipres ma kon tinan Antiyok atiye sahou i tiri Juwis le.

Arile, a-en hamon ta Kindrei badeh, bamekes ou akohok lakou solo-an bwe. I buku none ou tam lakou solo-an, o lakou solo-an bwe oh, badeh ou sekesek ta aliy le ai. Ya sekesek tam doh kameh sakalawiy, ou tam lakou solo-an ja.

Eme ma Kindrei alelei ili le tan ta amekes bahun hawe iri mwan ma badih nane a-en hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei, ma adi iri amak ma ta atondrok kon tiri. Ma iy akohok boto-on ta asahan kabin ta boho kamen mara-ei are kon munyak, ma iri lau bada iri randrah, randrah, ma iri boho kon rakon rakon badu kon munyak, ma iri lau badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei.

Arile, buku none aha banuhun sahou tiri lau an bwena taha bwe, ma aha abo gok na budon taha amwenen, ya buku none iri ka-um aha, ki buku sah handru? Buku none aha bamekes bahun bala hamon tiri bwe, buku sah? Kindrei kameh sekesek ta kandriyen taha nane, deh bwe? Sebwe, bwe nadeh! Aha kameh bwese maha-an ta kandriyen ndra-in taha amwenen, arile buku none aha amekes kandriyen mwasin buku Kindrei aso-ok, ya iri a-um aha, ma aha akohok maha-an ta aliy, badeh mwasin. Kindrei aso-ok kandriyen nane aha a-en hamon ta aliy.

Ta katin le doh, Jises ere le alih ta amekes sahou randra le ha-un doh abadok. Iy ndramak ta akunoh taha lau ame hamon ja, ma tolowei iri ndra-in marakon iri mene amekes mwena udu ndra bada sahou randra le ma bwena mene udu aliy kahis. Iy amekes tiri le lau nane Kindrei aloh iri, ta iri winiyan an hamon tan, ma ta iri winiyan akohok kohan doh mwena mene Kindrei tiye ta edeu ili ta nadun iri, ma ta iri kameh are mwasin ta udu le buku doh.
Taha katiye ki buku sah bah? Taha kamekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ta Kindrei leheya tikisiy tan ili tinan le gwek ai?

Ma aha ale samekes sahou ndra-in, ma sahou konen bwe, ma sahou nyorei ndra-in. Idoh bamwenen bwe. Ndri-iy labai! Kindrei ndraruwi aha ndrame len ta kandriyen ndra-in, eme ma aha kadeu wurah kili tan, ta iy talawei aha are mine iri kandriyen doh.

Jo anyolom ja, ma jo atou hos ari badan nyokowan. Ya ndramak ari manyah udu bwele-en, nyaran Imek. Ano hos ari udu mirihik tan eme ja, ma ndramak ari manyah udu bwele-en badeh, nyaran Jih, o, Ndrahune Iri Lau Ndrasu-u. Iri atehei boto-on i turu ta tukumwi iri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak ranah ma buruwen ala le se ta adai iri. Uru adai iri mwan ma badih ma lunoh limeh (25) badu bolo rinek (100) rakum rakum badu bolo kon munyak. Iri amekes doh badeh, na samen gwak raho, iri aloh bainat, ma son hawe iri sik solo-an ta adai lau amak, ma iri lakou bondriliu badu kon munyak ta adai lau solo-an ano au.

Eme ya, Kindrei kameh edeu lakou mene iy tandrakan i ta Abraham kameh i tare lundriyen oro le atehei budon toro handru in tan. Ya eme Kindrei kameh tikisi oro ma edeu lakou tan mari i toro laleyah le. Bala toro le are baha batanau malen, ma hawe bala toro are atehei budon toro handru i buku Abraham le, bwe. I toro ma lubuk. Tasah, iy badeh, tama taha mari.
Iri lau tinan badu Rom ndremenya jo, ma anuhun sahou tek, ma iri anya katalou jo ki-iu laleyah, tasah iri basilahei ari ndra-in jo amekes ta adai jo kimek bwe.
Ya eme Kindrei lebelei lau badeh, ba-en hamon ta seken ta ndramak, ma hawe ba-en hamon ta lahou bwe; arile idoh badeh, na tikisiy ta Kindrei le.

Taha samekes iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei, i buku le iri lau rayah bwena mene amekes. Eme na bolo len ari, lau nyaran bwe (23,000) badeh, amak. Jo bwalek aha samekes iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei i buku doh.

arile jo ja anyolom kandriyen randrah ja amekes lahou udu bolo odak mari, ya kandriyen doh akek eme hawe bar tek ta lomondra mwasin. Eme ma kandriyen doh sawei jo udu baha boto-on ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in sokoro-ei bolo odak mari.

Ta idoh, taha sasehek ja ta iri leheya mwasin taha ndrakohok ma bwena mene ta nyala Krais. Arile, na dah taha kala ta leheya tiri lau-en le ai. Taha sala hamon ja tiri lakou mene taha ndrakohok tanan tiri. Iri lakou doh: ta mani kandriyen ndra-in ili san ta imek; ma ta atehei budon in ta Kindrei;

Kora-on iri rayah taha kanyolom iy i buku ari ndramak laleyah, ma iri katehei kona iri ki tan. Aha kabwidi ndrinen kudu mwasin, ma aha kaseben iy ta san. Eme ma, iy kameh winiyan eme hamon eme hawek ja. Jo hawe iri lau rayah ta Kindrei atondrok iy ado kada-ah.

Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, buku ari taha anya, “Jo atehei budon tek mara-ei badeh, in le ta Jises Krais,” arile iy badeh, bamekes kandriyen mwasin ma ba-en hamon ta budon handru bwe, eme budon handru ta i ndramak doh badeh, ari moson bwe. Sebwe iri budon handru buku doh badeh, winiyan basebenei ndramak ales udu mada sahou ta Kindrei hamon kameh eme bwe.
Lau rayah badu Jerusalem lelen, “Sebwe iy ndramak kede-eh iri anya kadi iy kimek a nadeh?
Ano iy aluhi kohan ili bwele-e oro, ma iy anya, “Malawin Ndrabun ndrawek bolo ndrine ado.

Ya eme iri bala tanan ta saba san handru Kindrei aloh iri lau mwasin mara-ei ta madan bwe. Ma eme iri amekes na budon ma boto-on tiri laleyah, ya eme iri batehei iri bala baha Kindrei baloh iri mwasin ta madan bwe.

Buku are lau, iy atehei budon tan handru in ta Nadu Kindrei, iy ndramak doh, sahou handru ta Kindrei doh badeh, udu ndrinen. Are lau, iy batehei budon tan handru ba-en ta Kindrei bwe, iy ta tebelese, ma aloh Kindrei ta wasai, tasah iy batehei budon tan ba-en ta sahou, Kindrei asehek ta nyala nadun bwe.

Jo tiye tado handru, are lau iri atehei budon tiri marakon eme le tek, idah kameh iri amekes iri gok i buku le gok jo amekes. Ehe, ma gok iri amekes idah kameh udu mwasin labai ja ta iri gok jo ndramekes. Tasah, jo kameh ilih hawe tama.
Ano ou leheya iri bonyo-ou badeh, kanuhun are lau iri are bahan ta bolo lahou mari, ma oro kamekes iy kasekesek, ya oro sasehek iy.

Aha katondrok aha kamwenen, kora-on aha katehei kona aha kili ta tikisiy ta Kindrei mene edeu eme tataha. Tasah, kora-on ari mwan, o, ari badih kamekes kandriyen ndra-in kili buku doh, ma katehei maha-an kewek taha, ma aha kamekes kandriyen ndra-in kili ta budon ta Kindrei. Iri mwan, o iri badih doh, i buku ra-ei kei ato-ou salin nyakadan, ma iy kameh kabwidi kandriyen tiri lau ta Kindrei solo-an labai kandra-i.
Nyaran badeh, ki mwasin ta ndranye lau mari. Ya, ki buku none bwe, badeh kameh iy akohok bwilima ma balik kameh sawei iy.
Handru, bada taha marakon ari le ta Krais. Arile, iy anyohan taha ari, ari na ndramas laba tinan labai ta i le winiya taha ari, ari ta amekes gok tan,
Ano, angelo ari ja ili solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e ndras. Eme ma gwa ndras asahan i buku ndraye ndramak imek, eme ma iri lakou mara-ei, bwisik ma tinan, are bolo ndras, mara-ei amak.

Kora-on aha amekes gok mwasin udu bolo len, iri ales ta anyolom aha ta andrek iri. Ma hamon iri banyolom aha bwe, aha kameh ajos ta gok. Aha badeh, kasahan buku bonyo-ou ta Krais, ma kamekes gok boto-on na len marakon. Ta kandriyen doh, aha kameh a-en hamon ta so-ok ta Kindrei ta ndrine aha.

Arile, aha kasumon sahou tiri kamunum, idoh kandriyen mwasin. Ma budon taha kudu mwasin ale. Ya, buku none iri aluhe, ma adeu bwilima ewek taha, tasah aha amekes kandriyen mwasin ta nyara Krais, hamon kameh iri lau nane amekes ndra-in ewek taha, bwili iri kameh ama.

Budon ta tama badeh, iy aso-ok lau marakon kanyolom kili le ta nadun, ma iri katehei budon tiri kili le ta nadun. Idah kameh koha iri winiyan bano bwe, ta udu le buku doh. Jo eme kameh mete-ei iri lau amak, ame loken ja na len hamon.”
Eme nawin bwe, angelo ta Laban mesekei iy ibo sik ma atarah i andri, ma iri nadu un ani iy, ma iy imek, tasah iy batudun Kindrei bwe.
Jo sekesek handru i ta Kindrei, iy tama Laban tataha Jises Krais. Ma iy kati iri kandriyen handru ta tikisiy, ma iy amekes maha-an udu ndrine iri mwan ma badih amunum.
Oro rayah ndraruwani budon doh, ya oro ndra-en hamon ta sahou laleyah.

Jo banoh ma bwilik bama ta sahou mwasin ta Krais bwe, tasah idoh badeh, boto-on ta Kindrei ta akohok are lau iri atehei budon tiri handru i ta sahou mwasin doh ame hamon. Sahou doh ma mwena i tiri Juwis, ano badeh, i tiri lau badu leheleh ale.
Tasah aha ndratanan, Kindrei ndraleheyani Jises Krais i buku ndru-u asiu alih handru. Ari ndramak ja winiyan basahan ndru ta asiu doh ja bwe.
Arile, iy tiye i buku doh ale ewek taha lau mwan ari, ari, “Aha badeh, kaso-ok udu aha iri, i buku le aha aso-ok bada aha amwenen.” Ma iri badih ale badeh, katudun nyara udu iri.

Bwena badeh, aha amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an, ma aha a-en hamon ta ndrine aha malen, ma bwidi aha amak. Arile, Kindrei bwidi aha akohok kohan handru hawe Krais, ma Kindrei mani iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha marakon iu.
Ou saruwani nyosowan mwasin ta Malawin Ndrabun udu tam badeh. Idoh mene udu tam, ya iri propet asehek ma hawe iri lau ta bwena ta lahou ta Kindrei mene adeu boto-on na mine iri ewek la-um.
Udu hamon ta lakou doh ano badeh, jo anyolom kandrah ma kon munyak ha-un asahan. Kandrah hawe kon munyak malen badeh, amai ndra-au laleyah. Ma gwa ndras ale bado ja bwe.
Bolo iri len marakon aha kasekesek.
Udu bolo bun ma limeh nane doh badeh, iri kameh asilah imek, arile iri winiyan basilahei iy bwe, iri aso-ok ta amak, arile imek badeh, atobwak le tiri.

Handru, taha baden buku iri lau rayah bwe. Tasah, taha atehei budon handru in ta Jises imek, ano iy amak eme awas ja. Eme ma, taha ndratanan, na boto-on ta Jises kameh Kindrei atiye iri lau tan mene ndramak, ma iri kameh ame hamon ja hawe Jises.
Buku none ari ndramak asehek anya, “Jises badeh, iy Nadu Kindrei handru,” iy lau doh ereu hawe Kindrei, ma Kindrei ereu hawen ale.

Sahou ta Krais dah badeh, i buku doh: Bwena mene, aha a-en hamon ta so-ok ta bada aha le amwenen. Iy aso-ok labai, iri kandriyen ta wasai, ma madalakis laleyah, ma hawe kandriyen doh badeh, bokoro-ei iy le. Eme ma, aha karuwi kandriyen malen doh udu ndrine aha keme len.

Jo le, jo madasan handru, are lau iy anya keme bolon loboho madasan jo udu aliy, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe. Iy kameh winiyan edek ili bolon, ano iy eme manan ja, ta asilah nan bwidiu nyorowan badu kapa gwa.

Oro rayah ja, iri orowei oro na bek ma oro amak. Iri mwetehei oro rayah, iri aso-ei oro rayah na no-o samen madan. Oro rayah badeh, oro adek ala ame, ari asumwe oro bwe, toro lakou bwe. Oro taliye ku-i sipsip ma ku-i me ndra-in i kalawi oro. Iri lau batondrok oro bala mwasin bwe, iri atehei maha-an ma sisi-in ili le toro.
Aha ndratanan, Krais badeh, mwasin handru. Iy ari kandriyen ndra-in badan bwe-en. Ya, buku aha atou iri mwan ma badih rayah amekes kandriyen mwasin, aha ndratanan, iri badeh, nadu Kindrei ale.
Tasah, idoh badeh, sahou ta Kindrei batanau aru ta aliy, i buku doh: ‘Jo badeh, atehei ou i buku sun anya lomada iri lau badu leheleh, ma ou ki nyara bohok kaseben iri lau badu bolo munyak mari.’ ”

Ma ale, ahi badeh, bawendreya iri mwan ma badih, o tobolowe sahou ili randrah ja bwe. Ahi ba-en hamon tiri kandriyen ta adeu bwilima i ta nyara Kindrei bwe. Ahi badeh, atiye sahou handru ta Kindrei ili tiri mwan ma badih marakon, ma iri winiyan anuhun. Ta kandriyen doh, ahi leheya iri, kandriyen tahi mwasin, ma iri winiyan atanan gok ahi amekes dah, idoh ale mwasin udu mada Kindrei.

Iy ales ili udu loboho lim salin ta Kindrei ma akohok Malawin Ndrabun udu mine taman mene tandrakan. Ma iy solowei Malawin Ndrabun eme, i buku none ado atou hawe anuhun dah. Lakou doh badeh, Jises edeu eme taso.

Ma aha ndrasahan ha-un ja. Ya, Kindrei le amwenen mene bwidi ndrine aha asahan ha-un ja. Ma len mari, iy edeu tanan ewek taha, ma iy bwidi aha asahan ha-un, ma kone ndramak doh i buku le Kindrei amwenen.
Jises anuhun le badeh, iy eme tiye, “Sik doh ta amekes ndramak imek bwe. Bwe, idoh eme ta taha kanyolom ma taha katudun Kindrei, ta idoh le nadun kameh akohok nyaran mwasin.”

Sahou doh handru, tasah sahou mwasin leheyani kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei eme lewan, ta iy aloh iri lau mwasin mara-ei ta madan i san ta budon handru le, udu ndra bada katin eme taku na len dah. I buku none tarou ta Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “Are lau le atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, Kindrei kameh aloh iy mwasin mara-ei ta madan, ma iy ndramak doh le winiyan akohok kohan ha-un ta udu le buku doh.”
Iri tiye iy ta bwese kei tondreh tan. Iy bwese-ei ili isos kon ari iri aloh “Kon ta bwisi bar ta ndramak,” ili boho kon tiri Hiburu iri aloh Golgata.

Na tikisiy ta Kindrei, taha ari ari ndrakohok ndramas mwasin i le winiya taha, ta amekes lahou tan. I buku none ari ndramak tan lahou mwasin ta akohok sahou propet badu boho Kindrei badeh, iy kamekes ki-in hamon ta boto-on ta budon handru tan le.

Lakou ma mulin ma mwena kone madan badeh, i buku layon. Iy ari ja, kone madan i buku bulumakau mwan. Iy ari ja, madan udu aliy, konen i buku batu ndramak awas. Ma iy ari ja badeh, konen i buku manyuwe, lu-u balen alawe ma iy atah loken.
Eme ma, bale aha kudu taha, ta kandriyen ta tekedek taha. Aha sadek buku iri mwan ma badih tana iri Kindrei bwe, arile aha kadek buku iri lau ta tanan.

Tasah, iri Juwis ma hawe iri lau badu leheleh badeh, ari ndrokowa iri aliy bwe. Laban turu ma lubuk badeh, Laban le ari, iy Laban tiri mari. Ma iy edeu nyosowan solo-an mwasin i tiri mari ala aloh nyaran i san ta asolom ma ndremenya iy ta seben.
Tasah, Krais ndraweneyani batanau malen ta Moses kabwe, ya eme are lau oro atehei budon handru le badeh, Kindrei aloh iy mwasin mara-ei ta madan.
I buku none ado bwese maha ta abudon solo-an, ado satikisiy ndri-iy. Arile, udu bolo maha mari badeh, ado kasolom ki ta Kindrei ya ado kasehek bolo maha tado ki tan hawe kadeu wurah ki tan ta aliy.
Eme lakou marakon nane asahan ta leheya taha, ta anyolom, ma mada taha salikis ta iri lakou ndra-in, mene mada iri alikis ta aliy.

Eme ma iy sihi kou ta lek nane doh, ma kasu-er asahan mana munu lek nane dah eme len i buku kasu-er ta jih laba tinan. Ma kasu-er udu mana munu lek nane doh eme loken, ili tubuluhi mada an, ma jor abakak eme bwidi kon munyak mara-ei asahan lulik.

Buku aha ba-en hamon ta sahou dah bwe, ma amadin hawe udu ndramak ari ja, aha amekes karei ili tiri lau ta Kindrei, iri nadu tine aha, ma wendreya iri ta lakou doh. Ari ndramak samekes kandriyen buku doh, tasah Laban badeh, edeu ndramas ndra-in ili tare lau nane amekes lakou doh. Handru, bwena mene ahi adeu sahou boto-on labai tiri lakou doh ndrawek taha.

Ya, bolo len dah, are lau mwan o badih, atehei budon tiri mara-ei in ta Krais, badeh, Kindrei ndrabwidi iri ndrasahan ha-un labai. Eme ma, kandriyen malen bwena ndra-au mara-ei, ma kandriyen mwasin ha-un ndrasahan.
Tama aso-ok nadun labai ma iy leheyani iy ta iri lakou iy amekes. Handru, tama winiyan leheya nadun ta lakou laba tinan ja, ma mani ado kameh atur ta aliy.

Ya, sahou randra ja udu aliy. Iri lau ta bahana, winiyan babahana ja bwe. Na dah, iri kamekes gok. Iri kamekes gok mwasin na le mine iri amwenen, ma tiri lakou kudu aliy, ta adeu kili tiri lau lakou bwe.

Ya, sahou tek randra ja. Jo atehei budon tek handru in ta Kindrei, iy kameh winiyan anuhun salom tado, ma jo kameh ano ta asiu lulik, ma jo ewek asahan hawe ado ja. Eme ma, jo aso-ok ou lowosaniy sese bosoh badu bolo asiu tam, ta jo winiyan manyah udu hawem.

Eme ma aha satehei aha sala bolo iri sahou solo-an, eme ta ariu budon taha, ma aha mani san mwasin ta Kindrei. Kindrei amekes kandriyen mwasin labai eme tataha, ma idoh amekes taha abadok ta a-en hamon tan. Buku taha a-en hamon ta iri batanau ta beleben nyamon solo-an labai, idoh baseben taha ta a-en hamon ta Kindrei bwe. Tasah kandriyen doh, baseben iri lau bwena mene ba-en hamon ta aliy bwe le.

Aha nadu tine aso, aso anya kabatanau aha buku doh: Aha badeh, kanoh ma kanuhun boho iri lau amekes gok are ndrokowa aha, ma aha ka-en bahandra iri. Laban atehei iri are badeh, buku ndramak ta atondrok koha aha, ma kandriyen mwasin taha. Ma iri kameh leheya aha ma lowosa budon taha.

Taman uru tinen asehek, tasah uru anoh iri Juwis. Iri Juwis ndratehei sahou ndra-en aliy bwena, i buku are lau iy asehek anya Jises badeh, Mesaya, iri kameh tikahei iy udu bolo asiu ta atukum tiri Juwis iu ili manan.

Eme ya ado satehei budon tado handru sa-en toro, tasah oro asan ku-i oro, eme oro anya, i san doh kameh mesekei oro asahan lau ta Kindrei, arile bwe. Arile, taha lau ala atehei budon tataha handru i ta Kindrei bala san doh bwe, taha asahan lau ta Kindrei i san ta taha ruwani ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Ma taha atudun Kindrei i san ta Malawin Ndrabun, hawe taha ale sekesek i le ta Krais ta lakou mene iy mesekei eme tataha. Ya eme taha batehei boto-on ta taha bala ta kandriyen ta lahou badu bada taha amekes, bwe. Idoh badeh, ndrano ndra-au.
Iy batanau taha i buku doh: Taha katehei budon tataha handru ki-in ta nyara nadun Jises Krais, ma taha kaso-ok ndramak ari ja buku none iy ndrabatanau taha.

Udu hamon ta nyabwe ndras amai ta madak, jo anyolom nyabwe munyak ari ja abusuk bolo ndren ma atas eme loken. Jo anyolom kasoh ma la-uh udu batun, ya kone nadu kasoh ma la-uh udu batun doh badeh, i buku ta nadu sipsip. Arile, nyaro sahou tan badeh, tinan labai i buku le ta mwak laba tinan nane banin ere aliy.

Aha kawas tek, budon taha sala buku tiri nadu nah bwisik. Arile, i buku iri nadu nah bwisik badeh, tana iri ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, aha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei badeh, kasahan buku le aliy. Ta kandriyen mwasin handru ja badeh, budon taha keme kasahan ki buku lau mwan ma badih en, iri tana iri ta lakou marakon doh.
Buku ndramak ari tado bwese maha-an, mwasin ta iy kasolom kili ta Kindrei. Buku ndrine iy ari badeh, sekesek, mwasin ta iy kiyah wari ta atudun nyara Kindrei.
Na idah aha kales kamwenen! Kati aha satotoreh ja!

Taha aloh Kindrei badeh, tama taha, buku taha asolom i tan. Iy badeh, ndramak ta ereu bwena ta anuhun sahou, ma iy kameh edeu sihine taha lau mari, amwenen le ta gok nane taha amekes. Ma iy badeh, babudon ou saba lau handru, ma iy kameh winiyan batobolowe budon tan bala bame, bwe. Iy badeh, anuhun sahou tataha mari na kati budon tan ari le. Budon tan badeh, mwasin labai. Eme ma, len mari taha areu kon munyak dah, taha kabeleben Kindrei kamwenen handru.
Aha sawoyah ta atondrok. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, aha kameh winiyan bwidi iri gok Kindrei aso-ok. Ano ma aha kameh akohok iri saba lakou iy ndratandrakan ta edeu ewek taha.

Kandriyen ta atehei budon ili le ta Kindrei i buku doh: Iri lakou nane taha atondrok Kindrei anya kedeu keme tataha, taha katawiy kihis kudu ndrine taha. Ndrine taha ndratanan, iri lakou marakon nane doh udu aliy handru, arile mada taha amwenen banyolom bwe.
Ta nyara Laban, jo anya kabatanau aha ki buku doh: Aha sa-en hamon ja, ta kandriyen tiri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak, iri tanan Kindrei bwe. Budon tiri badeh, ari katin bwe.

Ya, aha kanuhun! Aha badeh, kadeu kona aha kili tiri mwan ma badih anya korou sahou kewek taha ta kandriyen ta batanau ta beleben nyamon ma gwa, ma ta len tinan aha ba-en hamon ta aliy na bolo jaha marakon bwe, o, ta len ta bun ha-un asahan, arile aha basan len hawe iri bwe, o, ta len ta amunyau.

Eme ma, iri mara-ei adeh, ales are mwena ta koyeu ta Kindrei kede-eh, ma atudun iy na ben ma len marakon udu bolo asiu tan tinan. Kindrei manyah udu bada koyeu tan, ma iy atondrok iri marakon ta udu le buku doh.
Pol eme andri badeh, akabah i la-u ndramak loweu dah ma tawi iy. Eme iy anya, “Bale ado sasin iy. Kohan udu aliy!”

Eme ma jo sekesek ta ato-ou iri maha-an mari ale asahan tek. Jo bwese iri maha-an ta aseben iri mwan ma badih marakon Kindrei ndrandromwei iri ndrala tan, ma jo anya, iri kameh kakohok kohan handru ta Jises Krais doh, ma iy kameh winiyan andrei iri ala ado hawen are kandrah ta are le buku doh.

Aha mari kateu lim kereu ndrokowa aha, ma aha katehei sekesek ki tiri lau ra-on ja ta Kindrei areu badeh. Aha kaleheya ki tiri buku none aha aseken iri handru, ma aha atehei ndrine aha i tiri handru. Jo aso-ok aha lau mari an hamon ta Krais, ndrine aha ma budon taha kudu mwasin.

Aha marakon ka-en bahandra iri mwan ma badih ari ari ta Kindrei rayah ja, ma ka-en hamon ta sahou tiri. Tasah, aha marakon badeh, a-en bahandra Krais, ma ta kandriyen doh aha kameh amekes ta atudun nyaran.

Eme ya ado kawas tek ta budon handru, ado mene ndratanan eh, ya eme ado badeh, katondrok ado kudu mwasin. Eme ya iri lau ta tabelese ta batanau ta Kindrei doh, saluwi ado same len, ya sataku ta budon handru tado, i ta Kindrei ma ta sahou handru tan.
Ya, aha badih tasou, aha badeh, kanuhun boho udu aha iri, ma ka-en hamon tiri. Tasah, aha ta Laban ma kandriyen dah badeh, amwenen labai ta madan.

I buku none oro are lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei kamekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in badeh, ou asehek keme ndranye lau mari kanuhun. Eme ya iri lau mari kanuhun ma iri kanoh ta aliy, ya iri sa-en hamon ta aliy.

Eme ya, ou sasehek ndramak ari ari anya iy badeh, ba-en hamon ta batanau malen bwe, ndri-iy. Arile ou amekes budon tam ki buku doh: Jo badeh, samekes ari lakou ta amekes nadu tine ari ja ato-ak ta aliy, ma jo samekes ari sahou ta sokoso-ou budon tan, ndri-iy.
Arile, Kindrei kameh edeu lomadan, masiye hawe mondrei kameh i tiri lau mari le amekes kandriyen mwasin: Ma mwena kameh i tiri Juwis, ano kameh i tiri lau badu leheleh ale.

Jih anya laba tinan ma nyarahan labai, eme iri akahei oro ala bolo jih, arile jih basulumwi oro bwe. Iri lau anya kadi oro na bainat, arile oro atobwak au laleyah. Oro nyamu oro bwe, arile udu hamon ja, nyamu oro asahan, ya oro ame asahan boto-on labai ta bahun. Eme ma oro tikahei iri lau ta bahun badu kon rakon ja au.
Ya ta sendrehendreh ta aliy i buku doh: Ari ndramak badeh, sadeu jo sala bolo maha-an ma sisi-in ja, tasah jo bwese ndrana udu badak dah ta leheya jo badeh, lohowan ta Jises.

Sahou mara-ei ano le badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari boto-on labai, iy andrei bek ari laba tinan, i buku bek laba tinan ta atisih wit. Iy tutuni bek nane doh i loken, ma iy akahei iu ili andri atuh i bolo ndras. Ma iy anya, “Ta kandriyen doh le badeh, iri kameh andrei kon tinan Babilon, ma akahei boto-on labai ili andri, eme ma iri lau kameh winiyan banyolom iy ja bwai.
Arile, aha nadu tine handru, jo aso-ok aha katehei budon ma hawe ndrine aha kabadok ki-in ta Kindrei. Na bolo len mari aha kasolom kili le ta Kindrei i san ta Malawin Ndrabun.

Ma aha sa-en hamon ja ta tekedek ndra-in tiri lau badu munyak dah amekes, ndri-iy. Arile aha kasokosowei budon ndra-in ki-iu na budon mwasin ta Kindrei. I buku none aha a-en hamon ta aliy, idah kameh, aha takalahei seken ta sasah Kindrei anya aha kamekes. Ma iy kameh sekesek, tasah, sasah iy tiye aha ta amekes badeh, ndra amwenen le.

Jo badeh, nadu bwisik labai udu bolo iri aposel. Jo asehek i buku doh, tasah jo bwena mene amekes bahun ma adai iri lau ta Kindrei. Idoh le bwidiy, eme, udu budon tek anya, jo nadu bwisik labai ta aha aloh jo buku aposel.
Mada aha salikis kandriyen ta kon munyak, ma hawe iri lakou mari badu kon munyak. Buku ari ndramak, iy aso-ok kandriyen ma lakou badu munyak tinan labai, iy badeh, baso-ok lakou Kindrei aso-ok, bwe.

Ou are lau anya ou mwasin, ya ndramak kodo-oh ndra-in; balem ki tam! Ou badeh, ari madasan ta atobwak bwe. Tasah, buku none ou anya ndramak kodo-oh ndra-in, arile kandriyen doh ou amekes, badeh ou le amekes Kindrei edeu maha-an ewek la-um.

Eme Jemis, Pita hawe Jon badeh, oro lau ta batun dah, ndratanan Kindrei badeh, ndratehei lahou dah ndrame kanik; eme, oro ndrateu lim hawe aru Banabas. Eme, aso ndrasehek sahou randra le, ta aso amekes lahou le. Oro amekes lahou i bolo iri Juwis, ya aru Banabas amekes lahou i bolo iri lau badu leheleh.
Na len iri lau ta bahun tatahi Jises ili ta kei tondreh, iri andrei awin tan ta bwele-en, iri tarani ili ma ha-ei, ano iri ondrek tiri. Awin tan ra-ei ja ma buruwen ta badan badeh, iri andrei ale.
Ya eme, ou badeh, leheya iri oh? Ya, i buku sah handru ou winiyan baleheya ou le bwe? Ou tiye anya, “Ado sabahana,” ya ou babahana bwai?

Handru, bada aha badeh, taha le bwe. Bada aha badeh, buku asiu ndrok ta Malawin Ndrabun. Sebwe, aha babudon ta aliy bwe nadeh? Kindrei atehei Malawin Mwasin ndrawek taha, ma iy udu bolo oda aha. Eme ma aha taha le bwe, aha ta Kindrei ale.

Iri lakou marakon ahi amekes badeh, ta aseben ahi bwe. Tasah, tikisiy hawe so-ok ta Krais badeh, tutuni ahi ta amekes gok tan. Tasah, ahi ndratanan ta lakou ari le dah: Ndramak ari le tubuni taha ma iy ndramak, ma idoh i buku taha marakon amak ta iri lakou taha amekes mwena.

Ado nadu tine i san ta Jises, Kindrei udu kandrah kodo-oh iy aloh ado ale. Ado kabudon kamwenen kili le ta Jises, Kindrei tiye iy eme ta asahan aposel ma tinan tiri pris. Taha ale atehei budon in tan, ma asehek nyaran ili ta lau marakon.

Ma udu bolo lahou tek mari, jo ndraleheya aha ta san ta kandriyen ta amekes gok boto-on, aha kaseben iri lau nyamu iri bwe. Ma taha kabudon sahou mene Jises asehek i buku doh, ‘Are ndramak, iy edeu lakou ili tare lau, iy badeh, sekesek tinan handru. Ma sekesek ta iy ndramak nane akohok lakou winiyan basakalawi sekesek ta iy ndramak nane aseben iy bwe.’ ”

Tasou badeh, lakou ari mwasin handru. Eme ma kandriyen aha amekes ta tasou, badeh, kudu mwasin labai ta mada Kindrei. Kora-on aha amekes ndra-in ili ta budon ta Kindrei. Tasah, aha ndratanan, hamon kameh Kindrei edeu ndramas ndra-in ili tiri lau mwan ma badih amekes kandriyen ta karei, ma iri lau amekes laleyah ta bolo tasou tiri.
Jo aluh, ma anyolom ili munu bek. Eme jo anyolom iri kari kolau nane iri asu iy na aliy, arile jo bala munu bek bwe.

Bolo len doh badeh, kalik takamek ili eme, ma kuruh atohou, kurutuwen laba tinan labai, ndroi asahan, iy nyokoda kon ma kon munyak mara-ei totoreh andra-i mara-ei. Ndroi ari le doh badeh, i randrah labai, bala buku iri ndroi rayah ale Kindrei amekes kala iy bwidi iri lau manyah bwele-e munyak eme taku dah, bwe. Iy ndroi le doh badeh, iy ndra-in, ndra-in labai udu bolo iri ndroi mara-ei!

Eme ma jo atehei bwili ndru-uk i andri udu mirihik ta kati angelo, ta anya katudun iy, arile angelo anya, “Ndri-iy, ou samekes! Jo badeh, ta amekes gok ta Kindrei hawem, ma jo ale badu hawe nadu tinem oro, oro ala atehei budon toro ki-in ta sahou handru ta Jises asehek. Ou atehei bwili ndru-um ki andri ma ou atudun Kindrei le ari kabwai. Ya taha tanan sahou mara-ei iy asehek, idoh le badeh, suri ndrine iri lau mara-ei ta asehek iri sahou propet.”

Handru, tanan doh mene aton, arile Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei le amwenen eme leheyaniy eme tataha. Tasah, Malawin Ndrabun tanan labai ta anyolom lakou mari, ma iy tanan labai ta anyolom iri budon ma kandriyen mari ta Kindrei mene aton ta mada iri lau.
Ado kamasiye ndramak i buku doh, ma hawe kaseken iy na ndrine ado i san ta Laban.
Ya, aha nah mwan ma badih, aha badeh, kanuhun boho tama aha ma tine aha iri ta lakou marakon. Laban badeh, aso-ok aha ka-en hamon tiri kandriyen buku doh.

Budon tahi atona sahou dah handru, ma ahi sekesek ta lakou dah: Ta lakou marakon ahi mene amekes ili tiri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak dah, ahi mene a-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, ma kandriyen handru. Ahi ba-en hamon ta tanan mene ahi akohok tiri mwan ma badih badu munyak dah bwe. Tikisiy ta Kindrei le mene aseben ahi, ma ahi amekes i buku aliy. Ma ahi mene amekes kandriyen doh ili le kala ahi abo gok hawe aha mwan ma badih badu Korin.

Are lau iy andrei iri sahou batanau tek ma iy in hamon ta aliy, iy lau doh badeh, aso-ok jo tinan labai. Ma tama kameh aso-ok are lau nane iy aso-ok jo. Jo ale aso-ok iy, ma jo kameh leheya jo amwenen ili tan.”

Ma iri batanau doh, ibo gok boto-on ta andrek iri mwan ma badih kamekes kandriyen ta atehei bwili ndru-u iri i andri i ta lakou doh; iri abudon anya Kindrei badeh, sekesek labai ta aliy. Ma iri ale abudon taha badeh, katehei taha kala andri mara-ei ma katehei bwili ndru-u taha kili andri kili tiri angelo, ma ka-um bada taha. Na budon tataha mwan ma badih badu kon munyak, idoh i buku kandriyen mwasin ta tanan udu aliy ta amekes Kindrei kasekesek taha. Arile, lakou doh, winiyan baseben taha ta ruwani kandriyen ta ndrine taha malen iu bwe-en!

Iri nadu tine taha doh, asehek tiri lau ta Kindrei badu dah, i buku doh: “Gayus badeh, aso-ok iri, ma iy edeu seben laba tinan labai ili tiri.” Ya, buku none iri anya kadek ja, jo aso-ok ou aseben iri adek rakon ala rakon, ta amekes lahou ta Laban. Ou aseben iri badeh, in hamon ta budon ta Kindrei.
Ma ou adeu konam kili tiri sahou ari katin ma moson bwe. Tasah, ou tanam iri sahou doh badeh, ta amekes kandriyen ta tebelese asahan.

Na dah, taha mwan ma badih marakon asahan lau ta Kindrei, taha badeh, batone kandriyen asahan ta manyah tataha bwe i buku bwena mene Moses amekes. Koha taha badeh, leheya sun ta Kindrei asahan tataha i buku torowe leheya lakou. Eme ma, len marakon taha badeh, akohok sun ta Laban solo-an, solo-an labai, ma idoh tubuni taha, ma taha asahan buku le Laban amwenen. Malawin Mwasin ta Laban bwidi lakou doh eme tataha.

Arile, ndraye Krais doh udu bwele-en labai ja, ta ndraye me ma bulumakau. Iy atehei kohan mara-ei amwenen ili ta Kindrei i nyara salom. Eme ma ndrayen doh basikine ndraka-an ta bada taha le bwe, iy sikine taha mara-ei handru, ma ndrine taha batona maha-an ja ta iri ndra-in mwena mene taha amekes, bwe. Ma iy tolowei iri kandriyen solo-an, taha amekes laleyah, ari kohan handru amwenen bwe. Eme ma taha katawiy kihis gok ta Kindrei doh, kohan handru udu aliy. Tasah, Krais ari ndra-in bare tan bwe. Bwe labai. Ma na boto-on ta Malawin Mwasin, iy amekes gok doh kameh ta udu le buku doh.
Jo winiyan batebelese hawe Kindrei bwe, tasah iy edeu ndramas i tiri i le buku iy edeu eme tataha mene, kabatana to atehei budon tato handru in ta Laban Jises Krais.”

Aha samekes ndrine Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei sandra-i, ta kandriyen aha a-en hamon ta aliy. Aha kabudon kamwenen. Kindrei ndratehei Malawin Ndrabun buku kalem ndrawek taha ta aha katondrok len ta Kindrei eme akohok taha ame hamon ja.

Aha kabudon kili hamon ja ta len ma mwena mene aha anuhun sahou tek mwasin, ma aha atehei budon handru taha in aliy. Eme nadah, aha katubuni ndrine aha ma ka-en hamon ta sahou handru ma bwena mene ja. Buku bwe-eh, jo kameh ewek hawe aha i buku ndramak ta bahana, ma aha kameh winiyan bala tanan ta len, jo kameh ewek bwe, ma jo kameh edeu ndramas ndra-in labai ewek taha ale.

Wurah lomada aha naduk, mada aha kaleu tiri lau sawendreyani aha. Are ndramak, iy amekes kandriyen mwasin, iy badeh, mwasin mara-ei ta mada Kindrei, buku Krais badeh, kandriyen tan mwasin, ma iy ale mwasin mara-ei en.

Wurah lomada aha kawas tek ta Kindrei, iri propet solo-an ta wasai ndradek bolo kon munyak, aha satehei budon taha boto-on sala ta sahou tiri mari aha anuhun, ndri-iy labai. Lau solo-an kameh anya, “Kindrei atehei sahou tan eme tek ta asehek ewek taha.” Arile, aha kanyolom ma kanuhun sahou kamwenen, kora-on sahou doh ta Kindrei bwe, ya iy sawendreyani aha.

Eme ma, aha nadu tine, jo badeh, anya aha ki tana aha, i san ta Jises, Kindrei winiyan mani kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Sahou dah badeh, aso asehek ndrawek taha. Na iy le badeh, are lau atehei budon handru in tan winiyan bala bolo maha-an ta kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in mari bwe. Ya, na iy le, Kindrei winiyan aloh ari ndramak mwasin labai ta madan. Iri batanau malen mari ta Moses badeh, winiyan basebenei ou bwe, ma iri winiyan babwidi ou bala mwasin ta madan bwe le.

Kabwai, sahou sese le doh. Ado nadu tine, ta budon handru badu hawek i san ta Kindrei, ado kasekesek, tasah ado ndrase hawe Laban. Eme ya jo baliliy ta atorou ewek tado bwe le, i buku le bwena mene jo atorou ewek, ta leheya ado, ta tiye nyala ado tiri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai ado, i buku none iri kanone ado.

Buku iy ari imeson labai, iy badeh, kaimon nyamon kudu ndra asiu tan mwena. Aha kamekes kili buku doh, kora-on tukum taha kabwidi aha kales kare ta mada sahou ta Laban. Jo kameh ewek barasehek taha ta iri lakou rayah mene aha ndremenya jo ta aliy.

Pailat eme asehek i tiri ja, “Mwasin, aha kandrei iy kewek hawe aha, ma aha katehei iy ki ta mada sahou ki-in hamon ta iri kandriyen taha amwenen.” Iri ame asumon sahou ta Pailat ja, “Badeh, ndrabun tinan labai, ta ahi winiyan badai iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in amak bwe.”

Aha lau mwan ma badih badu Korin kede-eh amekes iri gok solo-an labai ta akohok ndramas ta Malawin Ndrabun. Arile, na dah, jo anya kaleheya aha ta san ari mwasin handru, ma iy udu bwele-en labai. San doh ta ou aso-ok iri lau rayah ja.

Jises doh, iy tinan tiri pris. Iy le ari winiyan sebenei taha. Iy ndrabun labai; iy ari budon ndra-in bwe; ma iy ndra nyikilikin labai ta mada Kindrei. Eme Kindrei atehei iy udu len labai ja tiri lau ta amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in. Ma iy andrei iy iu ili loken ili kandrah, ma atehei nyaran ndra tinan labai.
Tasah, jo winiyan amekes lahou mari na boto-on tan iy edeu eme tek.
Handru, so-ok ta Kindrei i buku doh: Koha aha ma manyah taha mara-ei kasahan ndrabun. Aha kateleya aha kare ndra len ta kandriyen ta karei.
Aha badeh, katawiy kihis kandriyen ta salom. Buku aha anya kasolom, aha katondrok, ma aha kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei.
Eme Moses anuhun sahou doh badeh, ma iy atobwak iu ili Midiyen, i buku lau badu leheleh manyah udu kon doh. Ya eme nadun mwan la-uh asahan.

Ndramak mwan satubuloh batun. Tasah konen hawe nyasou tan i buku le Kindrei, ma Kindrei atehei budon ma nyasou mwasin ili tiri i buku le tan amwenen. Ya, badih badeh, leheya budon ma nyasou mwasin ta lau mwan.

Krais badeh, ta amekes ndrine taha marakon amunum. Eme ma, aha badeh, katehei ndrine aha mwasin doh, kudu bwena taha ta lakou mari aha amekes. Tasah, Kindrei ndralebelei aha marakon ndra le tan. Eme ma aha kameh winiyan asahan bada aha ari le, ma aha kameh winiyan manyah are le se. Ma aha ale badeh, kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei ta lakou marakon.

Kindrei badeh, iy kati iri lakou marakon, tasah iy bwidi iri lakou marakon. Ma iy aso-ok ta akohok nadun iri kala hawen kakohok lomadan mwasin. Eme iy atehei budon in ta nadun ta kamekes iri gok ta akohok iri lau mwan ma badih kame hamon ja, iy eme atehei Jises eme akohok sisi-in tinan labai. Ta sisi-in doh le, ma iy atehei Jises udu bwena ta aseben iri lau mwan ma badih. Kindrei amekes iri kandriyen marakon doh amwenen le ai.

Saba lakou handru ale amekes bahun hawe losen udu bolo ndrokowa aha? Sebwe iri kandriyen ta ndrine aha ato-ou ta losen suwi, badeh, udu bolo oda aha, ma amekes bahun hawe budon ma tanan mwasin ta atondrok bada aha mara-ei.

Jo anuhun iri kundruh i buku doh, iri kandriyen ndra-in labai ta karei asahan udu bolo ndrokowa aha. Handru, iri lau tana iri Kindrei bwe, iri amekes kandriyen ta karei, arile kandriyen ta karei ere taha ja badeh, ndra-in labai mara-ei ja tiri lau nane ta tana iri Kindrei bwe. Kandriyen nane ahi anuhun i buku doh, ndramak ari amekes karei, o amadin hawe tinen ari ja.

Buku iri none asahan taha, aha winiya atanan, idoh mene ndrasahan tiri mwan ma badih rayah. Arile, Kindrei badeh, in hamon tiri batanau tan, ma iy winiya balelei ari none ta atisih boto-on taha bwe-en. Buku iri none asahan taha, Kindrei kameh amekes san ta aseben aha. San i buku doh: Iy kameh atadau aha abadok, ma aha winiya ales boto-on ta tawiya none doh.

Ya aha katondrok iri kamwenen, tasah hamon kameh jo ruwani aha, idah kameh lau solo-an ndra-in ame bolo aha ta tobolowe budon hawe manyah taha. Ya kandriyen tiri kameh i buku iri mwi badu lokei ame atikah iri nadu sipsip.

Ta idoh le, aso badeh, atudun nyara aha udu ndrokowa iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Ma aso asehek sahou i buku doh: “Na len iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in ili tiri lau badu Tesalonaika, ma len ta maha-an asahan tiri, iri badeh, ales boto-on, ma tawiy ihis budon tiri, ma bwese iri maha-an ma isi.”

Ari ndramak batou Kindrei bwe le, arile buku none taha aso-ok ndramak ari ja, Kindrei ereu hawe taha, ma so-ok tan kameh asahan eme lewan in bolo kandriyen tataha ta aso-ok ndramak ari ja, i buku le Kindrei aso-ok taha.

Jo Pol: Jo badeh, aposel tiri lau ta Kindrei. Jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek taha lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei ale are bolo kon munyak tinan Galesiya. Iri lau nane ahi amekes lahou se badeh, ale are hawek, ma iri ale anya, bada-an mwasin tiri ewek taha. Jo aposel ari, eme ma jo badeh, edek ma atiye sahou ta Kindrei. Idoh badeh, basahan na seken ta ari ndramak, bwe. Idoh badeh, asahan na seken ta Jises Krais hawe taman Kindrei le amwenen. Uru le amwenen badeh, atehei gok dah eme tek ma suni jo ta atiye sahou mwasin ewek taha. Jises mene imek, arile Kindrei ndramete-ei iy udu ta imek tan badeh, ndrame awas ja.
Taha katehei iri budon tataha marakon kili le ta Jises. Iy ales boto-on labai ta iri lau atehei kona iri i tan ta kandriyen ndra-in tiri. Eme ma, taha sawoyah ta asehek sahou ma taha satobwak.
Ya, i buku none taha mene ndrahas ndra ari buruwen ndrala bolo imek hawen, idah kameh, taha ahas ari buruwen hawen ale, ma taha winiyan amak ame loken i buku iy.
Ano ja asehek i buku doh: “Ya aha lau badu leheleh badeh, ka le se hawe iri lau ta Kindrei, ya aha kasekesek.”
Malawin Ndrabun tiye aleu i buku doh: Na len hamon eme, lau rayah kameh ruwani budon handru tiri; ya iri kameh an hamon ta malawin ndra-in ta wasai, ma an hamon ta leheya ndra-in tiri balik.
Ou tiye ki tiri lau ta Kindrei kare bahandra tondrok tiri lau ta atondrok iri, ma kanuhun boho iri. Ma oro lowosa oro kado le ta kamekes lahou mwasin le.

Arile, iri asehek doh badeh, ta laleyah le. Iri badeh, bale iri ndramaniy ta lakou badeh, ndratobolowe ja. Bwena mene kabatana Kindrei amekes kandrah, ma munyak asahan bolo gwa eme loke, ma hawe apwai gwa badu loke i len ta gwa badu andri badeh, iy tiye le na bohon, ya lakou mari doh asahan.

Aha abudon Krais ale. Kandriyen tan mwasin handru, arile iy akohok andra-i ale. Ma iy badeh, ndramak, san rasan le ta kandriyen ndra-in tataha. Iy bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, arile iy ili i buku saluwe taha ta kandriyen ndra-in tataha. Eme ma, iy anya kakohok taha kala hawe Kindrei. Iri adai iy, odan buku none taha dah, arile iy amak eme awas ja na Malawin Mwasin.

Ya, ki buku none iri mene bala tanan san ta kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei bwe, idah kameh maha-an udu le udu. Arile, i buku none iri ndratanan kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei, ma ndranyiminyem mwasin ta aliy, kabatana iri lau tan mene atiye sahou ta batanau i tiri, ya ano udu, iri tobolowe kona iri i tan ja, idah kameh, iri bwese maha-an ma isi tinan labai, Kindrei kameh edeu i la-u iri.

Aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih, ta bwele-e nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais, aso anya kabatanau aha badeh, buku doh: Aha badeh, kare ndra len ta nadu tine aha iri rayah nane manyah laleyah, ma ba-en hamon ta tanan nane aso adeu ili tiri bwe.

Taha tanan, ndramak ari le bwidi kandriyen ndra-in, ya, ta kandriyen ndra-in doh le, kandriyen ndra-in mari asahan kon munyak. Ano ja, kandriyen ndra-in tiyani imek eme. Eme ma imek eme andrei lau marakon, tasah lau marakon amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in.

Oro lau doh atehei budon toro handru in ta Kindrei. Eme ma, oro banoh ta ari bahun bwe, oro adi iri lau solo-an tiri kabin rayah ja amak, oro ale andrei lakou nane Kindrei tandrakan ta edeu i toro. Oro ale ndremenya Kindrei ta atondrok oro, eme ma oro tawi boho iri layon ta winiyan baimon oro bwe.
Iri lau laleyah badeh, atikah ahi ta amekes ndra-in eme tahi, arile Kindrei baruwani ahi bwe. Iri a-um ahi, ma adeu kandriyen ndra-in solo-an eme tahi, arile ahi bamak bwe.

Aha badeh, ndraruwani Kindrei, i buku le badih ndraruwani udun, ya iy ndrasahan badih ta madasarah. Buku ari mwan o badih, iy aso-ok kandriyen badu kon munyak labai, iy lau le doh kameh baseken Kindrei bwe. Sebwe, aha tana aha bwe nadeh? Jo katiye taha ja, buku none ari ndramak anya kasahan kawas ta kandriyen badu kon munyak, iy ndrasahan lau ta bahun i ta Kindrei.
Eme Pol hawe oro lau badu hawen, adek ala loboho kon munyak tinan Prijiya hawe Galesiya. Oro badeh, batiye sahou bala bolo kon tinan badu Esiya bwe. Tasah, Malawin Ndrabun badeh, tiye oro sala.

Arile, ndramak in hamon ta kandriyen ta budon handru, eme Kindrei aloh iy mwasin mara-ei ta madan, iy ndramak doh in hamon ta sahou doh, “Ndrinem badeh, satiye anya, ‘Are lau winiyan ili bolo kandrah?’ ” ma kandrei Krais keme andri katiye sahou mwasin keme tataha.

Iy asehek sahou ano le badeh, jo anyolom angelo ari atah ili solowei bwekei tan amou ili bwele-e kon munyak. Eme ma se nawin bwe, soso-ou ma hawe sisi-in ndra-in mara-ei badeh, asahan bada iri mwan ma badih, iri nane kalem ta nyabwe munyak udu bada iri ma iri atudun malawin iri bwidiy na sukumada kei.

Iy ili andrei buk, ano oro lakou ma mulin ma hahuw, hawe oro batun ma lunoh hahuw (24) atehei bwili ndru-u oro i andri udu mirihik ta Nadu Sipsip ta Kindrei. Oro batun ari, ari badeh, tawi ndran iri aloh hap, udu mine oro hawe bwekei raben bek nyikilikin. Ma eh manahu buburen irek udu bolo bwekei doh, ma tuhi bwekei mara-ei. Idoh leheya buku salom ta lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei marakon.
Are lau atehei budon boto-on buku Jises badeh, Mesaya, iy badeh nadu Kindrei ari ai; ya are lau aso-ok taman, badeh, iy aso-ok nadun ale.
Taha sabudon anya taha ndra ari ai, bwe. Ma taha sasakalau ndramak ari ari, ma hawe mada taha salikis ndramak ari ja.
Ou sabolosen sala tiri lau ndra alon, ndri-iy. Arile, ou atamas iri badeh, ki buku tamam amwenen. Ou atamas iri lau loweu badeh, ki buku none nadu tinem oro handru,

Buku none iri lau tana iri Kindrei bwe, orou sahou ewek la-u aha, ma anya, “Aha lau ndra-in,” mwasin, iri baranyolom kandriyen taha mwasin aha amekes. Ma hamon kameh, iri barasehek anya, “Ehe, ahi badeh amekes budon ndra-in; arile, iri lau ta Kindrei doh badeh, amekes kandriyen mwasin.” Eme ma iri kameh adeu wurah i ta Kindrei, ta kandriyen mwasin taha nane, na len Kindrei eme hamon ta anuhun sahou tataha.

Eme ya jo kede-eh anya ndra mwasin le ai, ta mada Kindrei. Eme jo edek ili eme amekes maha hawe isi i bada iri lau ta Krais. Ya jo kede-eh anya jo badeh, in hamon handru ta batanau mari tiri Juwis. Eme ya iri lau anya jo badeh, amekes lahou doh amwenen handru ta mada Kindrei.
Iy eme ndremenya oro ja, “Mada an udu buku sah handru, eme badan anyala ja?” Oro anya, “Na mene mada an udu le alih, sik tan ano.”

Len doh badeh, ta alokou len ndrabun ta amunyau tiri Juwis. Len tiri nane doh kameh ndrabun labai. Eme ma iri Juwis bwale iri ta ndramak sukik udu bada kei tondreh na bolo len doh. Eme iri ndremenya Pailat ta atubwa kati oro lau nane are bada kei tondreh, ta oro kamak suwi, ma iri lau ta bahun kandrei oro are bada kei tondreh kame andri.

Pailat anuhun iri sahou doh, eme iy asilah san ta Jises ki-iu laleyah. Arile iri Juwis arah i tan ja, “Buku ou ruwani iy ndramak badeh, iu laleyah eh, badeh, kameh ou kawas ta Sisa bwai. Are lau asehek, anya iy kabin, badeh, iy bobose Sisa.”
Jises tiye sahou ili toro lau tan, “Ado satikisiy ma ado sabudon solo-an labai. Ado katehei le budon tado mara-ei kili le ta Kindrei ma keme tek ale.

Ma hawe ado badeh, banoh oro lau ta andres ado ta budon handru tado in ta Jises, bwe. I buku ado banoh oro bwe, ado kameh i nyara kalem ta leheya, oro kameh taku. Ya, i buku none ado amekes doh, idah kameh Kindrei sebenei ado.

“Ado basolo-ei jo bwe, jo le amwenen andrei ado, ma jo atehei ado ala ta ato-ou buwa kei solo-an, ma sali iri kameh kudu luluwen. Eme ma buku aha asolom i ta tama, ma aha ndremenya iy in ta nyarak ta saba lakou aha aso-ok, tama winiyan atehei ewek taha.

Ebol atehei iri budon tan mara-ei ili le ta Kindrei, eme iy edeu salom ili tan. Kindrei aso-ok salom ta Ebol labai, iy baso-ok salom ta Ken bwe. Ebol ndramak ai, arile budon tan tinan labai udu ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin labai ta madan, ma iy aso-ok ndramas tan ale. Kandriyen ta budon ta Ebol le doh, leheya taha ta atehei budon tataha ili le ta Kindrei.
Aha Korin kabudon ahi ki buku doh: Ahi badeh lohowan ta Krais. Eme ma Kindrei atehei ahi ta atiye sahou handru, ale mene aton tiri lau.
Ma iri ndrau mara-ei badu kandrah badeh, taku eme andri kon munyak, i buku buwa kei pik mamakahis, jor laba tinan asahan eme rohoyani ili le bahan.
Aha kawas tek handru, aha kado ndra len ta kandriyen ta atudun iri kindrei ta wasai, iri amekes na sukumada kei.
Ou samukuni kandriyen ndra-in sasakalawi ou, ndri-iy; arile ou tihisi kandriyen ndra-in na kandriyen mwasin.

Len marakon, ou aliu budon tiri lau ta leheya sahou dah, jo mene edeu ndrawek tam. Ma ou asehek boto-on kili tiri ta mada Kindrei ki buku doh: Iri satebelese sala ta sahou batanau. Kandriyen ta sahou tebelese doh kameh winiyan baseben ari ndramak ta in hamon ta Kindrei bwe. Kandriyen doh, ta sokolowa budon tiri lau le ta anuhun sahou solo-an doh.

Aha badeh, kala mirihik handru ta Kindrei, ya iy kameh eme mirihik handru taha. Aha lau mwan ma badih ta lomondra ndra-in ma ta karei, kandriyen taha badeh, kasahan mwasin i buku ndramak sikine minen asahan ha-un ja. Buku budon taha i lundra, baden eh, aha karuwani budon ndra-in nane udu ndrine aha badeh, ki-iu ai.

Arile, buku aha apwai iri lau ta Kindrei a rabuk doh, rabuk doh, eme ma aha atondrok iri mwan ma badih nane tiri luk solo-an ai, ya aha atehei kona aha ja ili tiri lau nane tiri lakou bwe, badeh, aha ndrabwidi kandriyen ndra-in kabwe, ma aha ale badeh, ndrabokoro-ei batanau ta Kindrei.
Handru, koha taha badeh, kasahan ha-un mara-ei, tasah Kindrei batehei taha ba-en hamon ta kandriyen ta karei bwe. Iy atehei taha ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen ha-un, ma ndrabun labai.

Tasah, taha tanan Kindrei udu kandrah, iy leheyani losen tan eme lewan eme andri ili la-u iri lau ta tebelese, ma ta kandriyen ndra-in iri amekes. Ya eme na kandriyen tiri le doh, iri anya katisih sahou handru, ma sokei iri lau winiyan bala tanan Kindrei bwe.

Wurah lomada aha kawas tek ta Kindrei, taha kaso-ok nadu tine taha ari ja, tasah kandriyen ta aso-ok nadu tine taha ari ja badeh, ta Kindrei. Ya ndramak aso-ok nadu tinen ari ja, iy badeh, nadu Kindrei, ma iy tanan Kindrei handru.
Buku ari ndramak anya, iy badu lomada sun, arile iy badeh, baso-ok iri lau ta Kindrei rayah ja bwe, ya iy ndramak doh badeh, udu ndra bolo lulik kahis.

Aha kasekesek buku none iri lau asehek sahou ma aluhe aha. Tasah, aha badeh, an hamon ta Krais. Ma moson ta aliy i buku doh: Malawin Ndrabun ta Kindrei badeh, nyaran tinan, ya iy boto-on labai, ma iy ereu la-u aha handru.

Aso ateu lim hawe oro, ma aso mari ja sekesek a le se. Ano Pol asehek nyala iri lakou marakon nane Kindrei amekes ere bolo iri mwan ma badih badu leheleh udu bolo iri len bwena mene iy amekes lahou tan.
Are lau taha winiyan nyuwani jo amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in? Buku jo asehek sahou handru, i buku sah, aha batehei budon taha bame tek bwe ja?
Malawin Ndrabun tiye ja: “Jo kameh mani ndra-in tiri, ma jo winiyan babudon kandriyen ndra-in tiri ja bwe.”
Aha ndrahis hawe Jises labai, eme ma Kindrei ndratehei iri tanan mari mwasin ndrawek taha, ma iy aseben aha ta iri sahou mwasin aha asehek.
Ya eme aha nadu tine, jo indrek aha i san ta Laban Jises Krais, ma hawe i san ta tikisiy ta Malawin Ndrabun, ta aha kahas hawek, ma kales boto-on ma aha kateu salom keme tek ki ta Kindrei.
Iri lau asehek sahou i tan i buku doh, “Ou kede-eh balik udu bwele-em. Are lau handru anya kidi ou amak?”

Kindrei atehei Jises eme mada lau mari, iy imek i nyara salom ta sikine kandriyen ndra-in ta are atehei budon tan handru i ta ndrayen. Kindrei amekes doh, ta leheya iy badeh, in hamon le ta kandriyen mwasin. Tasah, ndra bwena ndra-au eme taku nadah, iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in, arile Kindrei amekes kandriyen amunum mara-ei ili tiri mwan ma badih marakon, ma iy badeu maha-an laba tinan suwi bala ta kandriyen ndra-in nane iri amekes bwe.
Ben nane doh nyala-an labai, eme iri lohowan hawe iri lau tinan tabani jih, eme iri ales are aliy ta anyan. Pita anyala ale, iy eme edek ili ales udu hawe iri, ma anyan jih.
Sahou sokek tek rayah i buku doh: Aha kasini iri nyasou marakon ta bahun, Kindrei nane edeu ewek taha, ma aha kameh winiyan ales boto-on ta mada iri sahou ta balik anya kamekes kewek taha.
Pita lelen iy ja, “Laban, i buku sah handru jo kameh winiyan bawek hawem na len dah bwe? Jo kameh atehei kohak marakon ewek le tam.”

Eme na salom tado le, Kindrei kameh mesekei tikisiy tado iu. Arile, ado kameh winiyan bala tanan bala mwasin bwe le, aliy ado atona i buku doh. Eme ya Kindrei badeh, winiyan tawiy, ma winiyan tondrokei budon tado, tasah ado badeh, ahas hawe Krais Jises.

Taha atudun ma adeu wurah i ta Laban hawe tama taha Kindrei badeh, na boho taha. Ma na boho taha le amwenen badeh, taha aten iri lau. Taha amekes kandriyen ndra-in buku doh, arile Kindrei badeh, mesekei kone taha mari asahan i buku le iy amwenen.

Jo batiye taha ta aha karuwani iri lau badu kon munyak dah, iri ale amekes iri kandriyen ndra-in i buku karei, ma bahana lakou ta lau rayah ja, ma madalikis, ma asolom sukumada kei, bwe. Buku aha anya karuwani iri lau buku doh badeh, aha kamak ka-au, ma bale aha kamani kon munyak mara-ei.
“Aha kanyolom! Bwena mene jo amwenen badeh, ales boto-on labai ta amekes iri gok solo-an, solo-an ta sa-en hamon ta sahou ta Jises badu Nasaret doh.

Arile, mada iri badeh, ndra ta karei le, ma oro badeh, abuyeh iri badih tasou ta amadin iri, eme iri winiyan baruwaniy ta amekes bwe. Ya, i buku iri anyolom are lau bales handru ta budon tan i ta Kindrei bwe, idah kameh iri asehek sahou nyaman ta atamas oro ka-en hamon tiri. Eme i san le doh kameh, iri amekes oro asahan lau tiri. Ma iri ale badeh, leheya iri le ta tanan mwasin labai ta aliu luk hawe lakou badu mine iri lau. Eme iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai doh badeh, Kindrei ndratandrakan ta iri kameh winiyan basahan ari ndramak awas bwe, oro ta amak le au.

Iy ndramak ibo gok ta akohok ndramas le, iy ndramak doh iy ta atondrok iri sipsip bwe, ma iri sipsip doh, tan bwe. Buku iy anyolom mwi badu lokei sakaliye eme ta aimon iri sipsip, iy kameh inoh, ma iy ruwani iri sipsip areu, iy kameh atobwak iu. Mwi eme ini iri, ma iri kameh atalan laleyah.
Ya aha badeh, kabudon kamwenen! Aha nadu tine mwan ma badih tek handru, aha katehei ndranye aha suwi ta anuhun sahou. Arile, aha sabobo-ap ta amekes sahou. Ma ndrine aha ale satowodau ta losen suwi.
Idoh i buku Kindrei asehek sahou batanau doh eme tataha: Buku are lau ta atiye sahou tan, iy kakohok iri seben badu tiri lau nane anuhun sahou mwasin.
Jo ndrame andri bolo kon munyak i buku lomada sun, ta iy are lau atehei budon tan eme tek, iy kameh winiyan ba-en bolo lulik bwe.
Ano Jises ndruni iy udu asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma iy tiye i tan, “Ou anyolom, ou ndramwenen kede-eh, ou ka-iy abudon lomondra ndra-in. Bwe kameh lakou ndra-in labai ja asahan tam.”
Ta iri lakou marakon aha amekes, aha badeh, ka-en hamon le ta kandriyen ta aso-ok handru iri lau rayah ja.
Jises eme asehek sahou ili toro lau tan, “I buku ado aso-ok jo labai, idah kameh ado ka-en hamon tiri sahou batanau tek.

Bale aha ki-in taha, kora-on aha katunuhun, ma aha ba-en hamon ta boho Kindrei bwe. Tasah, ma bwena mene Kindrei ere bwele-e mandrei Sainai asehek sahou boto-on ili tiri lau badu Isra-el are kabede mandrei doh, arile iri tebelese bohon. Eme ma, na bolo len bwena mene doh, iri winiyan batobwak ma bateleyani ndramas ta kandriyen ndra-in tiri bwe. Na idah, Kindrei udu kandrah, ma iy asehek sahou boto-on labai ja eme tataha. Buku taha atehei kona taha i tan, taha winiyan batobwak ma bateleyani ndramas ta kandriyen ndra-in nane doh bwe, handru en.
Bwena mene ndra-au, aha tana aha Kindrei bwe. Eme aha a bonyo-ou tiri kindrei rayah ja; iri doh badeh, Kindrei handru bwe.
Na len Kindrei tutuni lohowan tan, iy suni iy ewek taha bwena ta adeu nyosowan ewek la-u aha, ta amekes aha badeh, katubuni kona aha ki tiri kandriyen ndra-in.”
“Aso dah badeh, anyolom na mada aso amwenen, ta lakou mari iy amekes udu kon munyak tinan tiri Juwis ma hawe Jerusalem. Iri badeh, adai iy ma atahi iy imek i bada kei tondreh.

Na boto-on le ta Laban Jises Krais tataha, jo anya kasehek taha nadu tine mwan ma badih i san ta nyara Jises Krais. Jo anya kabatanau aha ki buku doh: Sohowa aha marakon badeh, ki le randra, idah kameh ari ndra-i winiya bado ndrokowa aha bwe. Aha sapou aha. Budon ma tanan taha badeh, ki le randra ta iri lakou marakon aha abudon ma asehek.
Aha ale ado mwasin hawe Kindrei. Arile, bwena mene aha are len labai ta Kindrei, ma aha ta bahun hawen. Tasah, budon taha mene amekes bahun i tan, ma aha amekes kandriyen ta lomondra ndra-in.

Ya, Timoti, buku ou anya asahan buku bwekei mwasin don eh, idoh badeh, ou atobwak a len labai ta iri kandriyen ta ndrine iri lau loweu aso-ok. Ma ou abo gok boto-on in le hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ma amwenen, ma hawe budon mwasin ta Kindrei, kandriyen ta aso-ok iri mwan ma badih rayah ja, kandriyen ta ndrine taha kudu mwasin. Ma ou amekes iri kandriyen doh, hawe iri mwan ma badih, ndrine iri ndraleu mara-ei, ma iri asolom ili ta Kindrei kaseben iri ka-en hamon tan le amwenen.

Ya, Kindrei badeh, ndratehei kohan ha-un ndrawek taha, ma iy ndramete-ei aha amak ndrame awas hawe Krais. Eme ma, aha badeh, kabadok ta akohok iri lakou badu kandrah doh. Ere kon doh, Krais badeh, udu buku kabin, ma Kindrei suruni nyaran iu ili loken mara-ei.

Angelo ari ma mwena nane doh aluhi ndrah tan, eme ma gwa, bek hawe jih tubuniy hawe ndra, ma iy akahei iu ili andri bwele-e kon munyak. Jih nane doh badeh, anya ili sulumwi kon munyak ranah ma buruwen ano iu. Idoh, buku none apou kon munyak mara-ei i taloh, badeh, ranah badu bolo taloh doh andrakak ano iu. Ma hawe iri kei mara-ei nane badu loboho doh badeh, andrakak ano iu, hawe iri bwidiu nyorowan mwasin nane ateh udu loboho doh.

Eme ma oro anya, “Aso adeu wurah ewek tam, Laban, Ou Kindrei, iri boto-on mara-ei udu minem. Na nane dah ou are aliy, ma ndra bwena mene ou are aliy ale. Ou ndrandrei iri boto-on tam mara-ei, ma ou asahan kabin ta atondrok kon mara-ei ai. Eme ma ahi adeu wurah ewek tam.
Jises eme asumon sahou tan ja i buku doh, “Buku ou tanam boto-on ta Kindrei, ma are lau nane ndremenya ou ta gwa, ou winiyan ndremenya iy, iy winiyan edeu wa-im gwa kohan handru udu aliy.”

Krais le badeh, kati koha taha handru. Buku len hamon, iy asahan eme lewan, lau marakon winiyan anyolom iy amwenen, ma iri kameh anyolom aha ale are le lewan hawen, ma aha kameh, akohok lomada Kindrei doh. Krais badeh, udu hawe taha ma taha asahan ha-un (Kalan 3:5–4:18)

Arile katin ta jo atorou iri sahou dah, ta aha katehei budon taha kili le ta Jises. Iy Mesaya, ndramak nane Kindrei suni iy eme kon munyak, ta akohok lau tan marakon badu kon munyak ame hamon. Iy nadu Kindrei. Buku aha atehei budon taha marakon in tan, aha kameh akohok koha aha in le ta nyaran. Jises ili asahan hawe oro lau tan ja (Kalan 21)

Arile, taha lau ta Kindrei, ma are lau tanan iy handru anuhun sahou tataha. Are lau ta Kindrei bwe, banuhun sahou tataha bwe. Eme ma, na san doh, taha winiyan atanan ndrokowa Malawin Ndrabun ta asehek sahou handru, ma malawi balik ta asehek sahou wasai.

Len mari ado atukum, ya amekes kandriyen ta leheya buku, ndrine ado udu mwasin, ya ado sekesek, hawe ado aso-ok iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Arile, iri lau ta tebelese nane doh banoh ma bwili iri bama bwe, iri abudon le iri amwenen, i buku ndramak ndra-in ta atondrok sipsip abudon iy le amwenen. Iri badeh, buku jor oloh asi kandrah iu, ta ur winiyan bandruk bame andri bwe. Iri ale badeh, a buku kei ari la-un bwe, iri sudiy ma kandron, iy asara ma winiyan bato-ou salin bwe.
Eme ta katin le doh badeh, iri lau bwese iri lau abo sik ala bolo kon tinan. Ma adeu iri an bada sau hawe ndrou ta abe-en i buku none Pita kedek keme badeh, korohan le ki tiri.

Ya, na bolo iri len marakon, aha badeh, kabwese iri lakou doh hawe budon taha handru. Budon doh, i buku rasi sabar aha ndruniy udu kase aha. Na sabar le doh kameh, aha winiyan semete-ei jih ta nyah ta balik.
Lakou marakon aha amekes, aha badeh, kabadok ta amekes. Bala buku aha amekes gok tiri lau le bwe, aha badeh, amekes gok ta Laban ale.

Mada aha kaleu ta ndramak iy in hamon ta kandriyen ta karei. Kora-on ari ndramak katehei konan kili ta Kindrei, i buku le Iso mene, iy anya kisih nyamon san rasan le, eme iy atehei iri lakou marakon mwasin ta iy winiyan akohok i buku iy kadok, ta iu laleyah.
Iri arah ma aloh i tinan i buku doh, “Iy badeh, bwai. Ahi aso-ok ou ruwani Barabas keme len laleyah.” Barabas badeh, iy ndramak ta bahun ta adai lau amak ma iy ale ta bahana.

Iri kameh atehei iri kawas tiri ili mine iri lau ndra-in ta bahun, ma a-en hamon ta budon tiri ndra-in. Iri kameh abudon iri le, ma iri aso-ok, ta amekes bada iri kasekesek, ma iri baso-ok Kindrei bwe.
Eme ta katin doh, Kindrei tutuni iy ili udu loken labai, ma atehei boto-on i ta nyaran, sakalawi nyara lau mari.

Eme aso aposel mene ndrasehek taha, ma aha ndratanan boto-on ta Laban tataha Jises Krais. Ma aso asehek taha ale, ta iy kameh eme hamon eme kon munyak ja. Arile, aso badeh basehek kundruh laleyah ba-en hamon ta lau abudon, ma aso asehek taha ta nyala boto-on ta Jises Krais, bwe. Na mada aso amwenen, aso anyolom iy andrei lomada Kindrei, ma iy asahan tinan. Eme ma aso asehek nyala aha ta iri lakou mara-ei nane doh.

Iy atorou i randra le udu bolo la-ukei tan mari asehek ta nyala iri lakou doh. Ya udu bolo la-ukei tan mari doh, tanan rayah badeh, boto-on labai ta atanan. Eme ya iri lau ta leheya tanan ta wasai badeh, tana iri handru ta sahou handru ta Kindrei bwe. Ma budon tiri badeh, bado rasi bwe. Ya eme iri akohok sahou ta Pol ja badeh, iri tobolowe i randrah ja, i nyara tiri amwenen, ma leheya iri lau na aliy. Ma iri ale amekes i buku le aliy ta sahou ta Kindrei rayah ja udu bolo tarou tan. Ya eme udu hamon kameh, Laban aleben kandriyen tiri ano, ma iy kameh akeh iri ala bolo jih.
Eme Banabas uru Pol anuhun le badeh, uru tarani awin ta la-u uru iu ma uru sakaliye ala bolo iri lau dah aloh anya,
Ya eme jo kasehek taha ta Krais mene eme asahan lohowan tiri Juwis. Iy amekes lahou doh ta leheya Kindrei badeh, tiye sahou handru ta tandrakan tan mene iy amekes i ta tubu iri mene ndra-au.

Buku none ari mwan o badih iy anya, iy lau ta Kindrei ma iy atudun iy handru, arile iri batondrok boho iri bamwenen bwe, iri ndrawendreyani iri amwenen, ya eme ma budon hawe salom tiri doh badeh, ari moson ta aliy bwe.

“Aha samani iri sahou mene jo ndrasehek ndrawek taha: ‘Iri lau bonyo-ou winiya basakalawi kabin tiri bwe.’ I buku iri lau adai jo, iri kameh adai aha ale; buku iri an hamon tiri leheya tek, iri kameh an hamon ta leheya taha ale.
Jises eme asehek tiri Juwis nane atehei budon tiri in tan, “Ya, buku aha anuhun sahou tek, ma aha an hamon tiri leheya tek badeh, aha lau tek.
“Ano, kon mari badu bolo Ijip hawe Kenan badeh, nyamon bwe. Ma edeu maha-an tinan labai, ma tubu taha oro, ari madasan ta takaleh nyamon bwe.
Jo sekesek handru ta anuhun buku nadum oro ra-on ndra-en hamon ta sahou handru, buku tama taha ndrabatanau taha, ta a-en hamon ta sahou tan.

Arile, i buku none oro are batondrok lowan oro bwe, ma oro batondrok nadun ma udun oro bwe, badeh kameh iy sakalawi budon handru, ma iy badeh, ndra-in labai ja, ma kandriyen ndra-in tan badeh kameh sakalawi iri lau ala budon tiri ba-en hamon ta Kindrei ja ai.

Ta iri lakou doh le, taha ale kame mirihik ta Kindrei hawe ndrine taha kirek tiri budon mwasin. Taha katawi ndrine taha kudu mwasin, tasah ndraye Jises badeh, ndrasikinei lomondra ma iri kandriyen ndra-in tataha ndrano ndra-au, ma Kindrei ndrasikine bada taha na gwa tan lewen.

Arile, iri anuhun le, lau asehek anya, “Iy ndramak mene ta idi taha. Arile, nadah ja badeh, iy ndraruwani kandriyen ndra-in doh ndra-au. Bwena badeh, iy bwalen labai ta sahou mwasin ta Krais, arile, nadah ja badeh, iy ndratiye ndrala ta lau ja ai.”

Jo anya kasehek taha marakon i buku doh, aha kaimon nyamon nadah, tasah nyamon kameh amekes ndrine aha abadok, ma udu mwasin. Aha kanuhun, taha marakon kameh are mwasin, ma ari tataha winiyan bamai bwe.”

Aha badeh, ndra-en hamon tek, ma aha ndratawi nyarak ndrahis mara-ei. Eme ma iri lau badeh, amekes ndra-in ewek taha. Arile, aha badeh, ales boto-on labai, ma bwese iri maha-an mari doh, ma jo tanan aha bawoyah ta aliy bwe.

Ma ou leheya oro lau-en badeh, ka-en hamon toro kandriyen doh: Oro badeh, budon toro kaleu, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ala lau mari kanuhun oro, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ta atondrok bada oro, ma oro badeh, ki ndramak handru ta budon toro kihis ta tanan handru. Ma oro badeh, ki ndramak ta amekes mwasin i ta lau mari, ma hawe oro badeh, ki ndramak ta ado le i buku none oro bwese maha-an solo-an.

Len bwena mene, Kindrei anyolom lau badeh, bala tanan iy bwe, ya iy batiye iri ta lakou iri amekes laleyah bwe. Arile, na len dah ja, iy batanau lau mari badu heh, badu heh badeh, katubuni ndrine iri.
Ales are mirihik ta kei tondreh ta Jises badeh, tinen, nadu tine tinen, Mariya udu Klopas, ma hawe Mariya badu Makdala.
Iy asini awin ari doh, iri lomwaniy na le ndra. Ma iri aloh nyaran badeh, “Sahou ta Kindrei.”

Arile, aha katondrok aha kamwenen. Aha tanan, aha winiyan aimon saba nyamon aha aso-ok. Arile, kora-on kandriyen dah aha amwenen amekes, eme ma budon tiri lau baleu bwe, ma iri taku ala bolo iri kandriyen ndra-in.

“Eme Kindrei suri iy eme loken ta imek ja, ma iy winiyan bamak ma babola ja bwe. Sahou doh handru, eme ma Kindrei tiye i buku doh: ‘Jo kameh edeu ewek taha iri nyosowan turuwen mene jo tandrakan Debit ta aliy. Idoh kameh asahan handru buku jo ndratiye.’
Len doh kameh asahan taha, ma aha kameh atanan ta jo badeh, in hawe tama, aha a-en hawek, ma jo in hawe aha.
Taha tanan lakou dah: Buku taha a-en hamon tiri batanau tan, taha ndrame ndratanan iy ai.
Jo ndratiye taha, ta aha kameh amak ma ndra-in taha. Buku aha batehei budon taha bame tek bwe, buku, ‘Jo iy ndramak nane iy ta udu le buku doh,’ aha kameh amak hawe kandriyen ndra-in taha.”

Iy badih doh mene idi iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, ma iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises, ma iri atiye sahou tan. Ma jo anyolom i badih doh a-un ndraye iri, ma bwidi batun ibo lolo-ou, i buku ari badih iy a-un gwa boto-on solo-an labai, ma bwidi iy ibo lolo-ou. Jo anyolom lakou doh, manik atur, ma jo abudon solo-an labai.
Aha tanan, udu ja iy anya kakohok iri lakou doh kili hamon. Arile taman anya, winiyan bwai. Iso eden san solo-an labai ta akohok nyosowan kili hamon, arile iy ari madasan ja ta amekes ja bwai.
Loboho doh badeh, iri lau solo-an labai. Iri badeh, suburuk i tiri ta Jises. Iri rayah asehek Jises i buku doh, “Iy ndramak ari mwasin.” Iri rayah ja asehek anya, “Iy ta wendreya iri lau.”
Eme boto-on ta Laban badeh, udu la-u oro, eme lau solo-an badeh, atehei budon tiri handru ma tubuni ndrine iri ja i ta Laban.

Kindrei badeh, ndranone aso, eme ma iy sekesek le ta atehei gok eme taso ta atiye sahou mwasin. Eme ma, aso asehek ewek taha. Arile, aso winiyan basehek sahou bala tiri lau ta iri kaso-ok gok taso bwe. Aso atiye sahou kede-eh ta amekes Kindrei kasekesek ta gok taso mwasin, tasah Kindrei le amwenen tanan bolo ndrine aso, iri lau mari bwe.
Arile, taha kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei. Na le boto-on ta tinan tataha Jises Krais, Kindrei amekes taha abadok, ta adi iri kandriyen ndra-in ta imek marakon kano ki-iu.
Are badih nyau ndramak ta atondrok iy bwe badeh, iy katehei budon ma boto-on tan na len mari kili le ta Kindrei ta seben.

Ndra bwena eme asahan nane dah, ado bandremenya tama ta saba lakou ado aso-ok in ta bwele-e nyarak bwe le. Ado kandremenya, idah kameh ado andrei, ma ndrine ado kameh idih labai ta kandriyen ta sekesek udu le buku doh.
Sebwe ou ado ndra buku iri bonyo-ou eme Kindrei andrei ou? Ya ndrinem sandra-i ta aliy. Arile, i buku ari madasan ou ndruni ta ame len ta kandriyen ta bonyo-ou, badeh, ou adek aliy ai.
