Iri lau doh baden adeh, apwai ndrokowa aha ere aliy, iri badeh, an hamon ta budon ma tanan ta le lau badu kon munyak, ya Malawin Mwasin badeh, bado hawe iri bwe.

Aden! Manik badeh, atur labai ta kandriyen aha amekes. Tasah, aha badeh, a-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta Jises nane dah, ma se nawin bwe, aha anya karuwani Kindrei, ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen randrah ja. Ta tikisiy ta Krais le badeh, Kindrei luhi aha ame asahan lau tan. Arile, kandriyen nane aha abudon ta a-en hamon ta aliy badeh, bado se hawe sahou mwasin tan handru bwe.

Aha marakon kanone ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta lau marakon kamanyah kare le se. Ma aha kabadok ta an hamon ta kandriyen mwasin ta are mada Kindrei. Buku aha bamekes bwe eh, aha kameh winiyan banyolom Laban bwe.

Iy eme aloh i toro ja, “Ado kakahei kubwin tado kili bilisiu loboho lim salin ja, idah kameh ado akohok.” Oro ame akahei kubwin toro ili gwa ja, eme ni solo-an labai ihis udu bolo kubwin toro, ma oro winiyan baruwi kubwin hawe ni udu bolon bame loken bwe.
Kandriyen ta asan ma basan ku-i lau mwan bwe, idoh ta laleyah le. Lakou ari le laba tinan badeh: Taha ka-en hamon le ta batanau ta Kindrei le ari.

Ya, i buku none iy tan ta amekes budon tiri lau kabadok badeh, iy kamekes iri kabadok kudu mwasin. Ya, i buku none iy tan ta anyohan iri na lakou badeh, iy kanyohan na ndrinen handru ma solo-an. Ya, i buku none iy tan ta atondrok badeh, iy katondrok kudu mwasin labai. Ya, i buku none ndramas tan ta tikisiy ma aseben iri lau maha-an udu tiri badeh, iy kaseben iri ma sekesek.

ma eme iy ndremenya oro anya, “Na len ado atehei budon handru tado i ta Kindrei, Malawin Ndrabun ewek la-u ado deh bwe?” Eme oro tiye i hamon anya, “Bwe, aso badeh, banuhun se ari lakou i buku Malawin Ndrabun badeh, bwe.”
Buku iri mwan ma badih rayah ba-en hamon tiri sahou, aso torowenei in bolo la-ukei dah bwe, mada aha kaleu kamwenen kudu tiri. Ma aha sadek hawe iri, ma idah kameh bwidi bwili iri mara-ei ama.

Aha nadu tine, jo asehek amwenen ewek taha, ndramak badu munyak dah winiyan bala bolo tondrok ta Kindrei bwe, ma iy winiyan bakohok iri lakou marakon mwasin tan bwe. Ma iri lakou kameh andra-i, iri winiyan bakohok iri lakou ale winiyan bandra-i bwe.

Aha sabo gok ta nyamon ale kameh andra-i, ano abola. Aha kabo gok ta nyamon udu luluwen ma udu mwasin, ma nyamon kameh edeu kohan handru ewek taha ma ta udu le buku doh. Nadu Ndramak Awas kameh edeu naha nyamon doh. Taman Kindrei suni nadun eme, ma iy atehei boto-on i tan ta atondrok iri lakou marakon.”

Buku aha asolom i ta Kindrei ta lakou aha aso-ok, ya aha bakuhiy bwe, tasah budon taha bamwenen bwe. Ya, aha asolom laleyah i ta Kindrei ta akohok lakou nane ta aseben ndrine aha, ma ta amekes aha kasekesek.
Na bolo len marakon, aha kadeu wurah kili ta tama taha Kindrei, ta iri lakou marakon, udu bolo nyara Laban tataha Jises Krais.
Aha badeh, kalomondra tekedek ta Abraham se: I buku buk ndrabun ndratiye, “Abraham atehei budon tan handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma Kindrei aloh iy ndramak mwasin mara-ei ta madan.”
Udu bolo kon tinan nane doh, an ma bun badeh, banya bwe, tasah lomada Kindrei le ari anya ili bwele-en. Ya, Nadu Sipsip badeh, anya i nyara sun ta aliy.

Arile, i buku none aha katehei Malawin Ndrabun katondrok aha handru, ya aha karuwani budon ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in lolowa aha; idah kameh, aha a-en hamon ta budon ta Malawin Ndrabun leheya aha. Tasah, are lau bandrei Malawin Ndrabun ta Krais bwe, iy badeh badu hawe Krais bwe.
Ya, i buku none iri Isra-el nane katehei budon tiri handru kihis, iri kameh winiyan alih hamon ja ala bada ndro-o iri. Tasah, Kindrei le kameh winiyan tabadah iri ala hamon ala bada ndro-o iri.
Iri mara-ei badeh, bamekes ari sahou wendreya o ari kandriyen ndra-in ta karei bwe.

Arile, jo anya kasehek lakou ari, iri nane atehei jo i ta mada sahou ta aliy, badeh, kaleu kewek taha: Jo badeh, atudun Kindrei ta tubu ahi ari le, ma jo atehei budon tek mara-ei in hamon ta San ta Jises, iri Juwis kede-eh aloh san randrah ja. Ma jo atehei budon tek mara-ei i tiri lakou ndratorowenei ere bolo kandriyen malen ta Moses, ma ere bolo buk tiri propet.

I buku none aha mene ndrandrei ari lakou ta ari ndramak ta aseben aha, ya aha batehei saluwen bala hamon bwe le, badeh, aha katehei kili hamon. Arile, kandriyen ta aseken ndramak ari ja badeh, aha winiyan babwidiy bano bwe. Tasah, kandriyen ta aseken ndramak ari ja badeh, lakou maha-an labai ta aha winiyan batehei mara-ei bala hamon bwe. Ya, iy are lau aseken ndramak badu heh, badu heh badeh, iy in hamon handru ta batanau malen mari.

Jih ta an nane doh badeh, nyarahan labai ma sulumwi bada iri mara-ei atabuk, eme ma bwidi iri abolosen, ma iri aten nyara Kindrei. Tasah, Kindrei badeh, amekes iri lakou mara-ei nane doh. Eme ma iri bwale iri ta tobolowe ndrine iri, ma ta a-en hamon ta sahou handru, ta atudun nyara Kindrei.

Kon tinan doh badeh, kowah awudiy mara-ei, ma ili loken labai. Ma kou tan ma ronoh la-uh, ya oro angelo ma ronoh la-uh badeh, atondrok oro kou doh. Udu bwele-e oro kou ma ronoh la-uh doh badeh, iri torowenei nyara boho kamen ma ronoh la-uh tiri lau badu Isra-el udu aliy.

Arile, batanau malen le badeh, leheya taha buku taha winiyan ba-en hamon ta lakou mara-ei batanau malen tiye, bwe, ya taha kakohok maha-an ta aliy. Arile, Krais badeh aseben taha, iy ndrakonohei taha mene ado bolo maha-an ta batanau malen ndrame len. Iy le ari badeh, ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe, arile iy akohok kon tataha bwese maha-an tataha; tasah sahou ta Kindrei tiye i buku doh, “I buku, are lau atahi iy sukik udu bada kei ta kandriyen ndra-in tan badeh, iy udu bahandra maha-an ta Kindrei.”

Aha mene ndranuhun ma ndratanan kandriyen ta bolo tekedek tek ma loweu udu bolo iri Juwis. Jo badeh, in hamon ta kandriyen tiri. Jo udu buku doh badeh, ma jo baso-ok iri lau ta Kindrei bwe. Ma jo anya kidi iri lau ta Kindrei kamak kano ka-au.

Iy ili badeh, tawi mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy, mwak doh badeh, ndra bwena labai, iy balik o Satan, iy ta edeu lau solo-an labai ala ta mada sahou. Angelo eme badeh, bawei iy na sen nane maha-an labai udu minen. Sen maha-an labai doh kameh udu gwek winiya le jaha ma rawa (1,000) ano.

Ya ndramak ari nyaran Saimon udu kon tinan doh ale badeh, amekes balahak san solo-an solo-an ndra-au, ya amekes iri lau mari badu loboho Samariya, boho iri asak ta aliy. Iy badeh, atudun iy anya, iy le kabwai.
Eme ya jo anya kales kere bwele-e boto-on ta Krais mene imek, ano iy amak ja. Ma jo anya kabwese maha hawe isi ta nyaran i le buku none iy mene bwese.
Ou badeh, sabotatahan ta adeu boto-on sala la-u are lau anya kateu lahou ta Laban ndri-iy. Ma ou sala bolo iri samekes lomondra ndra-in ma karei iri lau amekes. Ou atondrok ou amwenen.

Eme ou leheya oro badih en ki le buku aliy. Oro badeh, kandriyen toro ki mwasin i buku badih ta Laban. Oro badeh, sasehek lau ma hawe oro sala badih ta a-un gwa boto-on i buku nyamon toro. Oro badeh, ki badih ta leheya lau ta kandriyen mwasin.
Sendrehendreh ta aliy i buku doh: Mwasin buku taha katasou, arile mwasin labai mara-ei ja, buku taha bala tasou bwe.
Jo asehek sahou boto-on ewek taha badeh, i buku doh: Kora-on aha anuhun sahou doh laleyah. Aha badeh, ka-en hamon ta aliy ale. Buku bwe eh, badeh, aha ndrawendreyani aha le ai.
Ano badeh, Jises edek in bolo kon Galili. Iy bwalen edek ili bolo kon Judiya, tasah iri Juwis badeh, atondrok ta adai iy kimek.

Tasah, Kindrei ndratehei aha ndrahis hawe Krais Jises, ma iy atehei Krais asahan kati iri tanan mwasin tataha. Na iy le, taha asahan ndrabun ma lau mwasin labai ta madan. Ma iy ale i nyara san ta Kindrei akohok taha ame hamon ja.
Ano ja iy solowei gwa ili bolo bwisi sabok ma iy sikine kati oro lau tan, ano iy owei kati oro lau tan abosar na kolau nane iy tabuwiy udu ndrukulun.
Bwena mene jo bokoro-ei iri lau a-en hamon ta San ta Jises, andra-i labai. Ma jo anya kidi iri kamak ka-au. Jo badeh, bawei iri mwan ma badih na sen, ano akahei iri ala are bolo asiu lulik.
Eme ta Jises le badeh, bwidi iri lau apou iri.

Aha katondrok iri lau ta Kindrei kamwenen. Iri asahan buku none sipsip ereu mine aha, ma iri an hamon ta sahou taha. Eme ma aha kasekesek ta amekes gok doh buku none le Kindrei aso-ok aha ta amekes. Aha sa-en hamon ta budon ta ndramak ari ja, ya aha sabo gok ta akohok le luk, ndri-iy. Aha katehei budon ta amekes gok ta Kindrei handru.
Nyamu imek ta edeu sisi-in badeh, ta kandriyen ndra-in. Ma boto-on ta kandriyen ndra-in doh, eme ta batanau Kindrei mene atehei ili mine Moses.

Aha kanuhun kamwenen! Iri lau ta asoh nyamon badu bolo bilin taha badeh, aha ndrawendreyani iri, ya aha tawi luk tiri ranah nane ta sihine iri, ya sihine iri ranah nane aha tawiy, badeh, aloh i ta Kindrei ta konohei kandriyen ndra-in taha. Ya ndrelen tiri lau ta gok nane ndrasahan ndranye Laban, iy boto-on labai.

Aha ndrasahan ha-un ja na ndraye Jises Krais, eme ma aha karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in. Aha sawasai, ma aha samekes kandriyen ndra-in sala ta ndramak ari ja. Mada aha salikis lakou ta ndramak ari ja, ma aha sasehek ndramak ari ja. Aha karuwani kandriyen ndra-in mari doh ki-iu.

Iy badih i tasou ili ta ndramak mwan, iy udu bahandran winiya iy ndramak mwan imek. Ano iy badih udu nyau, iy winiya i tasou ja ta are ndramak mwan, amwenen ta budon tan. Arile, iy ki tasou kili ta ndramak, iy atehei iri budon tan marakon handru in ta Laban le ari.

Iri lau buku doh badeh, bado se mirihik bwai, ma iri teleya sahou handru. Iri asehek sahou i buku doh: “Kindrei badeh, ndramete-ei iri lau tan ja, ma taha an hamon kada-ah winiyan bamak bame awas ja bwe.” Eme ma, na sahou le doh, iri ndraruwiy ma ndrabolowani budon tiri mwan ma badih rayah handru.

Ma, Krais badeh, aso-ok taha labai, eme ma taha aso-ok iy ma a-en hamon tan. I buku ari ndramak iy anya kisan ku-in, o bwe, idoh lakou laleyah. Lakou laba tinan badeh, i buku doh: Taha badeh, katehei budon tataha handru ki-in le ta Krais, tasah taha badeh, aso-ok iy tinan labai.
Ma idoh bwidi iy asahan ndramak handru ta in hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei. Eme ma iy asahan kati kandriyen handru ta aseben ma ta akohok are lau iy in hamon ta sahou tan, ta iri kameh are le buku doh.

Na idah jo anya katiye ta luk nane aha anya katukum kili tiri lau mwan ma badih ta Kindrei iri ado Jerusalem. Jo ndraleheyani san ta amekes gok nane doh ndrala tiri lau ta Kindrei badu loboho Galesiya, ma aha ale ka-en hamon le ta kandriyen nane iri amekes.
Aha badih tasou marakon, aha ka-en hamon ta boho iri mwan taha, i buku le aha a-en hamon ta Laban.

Ano Jises asehek sahou ili tiri lau ja. Iy asehek ili tiri i buku doh, “Jo badeh, sun ta kon munyak. Are lau iy in hamon tek, iy winiyan ba-en lulik bwe. Iy kameh akohok tan sun kohan udu aliy, kameh edeu kohan udu le buku doh.”
Arile, ado nadu tine handru, ado kabudon mene iri aposel ta Laban tataha Jises Krais asehek bwena.
Ma iy bandriliu ta se lakou badu mine lau katiye ki tan bwe. Tasah, iy le badeh, iy kati ndramak ta edeu koha taha, ma hawe sasah, sasah ja i ta lau mari.
Buku, taha badeh, atehei budon tataha mara-ei in tiri lau asehek, arile, sehek ta Kindrei ja badeh, udu bwele-en mara-ei, tasah sahou ta Kindrei amwenen, iy asehek ta nyala nadun Jises.
Arile, aha katehei kandriyen ta Laban Jises Krais ki buku none awin taha, ma aha karuwani budon ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in badu bolo oda aha.

Iri Isra-el atehei budon tiri boto-on handru in ta Kindrei, eme iri asar ala ame awudi kowah tinan badu Jeriko, iri amekes na bek. Iri adek ala ame awudi kowah tinan nane doh winiya len ma ndro taloh. Eme ma kowah doh atohou ili andri.
Eme Kindrei leheya kalem randrah labai edek bada Pol.
Jises asehek sahou ili tiri ja, “Handru labai jo tiye taha, buku are lau iy amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iy badeh, ndra bonyo-ou tiri kandriyen ndra-in.
Aha kawas tek ta Kindrei, buku none idoh san Kindrei amekes ta aso-ok taha, taha ale kaso-ok ndramak ari ja.
Ou badeh, ndraleheyani jo ta san mwasin ta akohok kohak handru ta udu le buku doh. Ou kameh ado hawek ma atehei sekesek tinan labai eme tek.’
Ou atehei boto-on tam mari ki ta asehek sahou ta bolo tarou mari ki ndranye lau mari, ma ou leheya ma asehek sahou ta Kindrei, winiya jo le barasahan.
Udu bolo iri kon rakon, rakon maha-an badeh, asahan tahi, arile badi ahi bamak bwe. Lakou solo-an badeh, wahei budon tahi, arile budon tahi bala bwe.
Arile iri rayah badeh, bobose oro anya, “Oro kede-eh, a-un waen solo-an labai.”
Kowah ta kon tinan nane doh, iri amekes na bek jaspa, ya kon tinan mara-ei, iri amekes na bek nyikilikin, lewen mara-ei i buku torowe.

Ma jo anyolom oro angelo ma ndro taloh nane, tawi lakou ndra-in ma ndro taloh udu mine oro ta adeu maha-an ili tiri lau marakon, oro badeh, atah ado bolo asiu ndrabun ta Kindrei ame manan. Oro mara-ei badeh, asini awin moroyan, ma se ndraka-an aliy bwe. Ma oro ale bawei balaban udu batala oro, kone balaban doh badeh i buku bek nyikilikin.
Are lau oro amekes maha-an ma isi i tam badeh, ou asolom ki ta Kindrei kanysowani oro le, ma iy sabokoro-ei oro.
Katin badeh, nyikilikin labai buku bek bras iri asun na jih taladan, ano nyasei i nyimirin mara-ei, ma nyaro bohon i buku nyaro goi laba tinan atohou.

Jo ndrasehek iri kandriyen ma nyaram ndrala toro. Jo kameh asehek ili toro kahis le, winiya le oro andrei kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari ari, i buku ou aso-ok jo tinan labai. Jo aso-ok kandriyen doh kihis kudu ndrine oro. Eme ma jo kameh in hawe oro.” Jises akohok sisi-in ma iy imek, ano iy amak ja (Kalan 18–20)

Kindrei batawi nadun amwenen ba-en gwek bwe, arile iy atehei nadun eme bwese isi ma imek ta akunoh taha mari. Handru, taha ndranyolom iy badeh, ndratehei nadun oh! Ya, idah kameh, aha abudon anya iy winiyan batehei lakou mwasin mari bame tataha bwe? Bwe, idah kameh, iy atehei laleyah i ta nadun ma i tataha ale.
Oro asehek nyala ado i buku doh, “Len hamon eme kameh, iri lau ta bobose kameh asahan, ya iri kameh adeu kona iri i ta Kindrei. Ya iri kameh an hamon ta budon tiri ma so-ok ta bada iri amwenen.”

Eme ya aha andra olip ta bakatabadah, mada aha sandra-i sala toro andra olip udu bilin ibok mene, ndri-iy. Tasah, aha badeh, andran laleyah; aha akohok nyosowan ma boto-on badeh, edek udu ta kandron le. Kandron badeh, balelei aha bwe.
Na len jo asehek “Jo ibolosen ewek taha” jo basehek anya ahi atondrok budon taha bwe. Ahi tanan aha ales boto-on ta budon taha. Ahi abo gok le hawe aha, ta amekes aha kasekesek.
Ndramak ari nyaran Lasarus iy ibo sik in andri. Iy badu Betani, kon ta Mariya uru nadu tinen Mata.
Eme ma, lau banuhun sahou doh bwe, iy batehei konan bala ta ndramak le bwe. Iy atehei konan ili ta Kindrei, ma Kindrei edeu Malawin Ndrabun tan le amwenen ewek taha ta aseben aha.

Aha winiyan atana aha buku none idoh Malawin Ndrabun handru: Buku none iri lau anya, “Jises Krais mene eme kon munyak dah, ma iy asahan awas buku le taha lau dah.” Iri lau doh, Malawin Ndrabun ereu la-u iri, ma iri asehek sahou handru.

Eme ya, iri lau ale anya kabolowa ado, iri an hamon le ta kandriyen nane. Ameh tiri mesekei, ma iri amekes kandriyen ndra-in laleyah ta amekes bada iri amwenen andra-i. Ma iri bwale iri a-en bahandra tondrok ta Kindrei, ma iri asehek sahou ndra-in i bada iri angelo tan ja.
Iy kedeu konan ki ta kandriyen ndra-in, ma iy kere hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, hawe iy kabadok ta amekes manyah tiri lau rayah ja kudu mwasin, ma iy kabadok handru ta amekes kandriyen mwasin le.

Kindrei kameh bwidi lakou doh, buku aha tawi budon taha handru ihis, ma aha ales boto-on handru. Kora-on ari lakou kariu aha, ma aha kamani kandriyen ta budon boto-on ta sahou mwasin dah, aha mene ndranuhun ta Krais ndrandrei aha ndrame hamon ja. Jo Pol, jo ndrasahan ndramak ta atiye sahou mwasin dah, ma ahi atiye ili tiri lau mwan ma badih marakon are bolo kon munyak dah.
Jises asehek sahou ano le badeh, iri lau akohok bek, iri ame anya korou iy. Arile Jises aton udu bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei udu. Ano iy iu ili manan.
Aha kasahan ha-un ja. Kindrei le amwenen amekes kohan ha-un doh, ma asahan buku Kindrei amwenen. Kandriyen ta kohan ha-un doh, ta amekes taha asahan ndrabun ma mwasin labai ta mada Kindrei.
Udu bada len ta lakou nane doh asahan, ya iri lau ta Kindrei nane, a-en hamon ta batanau tan, ma tawi ihis budon tiri in ta Jises, iri badeh, katadau ndruwi iri ta bwese iri maha-an mara-ei doh.
Arile, Kindrei suri iy udu lek amak eme loken ja.
“Jo le badeh, jo ndramak mwasin handru ta atondrok iri sipsip. Iy ndramak mwasin ta atondrok sipsip badeh, iy winiyan banoh ta imek ta iri sipsip tan bwe.
Sebwe, aha ndranuhun buku, Kindrei badeh, tikisi jo, ma atehei jo ta amekes gok dah; iy amekes ta tikisi aha ale.

I buku none are lau leheya tanan randrah labai bamwenen ta leheya handru bwe, ya aliu budon tiri lau iu i len, ou abarah iy kandru-uk ta leheya doh. Ya, i buku none iy amekes le kili badeh, ou abarah iy san rasan ja. Ya, i buku none iy banuhun bwe le, ou teleya iy.
Sahou nane doh eme ma bwidi ndrokowa iri Juwis udu aliy, ma apwai iri a la-uh.
Are lau iy andrei sahou tan, ma iy tawiy ihis udu ndrinen, iy lau le doh badeh, tanan sahou ta Kindrei, handru.

Ya eme ado kawas tek ta budon handru, i buku none ado anyolom bohon ili mwena eh, badeh ado katadau ado kabadok ta asahan mwasin labai handru ta mada lau kasehek ado, ma ado kado le ta bolo manyah mwasin hawe Kindrei.

Na dah, aha nadu tine aso, mwan ma badih, sahou taso ari ja i buku doh: Aha kasolom kili ta Kindrei, iy kaseben aso ta atiye sahou ta Krais, ma sahou ta Laban kameh winiyan sakaliye ili bolo kon mara-ei, iri kandrei, ma katawi kihis kudu budon tiri, i buku le iy mene amekes udu ndrokowa aha, na len aha anuhun, ma atehei budon in ta sahou mwasin doh.
Tasah ahi badeh, ndratanan, Kindrei mene mete-ei Laban Jises imek udu bolo lek eme awas ja. Eme ma, iy kameh mete-ei ahi ale hawe Jises, ma tiyani ahi hawe aha ala kandrah, ma ado hawen.

Buku ari tado ibo sik, mwasin ta iy kaluhi oro lau an bwena ta lau ta Kindrei kame hawen. Ya, ta nyara Laban, oro kasolou ndrelekei ki badan, ma oro kasolom ki ta Kindrei, kamesekei ndramak nane kasahan kamwenen ja.
“Ano jaha ta Moses asahan hanoh (40) badeh, iy ili selesen iri lau tan badu Isra-el.

Jo tiye oro lau tek tiyani iy ndramak dah ewek hawem, tasah iri Juwis are kada-ah mene tawi iy, ma seheyani iy ili eme, mirihik iri kadi iy kimek. Eme ahi anuhun buku nyaran badeh, udu bolo buk tinan tataha badu Rom. Eme, jo ma hawe iri lau tek ta bahun ala andrei iy ere mine iri Juwis eme len.
Eme se nawin bwe, lau mari badu bolo kon tinan mari sarakau. Eme iri tawi uru lau ta Pol ma la-uh. Gayus uru Aristakus, uru badu Masadoniya, ya iri seheyani uru ala lohalak ndrahu tukum ta lau mari.

Aha tubuni kona aha i ta iy ndramak mwasin labai doh, iy bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe. Iy irek na iri kandriyen mwasin le. Aha bwale aha ta Pailat tolowei Jises. Aha tiye Pailat tolowei iy ndramak ta adi ndramak.
Iy badeh, bamesekei iri bala randrah ja tato bwe; iy badeh, sikine ndrine iri amwenen i san ta budon handru tiri le.
Taha marakon kanyolom bolo ndrine taha ari, ari amwenen ma bwena, ano taha baraimon jabi ramen, ma a-un na bwesam ta Laban.

Eme ma, aha nadu tine mwan ma badih i san ta Krais, aha kabadok, ma aha kado le rasi. Tasah aha ndratanan, lahou boto-on aha amekes ta Laban kameh winiya ba-au laleyah bwe. Pol asehek ta nyala iri lakou iy abudon ta amekes (Kalan 16)
Ma, jo aso-ok aha kanyolom kandriyen tek, ma aha ka-en hamon ta aliy.

Kindrei in hamon ta budon tan amwenen, ma ta idoh, iy sani san tiri lau ta tanan, iri anya, iri winiyan atanan iy. Tasah, iri winiyan bala tanan Kindrei ta iri budon solo-an badu munyak ta iri a-en hamon ta aliy, bwe. Kindrei anya kakohok iri mwan ma badih i buku doh: Iri mwan ma badih anuhun sahou mwasin nane ahi aposel atiye, iri lau solo-an badu kon munyak aloh, “sahou moson bwe.” Arile, are lau iri atehei budon tiri ili le ta Krais, Kindrei badeh, sekesek ta akohok iri ame hamon ja.

Buku none le iri lau ta gok nane anuhun sahou tiri lau an bwena tiri, aha badih ndratasou, aha ka-en bahandra udu aha iri, ma aha kanuhun sahou tiri. Tasah, udu aha iri rayah badeh, ba-en hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei bwe. Mwasin, iri baranyolom aha udu iri badeh, bamekes sahou ta aliu budon tiri bwe. Iri anyolom aha amekes kandriyen mwasin le. Idoh kameh mesekei iri atehei budon tiri i ta sahou ta Kindrei, ma bwidi iri tubuni ndrine iri, ma iri ame an hamon ta Krais.

Eme ma, ahi akohok boho Krais ma atiye sahou tan. Idoh, i buku Kindrei le amwenen aloh ili tiri lau na boho ahi. Ahi badeh, asehek sahou ta Krais amwenen ili tiri mwan ma badih, ma tiye tiri i buku doh: “Mwasin ta aha karuwani kandriyen ta bahun ma aha kasahan kawas ta Kindrei.”
Arile, Kindrei mete-ei iy amak eme awas ja ta imek; ma sebenei iy ta sisi-in ta imek. Tasah, imek badeh, winiyan batawi iy bwe.
Ya, Kindrei ale badeh, ndratehei nyara Krais mwasin labai ndra-en la-u aha. Arile, are lau handru bobose nyara Krais? Iri nadu batun, iri ateu luk solo-an udu mine iri.

Ya iy badeh, sasahan lolo-ou ta gwa boto-on, ma iy badeh, sala ndramak ta ndrine reh. Arile, iy badeh, ki ndramak ta udu le, ma iy badeh, ki ndramak ta amekes mondrei; ma iy sala ndramak ta aseken luk labai.

Buku are lau a-un gwa, jo edeu i wa-in, balen kameh winiyan bamar ja bwe. Gwa nane jo edeu i wa-in doh kameh asahan i buku gwa mulin udu bolo odan eme loken ma edeu kohan handru ta winiyan bano bwe, kameh ta udu le buku doh.”
Arile, buku are lau in hamon ta sahou ta Kindrei handru, iy badeh, leheya so-ok ta Kindrei udu bolo kandriyen tan eme lewan. Ta san le doh, taha atanan buku taha a-en hamon ta Kindrei handru.
Ano ja, jo anyolom oro malawin ndra-in ma taloh, kotowa oro i buku basen. Oro ado boho mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy sandroh ame len, ma udu boho nyabwe munyak, ma udu boho propet ta wendreya ale.
Buku aha a-en hamon ta batanau ari le mwasin nane Kindrei atehei eme tataha anya, “Ou aseken iri lau ari ari badu hawem, i le buku ou aso-ok ou le,” idoh mwasin. Jo ari sahou ta aliy bwai.
Ehe, sahou dah handru, tasah ahi badeh, batiye sahou tahi bwe. Ahi atiye sahou i buku doh: Krais Jises, iy badeh, Laban tataha, ma ahi lau ta gok taha, tasah Jises aloh ahi ta amekes iri gok doh.
Aha sanuhun iri lau rayah awek wendreya aha. Aha ndratanan iri sahou dah: “Buku taha ka-en hamon hawe iri lau ndra-in, idah kameh iri adi kandriyen tataha mwasin iu.”

Kindrei mene mete-ei Laban tataha Jises. Eme ma iy asahan ndramak mwasin labai ta atondrok taha mwan ma badih buku sipsip. Tasah, ta ndrayen mene amou, eme iy tutuniy ma bwidi sahou randra le doh abadok ta ere le buku doh. Kindrei badeh, kati manyah mwasin tataha. Eme ma, jo aso-ok iy katehei iri kandriyen mwasin mari doh kewek taha, ta aha ka-en hamon ta tanan tan. Ma jo aso-ok, iy kaleheya kandriyen mari kasahan bolo taha, buku iy amwenen aso-ok. Kandriyen doh asahan ta Jises Krais, iy amwenen aseben taha ta amekes. Taha katudun ma kamasiye nyaran kudu le buku doh. Handru!

Ma laba tinan labai asah i buku doh: Tekedek tado badeh, ki buku tekedek ta Jises, i buku none sahou handru tan asehek. Eme ya, i buku none jo bawek bwe, deh jo anuhun nyala ado le, jo tanan ado badeh, ales boto-on ta budon randra le. Ma ado asahan ndramak ari le, ta budon tado ta aseben iri lau katehei budon handru tiri ki ta sahou handru ta Kindrei.
Na le boto-on ta Kindrei, iy mete-ei Laban udu bolo lek tan eme loken ja. Ma iy kameh mete-ei taha ale.

Budon doh ere tam handru, eme jo anya katadau budon tam kabadok ta ndramas ta Kindrei nane udu hawem badeh. Ou akohok ndramas doh badeh, kabatana jo asolom ou ma edeu minek udu bwele-em. Eme ma jo aso-ok ou amekes ndramas badeh, kamwenen i buku ndramak asumwe jih ma anya i tinan.

Ehe, hamon kameh Kindrei atehei lau mari ala ta mada sahou. Eme ma sahou nyala Kindrei ndrasahan ndranye iri lau ndramak ale. Handru, taha lau mari badu munyak kameh amak, tasah Kindrei mene ndratiye, are lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iy kameh imek. Eme ma oda taha lau mari badu munyak kameh imek. Arile, sahou mwasin ta Krais ndrasahan tiri lau mwan ma badih nane, ta malawi iri kameh udu mwasin ma udu le buku doh, buku Kindrei ale ta udu le buku doh.
Kindrei sihinei aha ame hamon na luk tinan labai, eme iy bwalen aha ala buku bonyo-ou tiri lau rayah ja.
Ma aha sanunu-uh Kindrei, sala buku iri rayah bwena mene amekes, eme ma angelo ta adai lau amak eme idi iri amak.

Ahi aposel badeh, bala buku iri lau solo-an ala rakon, rakon ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei bwe. Iri amekes i buku doh ta ariu luk tiri mwan ma badih rayah, ma iri winiyan ado mwasin. Ahi aposel badeh, bwe. Ahi akohok gok dah badu mine Kindrei amwenen, ma ahi bawendreya laleyah bwe. Ndrine ahi badeh, udu mwasin hawe Krais, ma ta mada Kindrei ahi badeh, atiye amwenen iri sahou tan mene iy edeu eme tahi.
Taha are lau le budon tataha ndrabadok handru, kala kaseben oro are lau babadok bwe le ma kabwese maha-an toro. Ya taha sabudon le taha, ndri-iy.
Ma jo ndratehei budon tek boto-on ndra ta Laban ta nawin bwe kameh iy sebenei jo udu bolo kou, ma jo le amwenen barawek.

Iri lakou marakon doh ano iu, eme badeh, jo anyolom oro angelo ma hahuw ales are kabede kon munyak ma hahuw: Rai, Tolau, Kum, ma Jaha, ma oro tawi siyer ma hahuw udu bwele-e munyak doh ihis mara-ei, ma jor kameh winiyan boloh munyak hawe ndras, o ra-ei kei bwe.

Jaha solo-an labai aha amekes kandriyen buku iri lau badu leheleh amekes: Aha amekes karei, ma a-en hamon ta budon ndra-in taha. Ma aha manyah luluwen lawe-en labai, amekes nyamon tinan, ma aha a-un gwa boto-on ma amekes aha abo lolo-ou. Ma aha amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an labai. Ma aha asolom i tiri lakou laleyah, buku none sukumada kei, ma malawi nyam. Iri lakou doh, aha an hamon ta aliy luluwen lawe-en labai, arile na dah, bwili aha ama handru ta aliy, tasah bwena aha amekes i buku none Kindrei taha handru.

Buku iy are lau anya kanone ta idi uru badeh, jih kameh udu boho uru eme len, ma sulumwi are lau nane anya kamekes bahun kili turu. Ya, idoh handru, buku are lau anya kamekes ndra-in kili turu badeh, ta kandriyen doh le kameh iri amak le kabwe.

Eme ma Pol anya, “Ado nadu tine, jo bala tanan buku iy ndramak kodo-oh tinan tiri pris badu Juwis bwe. Buku jo ki tanan badeh, jo winiyan basehek sahou doh bala tan bwe, tasah sahou randra udu bolo buk ndrabun, asehek i buku doh, ‘Aha sasondrokonya iri lau nane atondrok aha.’ ”

Arile, iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in labai i buku iri mwi amekes, iri ta amekes balahak, iri ta amekes karei, iri ta adai lau amak, iri ta atehei bwili ndru-u iri i andri ili ta kindrei ta wendreya, ma iri mwan ma badih ale aso-ok kandriyen ta wasai, ma a-en hamon ta aliy; iri lau marakon doh kameh are ndra manan ta kon tinan nane, iri winiyan bala bolo kon tinan ta Kindrei doh bwe.

‘Ya, aha mwasin handru, arile jo tek sahou rayah udu taha: Iri lau rayah are bolo aha kede-eh badeh, a-en hamon ta leheya ta Balam, iy mene leheya Balak, san ta ariu iri lau badu Isra-el ta taku ala bolo kandriyen ndra-in. Eme ma, Balak andrekei iri mwan ma badih rayah badu Isra-el ta aimon nyamon nane iri asalom ili ta nyara kindrei ta wasai, iri amekes na sukumada kei, ma iri amekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei.

Aha nadu tine, len marakon badeh, aso adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta aha. Handru, kandriyen ta tiye wurah i ta Kindrei doh amwenen. Tasah, budon taha badeh, asahan boto-on labai. Ma ale, aha marakon badeh, aso-ok nadu tine aha mwan ma badih rayah labai ja. Ma kandriyen mwasin asahan a sola le ai, ere ndrokowa aha.
Aha kabudon, manyah taha bwena mene are ndra bolo lulik, ano aha ame lewan. Aha mene atehei aha ala bolo iri san ndra-in ta kindrei ta wendreya, ari koha iri bwe, iri lau amekes na sukumada kei.
Aha lau mwan, aha kaso-ok udu aha iri, i buku le Krais aso-ok iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei, ma iy atehei kohan amwenen ta aseben iri.
I buku none ari ndramak kamekes ndra-in kewek tam, ou satehei ndra-in sala bada ndra-in, ndri-iy. Ma ou badeh, madam kaleu ki doh, ki doh, ma ou amekes lahou badeh, kamekes ndrine lau mari kasekesek.

Eme ma, aha samekes bar ndra-in sala ta Kindrei, ndri-iy labai. Aha katehei ndrine aha ma so-ok taha mari ki andri ki bahandra Kindrei. Tasah, iy badeh, boto-on labai, ma iy winiyan tondrokei aha. Eme ma, na len tan le ereu budon tan, iy barabwese-ei aha barame loken.

Arile, iy badeh, leheya mwasin tan eme lewan ta sasah iy amekes: Iy badeh leheya laban tan i san ta iy edeu ur undruk udu kandrah eme andri ma iy badeh, isan len ta nyamon uni ma akohok; ma iy edeu nado nyamon solo-an solo-an ma iy mesekei ndrine ado idih na sekesek.”

Ma udu oro badeh, kandriyen toro ki mwasin, ma oro sasehek sahou ndra-in sala bada ndramak ari ari. Oro badeh, sala badih ta a-un gwa boto-on, ma oro badeh, kasehek sahou handru le ta bolo lahou mari.
Jo ndratehei len ndrala tan, tasah jo aso-ok iy katubuni ndrinen ta iri kandriyen ta karei iy amekes. Arile, iy baso-ok bwe.

Herot badeh, mene andra-i hawe iri lau badu kon Tair hawe Saidon; eme uru atukum ase asahan solo-an badeh, ta ala atou iy. Arile, ma mwena badeh, iri ala anyolom kawas tiri ari op, iy doh badeh, ndramak tinan ari ta asiu ta kabin, nyaran Blastus. Iri badeh, atamar iy, ta iy kati-i losen ta kabin Herot kimek ki-iu laleyah, tasah iri amwenen asih niri nyamon badeh, badu kon ta kabin Herot.
Jises asehek i tiri, “Ari malawin ndra-in bado bwele-ek kada-ah bo-oh. Jo masiye tama, arile aha ja bamasiye jo bwe.
Jor atohou boto-on eme bwidi bayau a tinan.
Balek lomondra ta maha-an hawe sisi-in taha bwese na len dah badeh; lakou nadu bwisik labai ta manyah mwasin ma lomadan kameh eme, iy leheya eme tataha.
Ado naduk, jo atorou la-ukei dah ewek tado, tasah Kindrei badeh ndramani kandriyen ndra-in taha ndra-au na gok ta Krais mene ndramesekei.

Kindrei luhi taha, ma iy andrei taha ndrame hamon, ma tondrohon taha asahan lau tan amwenen. Iy babudon ta kandriyen mwasin taha amekes, ma iy akohok taha ame hamon ma tondrohon taha asahan lau tan, bwe. Iy le amwenen abudon ta amekes lakou doh. Ndra bwena handru Kindrei babwidi munyak bwe le, iy abudon ta gok Jises anya kamekes, ma ta doh le iy badeh, tikisi taha, ma iy tondrohon taha ta asahan lau tan.

Iri tinan tiri pris hawe iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei anyolom iy le badeh, iri arah, ma iri asehek sahou boto-on i buku doh, “Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh! Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!” Pailat eme asehek sahou ili tiri ja, “Aha kandrei iy kewek hawe aha, ano aha baratatahi iy barala ta kei tondreh. Jo winiyan basilahei ari ndra-in tan bwai.”
Iri propet mene ndrasehek nyala iri kandriyen ta tikisiy nane ndrasahan taha. Iri badeh, takaleh ta atanan kati sahou ta Kindrei i buku doh: Tasah, iy anya kakohok taha kame hamon ja.

Aha kanuhun, iri lau ta wasai solo-an labai ndradek ndrame bolo kon munyak. Iri lau ta wasai doh anya, Jises Krais badeh, basahan bala buku bada ndramak awas bwe. Arile, iri badeh, ta wasai ma ta ariu kaliu hawe Krais.

“Ya, iy Pol badeh, iy ndramak ari ndra-in labai, ta amekes ramwes solo-an. Ahi tanan, buku iy ta amekes losen ere bolo iri Juwis ere bolo kon mara-ei, ma iy ndramak tinan ari ale, tiri lau nane a-en hamon ta Jises badu kon tinan Nasaret.

Lakou laba tinan ta Kindrei aton mene ndrasahan ndrame lewen asah idoh: Jises Krais badeh, asahan ndrame awas, Ma Malawin Ndrabun leheyani iy doh badeh, amwenen handru, Ya eme iri angelo anyolom iy, Ma iri lau tan atiye sahou ta nyalan i tiri lau badu kon munyak mari, Ya iri lau badu kon munyak atehei budon tiri handru i tan. Ano iy iu ili loken i kandrah, ma atondrok lakou mari hawe taman.

Ma ur laba tinan undruk eme andri i buku bek. Maha-an ta mada ur ari ari doh badeh, i buku kilo ma lomonoh (50). Ur doh badeh, i buku bek, undruk udu bolo kandrah eme andri ili bwele-e iri mwan ma badih badu loboho kon munyak mara-ei, ma bokoro-ei iri andra-i labai. Eme ma, iri aten nyara Kindrei ta ur i buku bek nane bokoro-ei iri.
Arile, iy bamani tandrakan tan bwe, ta taha badeh, anyolom bohon ili mwena ta kandrah ha-un hawe munyak ha-un kameh asahan. Idoh badeh, kon ta lau le amekes kandriyen mwasin ta mada Kindrei.
Kandrah ale badeh, amai laleyah, i buku ndrou boholahak iri lukumwiy. Ndroi asahan laba tinan, ma iri mandrei hawe busu mara-ei sosokok au ala rasi ja.
Taha ndrasahan ndra buku iri lau ndrabun, tasah Krais anuhun Kindrei, ma iy atehei badan amwenen i nyara salom san rasan le ma kabwe.
Len mari aso ma taloh adeu wurah i ta Kindrei ta aha, ma aso asolom ili ta tama taha Kindrei, badeh aso aloh nyara aha len marakon udu bolo salom taso.

Ma jo anyolom hos ari ja, badan saraman asahan! Iri atehei boto-on i ta ndramak manyah udu bwele-en. Iy winiyan tolowei manyah mwasin tiri mwan ma badih badu kon munyak. Ma iy ale winiyan amekes bahun laba tinan asahan. Ma iy winiyan idi iri mwan ma badih amak ano au. Eme ma iri atehei laba samen gwak ari iri aloh bainat, i tan ta amekes gok doh.

Budon tiri lohowan mari badeh, iri kamekes ki ta lau ta atondrok iri badeh, ki buku doh: Saba lahou ndramak ta atondrok iri katiye iri kamekes badeh, ndra iri kamekes le, tasah kandriyen doh badeh, mwasin. Ya, ki buku none iri katebelese, badeh kameh, iri lau kameh bobose nyara Kindrei, ma hawe leheya ta to ale.
Aha badeh, sawendreya iri mwan ma badih ta Kindrei. Tasah, ta koha aha, aha ndraruwani iri kandriyen marakon ta ndrine aha malen ndra-au.

‘Ya, lakou mara-ei aha amekes badeh, mwasin. Arile, jo basekesek ta lakou ari aha amekes bwe. Aha badeh, andrei Jesebel ewek udu hawe aha, iy badih doh, leheya kandriyen rayah ndra-in i taha mwan ma badih ta amekes gok tek. Ya, iy badeh, ndrawendreyani iri, ma iy anya iy le badeh, propet. Arile, iy ibo gok ta leheya iri mwan ma badih tek ta a-en hamon ta kandriyen ta karei ma aimon nyamon nane iri adeu i ta salom ta kindrei ta wasai iri amekes na sukumada kei.

Sahou ta Kindrei badeh, ndrasehek ndra bwena, ta iy kameh aloh iri lau badu leheleh mwasin mara-ei ta madan i san ta budon handru le. Eme ma iy ndrasehek ndra ta Abraham ta sahou mwasin ta Krais i buku doh, “Na lundriyem oro le kameh, jo kameh edeu nyosowan i la-u iri lau mari badu munyak.”

Buku sah? Sebwe aha ndramani sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, Kindrei badeh, aloh taha nadun amwenen: “Naduk, buku Laban amekes ari kandriyen ewek tam ta leheya ou, ou sabudon anya, idoh lakou ndra-in. Buku iy edeu maha-an ewek tam ta amekes ou amwenen, ya ndrinem sandra-i sala ta iri maha-an doh.

Aha kanuhun boho iri lau ta Kindrei nane a-en bwena taha, aha ka-en hamon ta saba lakou iri aso-ok aha kamekes. Tasah, iri atondrok aha, ano iri kameh asehek ili ta Kindrei ta tondrok tiri i buku sah. Eme ma aha kanuhun sahou tiri. Buku aha amekes i buku doh, iri kameh winiyan sekesek ta ateu gok tiri, ma iri winiyan batona maha-an ta aliy bwe. Ya, buku iri basekesek ta atondrok aha bwe, idoh kameh winiyan basebenei aha bamwenen bwe.
Kindrei badeh, tikahei oro kon tinan ma ndro taloh ado munyak Kenan au, ma iy atehei munyak toro i tiri lau tan amwenen.

Eme ya ou badeh, leheya ma tiye sahou dah ta aliu oro: I buku none oro are lau leheya tanan randra labai; bala buku none sahou handru ta Laban Jises Krais bwe, ma hawe bala buku none sahou handru ta lau ta Kindrei, aso leheya dah bwe; badeh kameh, iy ndra ari ai, arile iy tanan lakou bwe. Ma iy doh badeh, tanan sahou bwe, ma iy ta asoh sahou, ma ta aburoh sahou. Ya idoh kameh tiyani madalakis, losen ta lakou, ma hawe sondrokonya, ma amekes budon laleyah,
Buku ari ndramak eme hawe aha, ya iy basehek sahou mwasin, bala buku Jises asehek bwe, ado badeh, sasumon iy, ma sakohok iy sawek asiu hawe ado.
Krais mene bwese maha-an ma iy akohok sisi-in. Ahi ale bwese maha-an ma akohok sisi-in i buku le iy. Eme ma, ahi ahis hawe Krais ma Kindrei badeh, aseben ahi i buku le iy mene aseben Krais.

Mada iri katou! Tasah, sisi-in tinan labai kameh i bwele-e iri! Iri badeh, a-en hamon le ta kandriyen ta Ken, iri amekes kandriyen i buku le Balam mene amekes ta akohok le luk ta lau, ma aseben iri ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Iri ale, amekes bahun hawe Kindrei i buku le Kora mene amekes. Tasah, ta lakou mari doh kameh, oro mari kameh amak ano au.

Arile, iri lau doh banoh bwe ta asehek sahou ndra-in ta lakou mara-ei nane iri tanan katin bwe, iri badeh, buku none katin haka budon bwe, iri ba-en hamon ta ari budon ta tekedek bwe. Kandriyen tiri doh badeh, amekes ndra-in i tiri le.

Nowa atehei iri budon tan mara-ei ili le ta Kindrei, eme iy i tanan iri saba lakou iy banyolom bwena bwe kameh asahan hamon. Iy anuhun boho Kindrei, iy eme bwidi ndron ra-ei ta aseben iy, udun hawe nadun oro mara-ei ala bolon. Ta budon tan i ta Kindrei le badeh, iy atehei iri lau marakon badu kon munyak ala ta mada sahou, ma Kindrei aloh iy lau mwasin labai ta madan, tasah ta kandriyen tiri budon tan mara-ei ili le Kindrei.
Iri bwidi lakou marakon udu ndrahune iri ano. Len marakon, iri pris ala bolo asiu ranah ili manan, iri aloh kon ndrabun, ta amekes gok ta atudun Kindrei.

“Aha badeh, ta tebelese handru en! Ma ndrine aha badeh, ndradah na kindrei ta wasai i buku iri lau tana iri Kindrei handru bwe, ma ndranye aha ndralun ma aha winiyan banuhun sahou handru ta Kindrei, bwe! Aha badeh, i le buku none tama aha oro mene. Aha banuhun sahou ta Malawin Ndrabun bwe!

Taha tanan ale, kandriyen malen atehei eme badeh, ta leheya iri lau mwasin bwe. Arile, kandriyen malen atehei eme, ta leheya iri lau ta tebelese labai. I buku none iri lau ta banuhun sahou ta Kindrei bwe, ya ta i tiri lau ta amekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in, ya i tiri lau ta a-um tama iri hawe tine iri amak, ma hawe i tiri lau ta adai lau amak.
Udu bolo la-ukei tek ramen mene ndrawek taha, jo tiye ta aha sadek hawe iri lau ta karei.

Jo badeh, in hamon ta kandriyen doh, arile Kindrei baso-ok lakou doh bwe. Arile, jo basahan bwe le, Kindrei badeh, ndratanan jo ai, ma iy ndratehei jo ta amekes lahou tan. Eme ma, na tikisiy tan le badeh, iy atehei jo amekes lahou tan.
Eme ya, jo bala tanan sasah jo amekes bwe. Tasah, kandriyen mwasin ta jo nane kamekes on, jo bamekes bwai. Arile, jo ja aseken kamekes kandriyen ndra-in nane jo samekes on, badeh, jo amekes ai.

Arile, ado badeh, kandriyen ta tikisiy kudu tado badeh, kasahan ki tinan ma hawe kandriyen ta atanan Laban tataha Jises Krais, ndramak ta aseben taha, kudu tado ki tinan ale. Ya eme taha kasore nyaran ma katudun iy na len dah ma hawe na len eme, kudu le buku doh! Handru.

Tasah, ta atudun nyara Krais le ari badeh, ahi asahan i buku iri lau bale iri bwe, arile Krais badeh, ndrabwidi aha asahan iri lau ta tanan labai. Ahi se boto-on ma ahi nyamu ahi bwe, arile aha ndrabadok kabwe. Ahi se nyara ahi bwe, arile nyara aha badeh, ndra tinan labai.

Arile, aha kales boto-on, ma aha katehei budon taha kabadok ki-in ta Kindrei, ya aha sanuhun sahou ta balik, ndri-iy, tasah aha tana aha iri lau ra-on ja ta Kindrei areu kon munyak dah badeh, bwese maha-an, buku none aha ale.

Ya, aha bonyo-ou, aha kanuhun boho ndramak taha ta atondrok aha. Kora-on aha abudon ta andrek iri, ma aha amekes gok mwasin labai na len iri are mirihik anyolom aha le. Aha badeh, katudun nyara Laban, ma na len mari aha kabudon le ta iri san ta amekes gok mwasin.

“Ya, ou ndranyolom kasoh ma ronoh udu batu nyabwe munyak nane ai. Idoh i buku oro kabin ma ronoh. Oro doh badeh, basahan buku kabin bwe le. Arile, oro kameh akohok boto-on ta atondrok kon hawe nyabwe munyak. Ma oro kameh asahan kabin bado sese luluwen bwe, i buku awa ari le.

Taha bakohok malawi munyak dah bwe, arile Kindrei ndratehei ndrame tataha Malawin Ndrabun tan amwenen. Idoh le bwidi taha babudon bala buku le budon ta lau marakon badu kon munyak abudon bwe. Tasah idoh ale bwidi taha winiya seleyani iri nyosowan ale Kindrei ndratehei ndrame tataha.
Ya idah jo anya kasehek taha lau nadu batun. Aha kabudon kamwenen ta iri maha-an laba tinan kameh asahan taha hamon, ya aha kaden ma kanyar aha.

Hamon kameh, aha akohok sisi-in ma bwese maha-an, arile aha sanoh ta aliy. Aha kanuhun! Balik kameh atehei iri mwan ma badih rayah badu bolo aha ala bolo kou, ta none budon taha. Ma aha kameh akohok sisi-in ma bwese maha-an ili winiya le len ma ronoh. Arile, aha saruwani budon taha handru udu tek. Aha katawiy kihis budon taha handru kili, winiya le len iri adai ou amak. Ma idah kameh jo edeu taha kohan handru ta udu le buku doh, i nyara ndramas taha.

Arile, ou ndramak ta Kindrei badeh, teleya lakou doh. Ou badeh, asa-ar ta amekes kandriyen ta ou asahan mwasin ta mada Kindrei. I buku none ou abadok ta kandriyen mwasin ta Kindrei, i buku none kandriyen ta budon handru le, ya, i buku none kandriyen ta ou ales boto-on, ya kandriyen ta tikisiy ma hawe kandriyen ta ou bato-ou ta losen suwi bwe,

Len mari aha areu kon munyak, aha akohok iri lakou solo-an mwasin mwasin labai ma aha sekesek ta aliy. Ya aha aimon nyamon tinan, ma bwidi aha apar. Idoh, buku none lau ale anyohan bou apar, ano kameh iri adai iy ta aimon. Idoh i buku le len ta Kindrei ndrame mirihik ta anuhun sahou. Kora-on iy kidi aha ale.

Ma jo ale anyolom koyeu ma lunoh hahuw (24) awudi koyeu ta kabin nane doh, ma oro batun ma lunoh hahuw (24) badeh, manyah ado bada koyeu doh. Iri asini awin lawe-en belen mara-ei, ma barak tiri badeh, bek nyikilikin i buku barak tiri kabin adeu udu batu iri.

Iy ale badeh, atudun nyaran amwenen, ma amekes kandriyen solo-an ndra-in ta karei, ma hawe iri kandriyen ndra-in rayah ja. Eme ma aha kadeu sisi-in ma solo-an kili badan, kili, kili winiya le iri kandriyen ndra-in iy nane amekes. Iy badeh, asehek iy i buku doh, ‘Jo badeh, ere mwilis, jo manyah udu bada koyeu ta mwilis. Jo bala buku badih udun imek ma iy ere laleyah bwe. Iri maha-an kameh winiyan basahan tek bwe, ma jo kameh winiyan baden ja bwai.’

Buku none aha lau tasou ale, aha kakohok budon mwasin, ya aha kamanyah kamwenen hawe udu aha iri. Aha kalelek iri badih ale, tasah bada iri badih badeh, boto-on handru bwe. Idoh le aha kamekes kandriyen mwasin ki tiri. Iri badih ale kameh akohok koha iri ma nyosowa Kindrei mwasin hamon hawe aha mwan. Eme ma, buku none aha an hamon ta sahou dah, ari lakou winiyan basokei salom taha bwe, buku none aha asolom i ta Kindrei.
Jo baseken aha ales ta leheya lakou ma hawe katondrok iri mwan bwe; aha badeh, kado le.

Kindrei le amwenen mene atehei aha, ta ndrine aha kudu mwasin hawe nadun Jises Krais. Kindrei, iy mwasin labai, ma ta wendreya bwe. Iy badeh, in hamon tiri sahou tan, ma taha winiyan atehei budon tataha marakon in tan.

Ya, aha nadu tine, aha ndrasahan mwasin, tasah Kindrei ndraluhi aha ndrame len ta batanau malen tiri Juwis. Arile, aha salelei kandriyen mwasin doh samesekei aha sa-en hamon ta budon ta bada aha badu munyak. Arile, kandriyen ta tikisiy badeh, kamesekei aha kaseben aha ari, ari.

Ya, aha kasehek sahou mwasin, ma ka-en hamon ta kandriyen mwasin, tasah Kindrei kameh edeu lau mari ala ta mada sahou, buku le iy mene ndrabatanau taha bwena i buku doh, “Aha badeh, kaso-ok iri mwan ma badih rayah ja, i buku ou aso-ok ou le amwenen.”
Taha winiyan amekes iri gok solo-an ta Laban. Arile, Laban badeh, ari le.
Udu ndra bada tubu iri, sare iri edek eme eme taku bada Krais asahan awas. Iy badeh, Kindrei ma iy udu bwele-e lakou mari. Masiye ma tudun ki tan kudu le buku doh. Handru.

Na len ahi bwese maha-an, idoh aseben aha ma Kindrei winiyan andrei aha ame hamon. Na len Kindrei aseben ahi ma ndrine ahi amunum udu le udu, idoh badeh, aseben ndrine aha winiyan udu mwasin ale. Ya, len aha ales boto-on, ma bwese iri maha-an i buku ahi ale bwese, Kindrei badeh, amekes ndrine aha amunum.
Kindrei leheya ahi i buku doh: Ahi hawe aha Korin, taha marakon badeh, Kindrei bwidi taha winiyan ales boto-on hawe Krais. Ma ale, Kindrei mene atehei ahi ta amekes gok aposel dah.
Eme Kindrei aloh san rasan ja anya, “Ou badeh, saloh anya iri lakou, Kindrei sikinei ko-ak ndra-au, ya ou saloh ko-ak udu aliy ja ai, ndri-iy.”

“Iri kabin mara-ei badu kon munyak badeh, mene atudun kindrei ta wasai iri amekes na sukumada kei, ma amekes kandriyen solo-an ndra-in ta karei hawen. Eme ma iri kabin mara-ei doh kameh anyolom kasu-er ta jih nane asun iy, iri kameh alim ade iri, aden, ma tikisiy le ai.
Jises eme tiye i ta Judas, “I buku are lau iy aso-ok jo labai, iy kameh in hamon ta leheya tek. Ma tama kameh aso-ok iy. Eme ma aru ma la-uh kameh ala manyah ado hawen ere le buku doh.
Kati kandriyen ta aso-ok ndramak ari ja i buku doh: Taha baso-ok Kindrei bwena bwe, arile iy aso-ok taha badeh, bwena labai, ma iy atehei nadun eme buku san ta sikine kandriyen ndra-in tataha iu.

Arile, buku taha adek bolo lomada sun, i buku le iy, taha badeh, katukum ma ndrine taha kamwenen ta nadu tine taha iri rayah ja, ma ndraye Nadu Kindrei, Jises Krais kameh sikinei kandriyen ndra-in tataha mara-ei iu.
Eme ma, taha badeh, bado buku nadu Kindrei nyandren, buku bonyo-ou tan ja bwe, tasah taha ndrasahan ndra tinan ndra en, ma Kindrei ndratehei kalem ndrame tataha ta akohok manyah mwasin doh, hamon.
Arile iy asehek ta nadun: “Tondrok tam, O Kindrei, ta udu le buku doh, winiyan bandra-i bwe! Ou tondrokei iri lau tam kado le tiri kandriyen mwasin.
Iri anya, “Ahi winiyan borou ou na bek ta iri lahou tinan rayah ou amekes bwe, arile ou bobose Kindrei, tasah ou ndramak laleyah, ou aloh ou, ma ou amekes ou ja i buku Kindrei.”

Ma kasu-er asahan ta jih nane edeu sisi-in ili tiri, kameh ili loken ta udu le buku don ai. Iri lau mwan ma badih doh nane atehei bwili ndru-u iri ili andri i ta nyabwe munyak hawe malawin, ma akohok kalem ta nyaran, jih kameh edeu sisi-in ili tiri. Ben, len iri winiyan bamunyau bwe, jih doh badeh, winiyan bamak bwe, kameh anya ta udu le buku don ai, ma iri mwan ma badih doh kameh winiyan bado mwasin ja bwai.”
Kindrei mwasin, ma iy tikisi ahi, ma iy mene atehei gok ta atiye sahou mwasin dah eme tahi. Eme ma, ahi bawoyah ta amekes gok dah bwe.

Eme ma, taha winiyan amekes budon tataha abadok, ma amekes i buku le ta sahou udu bolo buk ndrabun asehek, “Laban kede-eh iy aseben jo. Jo winiyan banoh bwe. Iri lau kameh winiyan bamekes kandriyen ndra-in bame tek bwe, ma iri winiyan babwidi jo bamani seben ta Kindrei bwe.”

Ya eme iy ndramak ta kaniya nyamon mari, madan sandra-i sala ta ndramak nane aimon nyamon badu bilin le, ndri-iy; ma iy aimon nyamon badu bilin le ale satiye sahou nyarahan sala ta ndramak ta kaniya nyamon mari, ndri-iy. Tasah, Kindrei badeh, baseken iy ari le bwe, iy aseken uru ma la-uh.
Eme ya, jo aseken Kindrei, ndramak ta edeu boto-on ma ta amekes aha abadok, kaseben ndrine aha kudu mwasin ma kare le se, ta bolo tekedek taha a-en hamon ta Krais Jises,

Len ari buku ari, gok tiri pris rayah ta adi iri lakou buku bulumakau i ta salom. Ma bwena badeh, iri amekes salom ta ruwani kandriyen ndra-in tiri amwenen iu. Ano ja, iri amekes salom ta ruwani kandriyen ndra-in tiri lau mwan ma iri badih marakon. Arile Jises bamekes bala buku iri amekes doh bwe. Iy amekes salom badeh, san rasan le, iy atehei kohan le amwenen ili ta Kindrei.

Arile, buku none are lau tan lakou badu kon munyak solo-an in aliy, ya iy atou nadu tinen ari ja tan lakou bwe, ma manyah tan udu ndra-in, ya iy batehei budon ta aseben nadu tinen ari nane ja bwe, iy sasehek anya, “Jo aso-ok Kindrei handru.” Iy badeh, lau ta wasai handru. Tasah, tikisiy ma so-ok ta Kindrei bareu ndrinen bwe.
Eme ma, taha banoh ta amak bwe. Ta budon tataha, idoh mwasin. Tasah, buku taha amak ma ruwani bada taha doh, taha kameh are hawe Laban ado kati kon handru.

Aha kawas tek, jo asehek sahou dah ewek taha, buku none aha areu kon munyak, kon taha bwe. Aha lau ta teteheh le, eme ma aha satehei kandriyen ta budon ma ndrine aha ndra-in sa-en bwena taha, ndri-iy. Tasah, kandriyen ndra-in ta budon ma ndrine aha badeh, kameh amekes bahun hawe malawi aha mwasin.
Aha kabeleben iri lau mari, ma aha kaso-ok iri lau atehei budon tiri handru in ta Kindrei. Aha kanoh Kindrei, ma kabeleben iri kabin badu kon munyak ale.
Eme Moses lomondra anya kameh, iri lau tan baraseleyani iy, Kindrei suni iy eme ta aseben iri, arile bwe.

Arile, mada ado kaleu toro mwi ndra-in ado badeh. Oro mwi doh, oro ndramak ndra-in ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in. Oro ndramak doh an hamon ta kandriyen malen tiri Juwis ta asan ku-i iri mwan. Eme oro anya, i san doh kameh oro mwasin labai, ma oro anya, Kindrei kameh kasekesek oro.
Oro anya oro tana oro Kindrei, arile kandriyen toro batiye bala buku aliy bwe. Tasah, kandriyen ndra-in toro, Kindrei sumukok, ma oro ta tebelese ma winiyan bamesekei ari kandriyen mwasin ja bwe.
Tasah, jo tanan iri mwasin labai, ma jo winiyan asehek i buku doh: Budon tiri badeh, ta amekes lahou ta Kindrei. Arile, budon tiri doh badeh, bamwenen ta tanan ta Kindrei bwe.

Ya, iy bwidi ndrine ahi amunum, na len iri maha-an ame asahan ma ndruni ahi. Tasah, iy bwidi ahi winiyan ta aseben ndrine iri mwan ma badih rayah ja maha-an solo-an labai udu tiri, ma ndrine iri winiyan amunum i buku ahi.

Ou abo gok boto-on handru ta asahan lohowan mwasin ta mada Kindrei, eme ma iy winiyan aso-ok gok tam. Buku ou asahan lohowan mwasin, bwilin winiyan bama ta gok tan bwe, tasah Kindrei anyolom ou, ma ou atiye sahou tan amwenen handru.

Iy kameh amekes bahun ili tiri budon solo-an ta lau badu kon munyak a-en hamon ta aliy, ma iy aseken iri katudun iy buku Kindrei. Ma iy ale kameh atudun nyaran amwenen, ma tubuloh budon tiri lau rayah. Eme ma, iy kameh ili manyah udu bolo asiu ndrabun ta Kindrei, ma iy kameh asehek sahou i buku doh: “Jo amwenen, jo Kindrei.”
Aha tama ma tine iri nah, aha sabolosen sala ta nadu aha iri, ma amekes ndrine iri ato-ou ta losen ewek taha. Aha katondrok iri kamwenen, ma kaleheya iri ta sahou ta Laban.
Arile bwe, iri maha-an mari doh, winiyan amekes bahun tinan eme bada taha, arile tikisiy tan eme tataha badeh, tinan labai ja, eme ma iri maha-an mari doh winiyan batisi taha bwe!

Aso mari atarah ala bada munyak, ma jo anuhun boho ndramak ari aloh jo i boho iri Hiburu i buku doh, ‘Sol, Sol, tasah handru, ou anya adai jo kimek? Ou badeh, bwese maha-an ma sisi-in ta kandriyen, buku ou le amwenen morohani katim i ta lakou madan labai.’

Jo tanan iri maha-an ma isi badeh, ndrasahan taha, ma jo ndratanan, aha ari lakou bwe, aha badeh, ndra buku iri lau laleyah. Arile, lakou taha mari badeh, solo-an labai udu hawek. Ma jo ale tanan sahou nane iri lau rayah sondrokonya aha badeh, badu boho iri Juwis amwenen. Iri lau nane doh anya, “Ahi badeh, lau ta Kindrei handru, tasah ahi badu Juwis.” Arile bwe, iri badeh, lau ta Satan.
Ta aso-ok ndramak ari, ari, iy winiya basekesek hawe iri kandriyen bamwenen bwe, arile iy badeh, sekesek hawe iri kandriyen mwasin ma handru.

Eme ma, aha badeh, karuwani iri kandriyen ndra-in ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in nadah asahan solo-an labai udu bolo ndrine iri mwan ma badih. Ma aha katehei aha ka-au ka andri mara-ei ta akohok sahou nane Kindrei ndratahiy udu bolo ndrine aha. Sahou le doh badeh, winiyan andrei malawi aha mara-ei eme hamon ja.
Jo mene atiye sahou mwasin ndrawek taha, idoh i buku jo ndratahi buwa kei. Apolos atiye sahou mwasin ale, i buku iy eme asolou gwa ili tiri, arile Kindrei amwenen bwidi sahou doh ato-ou salin.

Ano angelo ari ja in hamon ta iy ma mwena nane eme. Iy angelo nane dah, anya, “Kon tinan Babilon mene tutuni nyaran i loken labai, badeh, ndratohou ndra-au ai! Iri mwan ma badih mara-ei mene ado bolo kon Babilon badeh, iri mene ariu budon tiri mwan ma badih rayah ado bolo kon munyak mara-ei. Eme ma iri atehei bwili ndru-u iri i andri ili ta kindrei ta wendreya tiri amekes na kei, ma adeu kona iri ili ta Kindrei handru. Iri mwan ma badih mara-ei nane are Babilon badeh, i buku badih iy tawi bwesam udu minen irek na waen, ma iy aruwi budon tiri lau mara-ei, eme ma iri anyuwiy, ma iri abo lolo-ou, ma iri amekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei hawen.”
Aha marakon badeh, ndra kawas tek le ai, i buku aha an hamon ta iri sahou mene jo ndrasehek taha.
Aha naduk ta Kindrei, aha katondrok aha kamwenen tiri lakou ta wasai ale anya kasahan kindrei taha.

Tasah, rayah ado ndrokowa iri atamar iri mwasin labai, ma ala bolo asiu tiri lau, ma iri wasai iri badih budon mwasin bwe, ma iri badih kede-eh atehei budon in ta sahou tiri. Iri badih buku doh, kandriyen ndra-in tiri badeh, solo-an labai. Ma ndrine iri maha-an labai ta kandriyen iri a-en hamon ta aliy, ma aruwi iri sandroh ala ame.
Taha kaso-ok iri mwan ma badih, ma kasehek le sahou handru. Buku taha amekes i buku doh, taha kameh asahan boto-on handru, ma ahis handru hawe Krais, iy udu bwele-e taha mwan ma badih.
Malawin Ndrabun aseben taha ado mwasin, ma lakou doh iy amekes, i buku malou tabuwi taha ahis are le se. Eme ma aha kabadok ta ateu lakou doh kihis.
Eme Sol anya, “Laban, ou are lau badeh?” Eme iy anya, “Jo Jises, na len mari, ou ale anya adai le jo kede-en.

Aha kabudon le Krais, ma aha kalelek iy, tasah iy badeh, Laban tataha handru. Ma len mari, aha kalokou aha ta asumon are lau, buku none iy ndremenya, saba kati kandriyen mwasin ereu taha, ma aha atondrok ta aliy. Aha kasumon kamunum, ma aha kalelek iri ale.
“Ano Laban tiye i tan anya, ‘Ou tolowei ku-i katim ki-iu, kon ou ales areu aliy badeh, turuwen.
Aha kanyolom ma kabudon saba lakou mene, aha anuhun udu ndra bada katin, udu ndrine aha kahis deh bwe. Buku udu aliy eh, aha ale badeh, ado hawe Jises Krais uru taman Kindrei.
Jo asehek taha handru. Are lau iy anuhun sahou, ma iy in hamon ta sahou tek, iy kameh winiyan bamak bwe.”
Ano ja, jo anyolom koyeu laba tinan belen ta kabin, ma ndramak ari manyah udu bada koyeu doh. Ma kon munyak hawe kandrah badeh, sakaliye iu ta madan, uru bado ndrahune uru bwena nane ja bwe.

Lau rayah asehek i buku doh, “Nyamon badeh, ta ndrine taha le. Ya ndrine taha badeh, ta akohok nyamon le.” Sahou marakon doh handru, arile Kindrei kameh andrei iri nyamon hawe bada taha iu. Eme ma, aha sakeh bada aha sala ta kandriyen ta karei. Tasah, Laban badeh, atondrok bada taha, ma taha badeh, kalowosa bada taha kamwenen ta amekes gok tan.

Ya eme i le buku aliy, taha ka-en hamon ta kandriyen ta Krais doh. Ya, taha kasehek nyala taha le ki buku doh: Taha mene ndramak hawe Krais, ya karei ma lomondra ndra-in winiyan batondrok taha ja bwe. Taha ndrahas hawe Krais, eme ma taha ndrakohok koha Kindrei ta udu le buku doh.

Arile, jo baradeu wurah barala ta Kindrei adeh. Tasah, len marakon iy badeh, atehei ahi ala kon rakon, rakon ta atiye lahou tinan, Krais ndrabwidiy ta akohok ahi ame hamon ma amekes ahi asahan lau tan handru. Ehe, buku manahu buburen asahan, ma jor aluhiy iu ili bolo kon marakon, i buku le tekedek tahi aseben iri mwan ma badih marakon akohok tanan ta Kindrei.
Aso ndranuhun nadu Kindrei Jises Krais asehek sahou dah, ya aso asehek nyala aha i buku doh: Kindrei badeh, iy lomadan labai, lulik winiyan basahan tan o badan bwe.
Iri lau, tama abudon ta edeu iri ame tek, idah kameh iri ame hawek handru. Buku are lau iy anya keme hawek, jo kameh winiyan batikahei iy ba-au bwe.
Taha samani kandriyen ta aso-ok nadu tine taha iri rayah ja i san ta nyara Jises.

Eme ma, are lau iri ndrala mirihik ta Kindrei badeh, an le bwele-e boto-on ta nyara Jises, iy winiyan sebenei koha iri ta udu le buku doh. Tasah kohan badeh, ta udu le buku doh, ma bolo len mari iy asolom i ta Kindrei ta aseben iri.

Iri lau ame arah ili bwele-e Pailat, “Kadi iy kimek! Kadi iy kimek! Katatahi iy ki bada kei tondreh!” Pailat eme ndremenya iri, “Aha aso-ok jo katatahi kabin taha kede-eh kili ta kei tondreh?” Arile, iri tinan tiri pris anya, “Ahi ari kabin ja bwe. Sisa le ari, kabin tahi.”
Ya eme na len dah i le buku aliy, na tikisiy ta Kindrei le, iy solo-ei oro rayah le tawi oro areu.

Iri kabin badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, amekes kandriyen solo-an ta karei hawe i badih doh. Iri mwan ma badih mara-ei badu kon munyak ale amekes kandriyen doh hawen, ma iri asahan lolo-ou, i buku iri lau a-un gwa boto-on.”
Ou aseken nadu tinem ari ari badu hawem handru. Ou sabudon ou le, arile ou anuhun sahou ta nadu tinem ari ari.
Tasah, are lau oro alelei budon ta Malawin Ndrabun atondrok oro, oro baden eh, nadu Kindrei.

Ano badeh, jo anyolom kalem ari ja asahan bolo kandrah ale. Lakou doh, i buku mwak laba tinan banin ere aliy. Badan saraman mara-ei, ma batun ma ndro taloh, ma kasoh ma ronoh udu batun, ma hawe barak ma ndro taloh ta kabin udu batun ari ari.

Ya, i buku none taha ndrasahan nadun, idah kameh, taha akohok nyosowan mwasin tan udu hawe iri lau tan. Ma idah kameh, taha ma hawe Krais kameh atondrok lakou mene Kindrei atehei udu mine Krais, arile taha ma mwena kabwese maha-an ma isi, iri lau kamekes keme tataha op, ano kameh Kindrei edeu manyah mwasin eme tataha i le buku manyah mwasin ta Krais.
Iri lau ta bwena ta lau ta Kindrei amekes lahou mwasin, kameh akohok sihine iri solo-an labai. Arile, i toro ala atiye sahou ma leheya sahou, kameh oro akohok ere bwele-en ja.

Arile, lau marakon bala tanan iri lakou dah bwe. Lau ta Kindrei rayah ndrame ndra tinan nane kada-ah atehei budon anya iri sukumada kei doh koha iri udu aliy. Ya, buku oro aimon oda lakou nane iri atehei i mine kindrei nane iri asehek na sukumada kei, eme ma ndrine oro atona lakou doh bamwenen bwe.
Buku andrak rayah bato-ou sali iri bwe, tama eme atubwa iu. Tama eme apis la-uk rayah ndra-in iu, ta iri kato-ou sali iri kamwenen ma solo-an.

Aha samekes kandriyen buku none aha an bwena tiri bonyo-ou, ma lau ndrahu so-ok, ya aha banuhun sahou tiri lau nane Kindrei ndratehei iri ndrawek bahandra aha ta atondrok bwe. Arile, aha kamekes le iri kandriyen mwasin, ma aha kasahan buku none iri lau an bwena ta leheya san mwasin ili tiri lau.

Aha nadu tine aso, aso aso-ok aha katanan ta saba lakou kameh asahan tiri lau ta Kindrei, iri mene ndramak bwena. Kora-on ndrine aha keden tiri lau mene ndramak, buku iri lau rayah, iri batehei budon tiri handru ba-en ta Kindrei bwe, iri aden ma iri batondrok len ta ndramak mene imek, ano iy amak eme awas ja, bwe.

Budon tiri Isra-el handru in ta Kindrei, eme ma bwidi iri adek are gwa ndras aloh Retsi are bilisiu ala bilisiu i buku iri adek are kon soboren. Arile iri lau badu Ijip an hamon tiri Isra-el ame anya kamekes bahun kili tiri, arile iri marakon atuh ma iri amak.
“Na len doh badeh, tine Moses atehei iy eme len. Iy badeh, konen mwasin labai ma Kindrei aseken iy handru. Udu bolo bun ma taloh badeh, atondrok iy udu le asiu ta taman.
Iy tanan, iy nyamun bwe, ma iy winiyan bamekes iri lakou solo-an bwe. Eme ma iy amekes amunum le ili tiri lau tana iri lakou bwe, ma ta iri lau ndramani san mwasin ta Kindrei.
Mirihik kon kaleu ai, ma len kataku ai. Ya eme taha karuwaniy ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in badu lulik, ya taha kasini awin ta bahun ma len.

Aha lau tinan tiri lau bonyo-ou, aha ale kamekes kandriyen mwasin i buku doh kili tiri. Aha karuwani kandriyen ta sahou ndra-in, ma nohowa iri bonyo-ou mwan o badih. Tasah, aha ale tanan, Laban badeh, udu kandrah, ma iy Laban taha, ma tiri lau bonyo-ou ale, ma iy badeh, aleben kandriyen tiri mwan ma badih marakon ta kandriyen randra le.
Are lau oro sekesek badeh, ou ala hawe oro, ado mari kasekesek; ya are lau oro taya ma tikisiy badeh, ou ala hawe oro taya ma tikisiy hawe oro.

Arile, ou badeh, batum boto-on labai, ma ou batubuni ndrinem bwe. Ou atukum losen ta Kindrei ewek tam i tinan le gwek abe-en len ta losen ta Kindrei kameh asahan eme lewan. Na len doh iy kameh anuhun taha lau mari, ma mada sahou tan badeh, amwenen labai.
Ano iri Juwis rayah badu Antiyok, ma badu Ikoniyum ame andresei iri anuhun boho oro. Eme iri orowei Pol na bek, ma anya deh, iy ndramak, ma aluwi iy eme manan ta kon tinan.

Sahou tan ano le bohon badeh, ndrinen eden ta tikisiy. Iy eme asehek sahou amwenen ili toro lau tan i buku doh, “Jo asehek sahou handru ewek tado, iy ari ereu bolo ado kede-eh kameh atehei jo ili mine iri lau ndra-in.”

Arile bwai! Sahou ta Kindrei ndratiye anya lau mwan ma badih badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, ado bolo kowah ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in. Kindrei le alelei lakou doh asahan tasah, iy anya katehei nyosowan mwasin tan mene iy tandrakan badeh, ki tiri lau heh atehei budon tiri handru in ta Jises Krais.

Buku uru bwidi gok ta atiye sahou ta Kindrei mara-ei ano badeh, nyabwe lakou ari kameh udu mada munu lek nane lawe-en labai, ari katin bwe, badeh kameh ruwani lek doh edek eme len. Buku iy eme len badeh, iy kameh amekes bahun hawe uru lau nane, ma iy kameh idi uru ma la-uh amak.

Ma bwena mene to atehei budon tato in ta Krais. Eme na dah, to katehei iri budon tato mari kihis handru kudu winiya le to baramak. Buku to amekes ili buku doh, idah kameh to akohok lomada Krais, ma to asahan kawas tan handru.

Karei ma lomondra ndra-in taha bwidi bolo oda aha, ma aha amak. Arile, i buku none aha kandrei Krais kamanyah kudu bolo aha, Malawin Ndrabun kameh manyah mwasin udu ndrine aha, tasah Kindrei le winiyan aloh aha mwasin mara-ei ta madan.

Are propet asahan bwena mene, ya tama aha oro mene badai iy bwe? Oro mene adai iri propet mene asehek ta nyala ndramak mwasin handru kameh barasahan. Ya eme na dah, iy ndrame, arile aha badeh, atehei sa-oh ma adai iy imek.

Iri kandriyen i buku madalakis ta lakou, ma hawe a-un gwa boto-on ta amekes lau abo lolo-ou, ma ta amekes lakou laleyah. Jo tiye sahou batanau i taha dah, i buku bwena jo ndrasehek taha: Oro are lau amekes kandriyen doh, winiyan bado bahandra tondrok ta Kindrei bwe.

Aha katehei budon taha marakon kili le ta lomada sun, buku iy udu ndra hawe aha, ma aha kameh asahan nadu lomada sun.” Jises asehek iri sahou doh ano le, iy ruwani iri ado, iy iu aton ta mada iri lau.
Kindrei ndratehei gok doh ndrala tan, ma iy in hamon ta sahou handru ta Kindrei ta iri kandriyen i buku le ta Moses bwena mene amekes udu asiu ta Kindrei.

Eme jo katiye kaleu ki tado ta sahou jo asehek dah: Kindrei badeh, tiye Jises Krais, ndramak ta akohok to ado bolo kandriyen ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in ame hamon, ma suni Malawin Ndrabun eme la-u to. Eme ta katin doh, Kindrei le mesekei Malawin Ndrabun tan amekes lahou boto-on udu bolo to.
Eme Josep badeh, badu boho kamen ta Libai, adeu iy udu Saipres, ya oro aposel badeh, aloh iy Banabas (moson “ndramak ta edeu tanan mwasin.”)

Eme ya, taha sawoyah ta amekes kandriyen mwasin; ya, i buku none taha baruwaniy bwe, badeh kameh, taha akohok ndramas ta aliy na len hamon. Idoh i buku ndramak ta bilin akohok sali nyamon ta lahou boto-on mene iy amekes.

Tasah, jo tanan, i buku none jo anya kudu baha tondrok ta batanau malen le badeh, gok ta batanau malen le ta suni jo i san ta imek, ma jo ki buku iri lau ndramak. Arile, na dah, gok ta batanau malen doh kano ai. Ya jo badeh, ki hamon ja ta kandriyen mwasin ta mada Kindrei.

Udu hamon ta lakou nane doh ano, ndramak ari atehei lakou i buku kandro ari eme tek. Kone kandro doh i buku kei ta tumundroh iri lakou na aliy. Ma iy tiye eme tek i buku doh, “Ou suri ou, ma ou ala tomondrohei lawe-en ta asiu ndrabun ta Kindrei, ma mada koto-ok tan. Ma ou andromwei kane iri lau mwan ma badih, ma iri sabe handru asolom ala aliy.

Sahou sokek ari badeh, asahan i buku doh: Iri badeh, a buku iri lau mwan, iri bamadin sese hawe iri badih, ma bamekes karei hawe iri, bwe. Iri ma buruwen kahis. Ma iri kon mara-ei nane, Nadu Sipsip anya kili aliy, san nane doh le badeh, iri lau a-en hamon tan. Kindrei mene ndrakonohei iri are bolo iri lau mara-ei badu kon munyak, iri ma bwena handru, Kindrei mene konohei iri. Ma iri badeh, asahan lau tan hawe lau ta ndramak ari, konen i buku Nadu Sipsip.
Iri sabaye badeh, kone iri i buku hos, iri lokowani iri ado le ta anya kamekes bahun; udu bwele-e batu iri, iri atehei lakou buku barak bek nyikilikin, ma mada iri badeh, i buku mada iri lau.

Kindrei ndrasihinei aha, ma aha ba-en bahandra ari kandriyen ndra-in badu munyak dah ja bwe. Eme ma aha satehei budon buku none ari ndramak ereu laleyah, ma aha amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ndri-iy. Kindrei konohei aha ndrame hamon, ma aha tan amwenen. Eme ma aha ka-en hamon ta budon tan, ma kamekes gok tan amwenen. Iy baso-ok aha ala hamon ta kandriyen ndra-in ja bwe.
To asa-ar dah badeh, tasah to abudon boto-on in ta Kindrei. Ma iy ale ta aseben lau mari. Arile, ma hutuwen labai ki toro are atehei budon handru in tan. Tasah, iy badeh, ta ano bwe.

Ya, taha winiyan atanan handru, are mwan o badih atehei konan i ta Nadu Kindrei, iy kameh akohok maha-an tinan labai. Tasah, ndraye sahou randra le ta Krais mene bwidi ndramak doh asahan ndrabun. Arile, iy ndramak nane doh ja amekes ndraye sahou randra le i buku ari lakou ndra-in laleyah. Ma iy ale amekes kandriyen ndra-in handru, ili ta Malawin Mwasin ta Kindrei, iy nane tikisi taha.
Jises tiye toro ja, “Mondrei kudu hawe ado. Buku le tama suni jo eme, ma jo suni ado ta ala bolo kon munyak.”

Iri lau doh bolowa sahou ta Kindrei badeh, ma iri lau nane ta nunu-uh ma ta asehek lau laleyah. Iri a-en hamon le ta budon tiri ma so-ok ta bada iri amwenen. Iri badeh, asehek sahou laleyah, ta atudun nyara iri. Iri sosokok iri mwan ma badih ta bolowa lakou tiri buku luk.

Ano ja, jo anyolom iri kabin badu kon munyak mara-ei, hawe iri lau nyara iri tinan, iri kabin ta bwena tiri lau ta bahun, iri nadu batun, iri lau boto-on, iri lau ta amekes gok ta lau rayah buku bonyo-ou, ma iri lau are laleyah. Iri lau mara-ei doh badeh, tone iri ala bolo ndraban, ma mada munu bek udu bolo mandrei.

Arile, iri lau nane anoh, ma atobwak ala hamon, ma iri lau batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe, ma iri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in solo-an labai, ma iri lau adai lau rayah amak, iri lau ta amekes kandriyen ta karei, iri lau balahak udu tiri ta bekebek lau amak, iri lau ta atehei bwili ndruu iri i andri i ta sukumada kei, iri lau ta amekes sahou wendreya, ya kon tiri lau mara-ei doh badeh, bolo lek ta jih nyarahan, anya udu ta bek solpa. Imek ari hamon ja dah badeh, ma kabwai.”
Ma, na idah kameh ou sabe-en ja ai! Ou suri ou are loken, alomwa ou, ma ou aloh nyaran kasikine kandriyen tam ndra-in marakon ki-iu.’
Ma lami batu iri badeh, i buku lami batu iri badih, ma lihi iri badeh, i buku lihi iri layon.

Arile, are lau handru amekes gok ta Laban, iy badeh, sasahan ndramak ta tebelese hawe iri lau rayah ja. Iy badeh, kamekes kandriyen mwasin kili tiri lau. Iy ale kasahan ndramak ta leheya, ma iy samekes bundruwe losen sala tiri lau, ma iy kasahan ndramak ta udu le udu.

Handru, jo bado hawe aha bwe. Arile, ta budon tek mara-ei badeh, i buku jo udu hawe aha, ma jo tikisi aha tinan labai. Arile, jo sekesek ta anuhun aha adek a se ma abo gok mwasin, ma aha atehei budon taha handru in ta Krais.
Tasah, Laban anyolom ma atondrok iri lau kandriyen tiri mwasin, ma iy anuhun salom tiri. Arile, Laban bwalen ma iy ibolosen i tiri lau amekes kandriyen ndra-in, ma iy winiyan baseben iri bwe.”

Arile, aha nadu tine aso mwan ma badih, Laban aso-ok aha labai, ma na len marakon, aso badeh, adeu wurah ili ta Kindrei ta aha. Tasah, ma bwena handru, Kindrei ndratanan aha kameh ta ame hamon. Malawin Ndrabun badeh, ndraleheyani aha ndrala ta Kindrei, ma aha atehei budon taha in ta sahou handru. Ma ta kandriyen doh le, Kindrei andrei aha ame hamon.

Eme ma, buku are mwan o badih ale ta amekes kandriyen ndra-in, iri badeh, kamekes kili le ai, ma buku are ale ta amekes kandriyen abola labai, mwasin ta iy saruwaniy, iy kamekes kili le. Ya, buku iri mwan ma badih ta amekes kandriyen mwasin labai, iri kamekes kili le ai. Ya, iri mwan ma badih, Kindrei ndratehei kalem ndrala tiri ta ado ndrabun, iri badeh, saruwaniy, iri kabadok.”

Eme Pita asumon boho oro i buku doh, “Ado mari badeh, katubuni ndrine ado ma kanyu na nyara Jises Krais, ya idah karei ma lomondra ndra-in tado kameh sikine iu. Ma idah kameh, ado akohok Malawin Ndrabun i nyara ndramas ewek tado.

Handru, kora-on aha kadeu saluwe kandriyen ndra-in kili tiri lau mene amekes kandriyen ndra-in ewek taha bwena. Bwe! Arile, len marakon badeh, aha kabadok ta amekes kandriyen mwasin kili ta nadu tine taha iri, ma hawe iri lau marakon.

Ya eme i le buku aliy, iri lau mwan ruwani ta akohok udu iri, ya eme iri mwan amekes kandriyen ndra-in ta karei. Iri lau mwan badeh, amekes karei hawe iri ari ari amwenen. Eme Kindrei edeu maha-an i ta budon ma bolo oda iri, tasah iri amekes karei ndra-in labai i buku doh.
Eme ya ado kasekesek hawek ta aliy.
Ya eme aha badeh, katubuni ndrine aha ma aha ka-en hamon ta Kindrei. Ma idah kameh, lomondra ndra-in taha kameh Kindrei sikine iu. Ya len ta akohok manyah mwasin ta Laban kameh eme.
Kou mari ta kon tinan doh kameh asak ta udu le buku doh, winiyan bahis bwe, tasah ben kameh winiyan basahan ja bwe.
Are lau iy aimon odak, ma iy a-un ndrayek, idah kameh kohan handru udu tan udu le buku doh, ma jo kameh mete-ei iy amak ja na len hamon.

Jises eme tiye i tan ja, “Ou winiya batondrok jo bwe, i buku Kindrei batehei boto-on ta atondrok jo bawek tam bwe. Ta idoh le kameh, are lau iy atehei jo eme minem dah, iri kandriyen tan marakon kameh udu bwele-en labai ja ta iri kandriyen ndra-in tam.”

Kandriyen ta budon handru tataha badeh, buku le aliy ale. Buku budon taha handru baluwi budon taha ta amekes kandriyen mwasin ma aseben iri mwan ma badih rayah ja bwe, ya budon taha handru badeh, kameh ari moson bwe, i lakou laleyah. Ya, buku taha bamekes gok mwasin ta aseben ndramak ari ja bwe, budon tataha badeh, ari katin bwe.

Tasah, batanau malen badeh, boto-on tan winiyan basakalawi boto-on ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in bwe. Iy badeh, nyowonya le karei ma lomondra ndra-in udu bolo oda taha, ma iy winiyan basikine ba-au bwe. Arile, Kindrei le suni nadun amwenen asahan awas i buku taha ndramak ta karei ma lomondra ndra-in, i nyara salom, ma iy imek ta aseben taha mari. Handru, Kindrei le badeh, atehei Krais i buku none ndramak ta amekes karei ma lomondra ndra-in i saluwe taha.
Arile, buku none aha akohok maha-an ma sisi-in ta kandriyen mwasin aha amekes, mwasin, aha kasekesek le kado. “Aha sanoh ta ari ndramak, ma aha sabudon sandra-i ndri-iy labai.”
Ya, aha tama iri nah, aha sasehek sahou boto-on ma ndra-in sala ta nadu aha iri, ta amekes ndrine iri kandra-i kewek taha. Bwe kameh iri atona buku, iri winiyan bamekes ari gok mwasin bwe.

Ma iy asehek sahou boto-on labai i buku doh, “Kon tinan Babilon mene udu bwele-en labai, arile nadah iy ndratohou ndra andri mara-ei! Nadah badeh, iy ndrala ndrahune iri malawin ndra-in ta balik are aliy. Iri malawin ndra-in ma hawe iri sirih ta aimon lakou bolo-an, ma hawe iri sirih ndra-in mara-ei, are loboho doh ale.

Are lau iri ta wasai? Iri lau le nane ale bisini anya Jises badeh, Mesaya bwe. Iri lau buku doh badeh, iri ta wasai, iri batehei Kindrei uru nadun Jises Krais badeh, bado ndrine iri bwe. Eme ma iri asahan lau ta kaliu hawe Krais.

Nyamon ta Laban doh, iy lakou ari tinan handru. Arile, i buku ari mwan o badih, iy babudon bamwenen bwena ta iy aimon jabi ramen ta Laban bwe, ma iy a-un waen na bwesam ta Laban laleyah, idoh i buku iy ndrabwidi bada Laban ma ndraye Laban ndrandra-i, ya iy amwenen kameh akohok maha-an ta aliy.

Ou lolo-ou ndramak, buku ou atehei budon tam le in ta Kindrei, ya ou bamekes kandriyen mwasin Kindrei aso-ok ja bwe, budon tam badeh, ari moson bwe. Sebwe ou anya atanam le ta kati sahou dah nadeh? Mwasin ta ou anuhun sahou badu bolo buk ndrabun asehek i buku doh:

Iri tinan tiri pris ma iri Parasi tiye i tiri lau ta bahun badu kon Rom, ma iri lau ta atondrok asiu tinan ta Kindrei ka-en hamon ta Judas. Judas tanan kon doh, eme ma iy in bwena tiri. Iri telemei sun hawe iri lakou ta bahun, iri ala asahan bolo bilin ta Olip nane doh.

Ya, lau rayah ja badeh, batehei budon tiri bala ta Kindrei bwe, arile Laban badeh, ta amekes kandriyen handru na len mari. Eme ma, taha katehei budon tataha handru ki-in tan, ma iy kameh atadau budon tataha, ma atondrok aha, ma balik kameh winiyan baruwi budon taha bwe.
Ano na len iri atehei iy eme manan badeh, nadu Parou badih bwese-ei iy eme loken ma nyowo-ei iy i nadun.

Ano angelo andrei bwekei nane kasu-er ta eh manahu buburen udu aliy, ma iy andrei jih badu mada koto-ok, anyuhi ili bolo bwekei, ano iy akahei ili andri bwele-e kon munyak. Iy akahei ano le badeh, kuruh atohou, ma nyaro boho iri lakou marakon asahan, ma kalik takamek ili eme, ma ndroi asahan kon munyak.

Tasah, lau mwan ma badih badu kon munyak tinan mara-ei mene atudun iri kindrei, iri amekes na sukumada kei badeh, ndramekes kandriyen ta karei solo-an labai hawen. Idoh i buku iri ale badeh, ndranyuwi waen tan boto-on labai ta lolo-ou. Ma iri kabin badu kon munyak mara-ei amekes karei hawen ale. Ma hawe iri lau nadu batun ta amekes ba-en ma ta sisih badu kon munyak mara-ei badeh, akohok luk tinan labai ta iri kandriyen tan solo-an ndra-in, ma bwilin winiyan bama ta aliy bwe.”
Ta idoh le badeh, iri Juwis ame tawi jo udu ndra bolo asiu tinan ta Kindrei, ma anya kadai jo kimek.
Ma, iri kameh adeu kona iri ili ta sahou handru, ma iri adeu ndranye iri ili ta anuhun iri kundruh laleyah.
Arile aha rayah badeh, batehei budon taha bwe.” Jises ndratanan are lau iy batehei budon ba-en tan bwe. Iy i tanan udu ndra bada katin ta are lau handru kameh amekes sa-oh tan.

Jises anya, “Ou anyolom, jo kameh atehei jabi ramen ili bolo suw, ano kameh jo atehei ili nan, badeh, iy le ai.” Iy eme atehei jabi ramen ili bolo suw ano iy atehei ili na Judas Iskariyot nadu Saimon.
Eme ya Timoti, ou tawi lahou udu kanim badeh, kamwenen labai. Ma ou teleya ou, ta tanan ta wasai ala iri aloh anya, “Tanan handru.” Arile bwe. Badeh bamwenen ta sahou ta kindrei bwe, badeh.

Arile, mada iri Juwis alikis, ya eme iri tukumwi iri lau rayah, budon tiri ndra-in udu bolo ba-en tiye iri ta amekes losen udu bolo kon tinan. Eme iri abotatahan ala asiu ta Jesen takaleh Pol uru Sailas anya kateu uru kame mada iri lau mari.

Buku aha atou nadu tine aha ari taku ta kandriyen ndra-in, ya buku aha atou kandriyen ndra-in tan doh winiyan badai iy bamak bwe, mwasin, aha kasolom ki ta Kindrei, iy winiyan atehei kohan mwasin i tan. Sahou doh i la-u iri lau ale kandriyen ndra-in tiri batehei iri bala san ta imek bwe-en. Arile, kandriyen ndra-in ra-on badeh, ales i san ta imek. Ya jo basehek anya, aha kasolom ki ta Kindrei ta nyala aliy, bwe.

Ado kanuhun, jo tiye tado handru, are lau iy akohok ma aseben ndramak nane iy amekes lahou tek, idoh i buku none le iy akohok jo ma aseben jo ale. Ma are lau akohok jo, idoh i buku none le iy akohok Kindrei iy suni jo eme dah.”

Ya, taha kadeu wurah kili ta Kindrei, tasah taha ndrasahan iri lau ta are bahandra tondrok ari, badeh, winiyan bandrokonya ma babwidiy bandra-i bwe. Taha badeh katudun nyaran ki-in hamon ta kandriyen iy amwenen aso-ok; taha kanoh ma kabeleben iy,

Eme iri Juwis rayah adek ala anya katikah iri malawin ndra-in ado la-u iri lau ka-au na boto-on ta nyara Laban Jises. Eme iri badeh, tiye i buku doh, “I san ta nyara Jises i buku none Pol asehek, jo tiye ou ame len.”
Ya Pol kuhi Sailas i hawen ma nadu tine uru i san ta Laban atehei nyosowan i bwele-e uru ma ndremenya Kindrei ta iy katehei tikisiy tan ki bwele-e uru, eme ma uru au.
Ya, mada aha badeh, kaleu ta aha saruwani budon taha ta lakou nane aha awoyah ta aliy. Aha kales boto-on, ma hamon kameh, aha akohok ndramas laba tinan labai ta aliy.

Uru lau ma la-uh nane doh badeh, Kindrei atehei boto-on tan i turu, ta turuki kandrah, ta ur winiyan bandruk na bolo len mara-ei nane, uru atiye sahou ta Kindrei bwe. Kindrei atehei boto-on i turu ale, ta tobolowe gwa asahan ndra, ma bokoro-ei iri lau marakon badu kon munyak ta iri lakou solo-an ndra-in. Len mara-ei, buku uru anya kamekes lakou doh, uru winiyan amekes le ai.
Ou badeh, balem bahas ta lahou dah bwe, tasah ndrinem badeh, bamwenen ta mada Kindrei bwe.
Oro lau tek, oro lau tam; oro tam, oro tek ale. Iri lau atou oro lau tek nane, ma iri anyolom lomadak handru udu toro.
Iri mara-ei ndramani san mwasin, ma iri mara-ei ndrasahan lau ndra-in labai. Ari ndramak bamekes se kandriyen mwasin bwai.”
Ado samekes kandriyen ta ndrakok ta aseben ado le, ma satudun ado ta aliy. Ma hawe ado satudun le anya, ado ndra ari ai. Arile, ado kamasiye iri, ya bale ado kamani ado.

Ma jo atou ndramak ari, ya konen badeh, “I buku le Nadu Ndramak Awas.” Iy ales udu ndrokowa ndru-u sun ma ndro taloh nane doh, ma iy asini awin belen mara-ei ili isos ndra bada katin andri, ma iy bawei balaban ari amekes na bek nyikilikin labai udu batalan.

Ya, iri lakou marakon Kindrei anya kakeh ki-iu, kameh winiyan bado bolo kon tinan doh ja bwai. Kindrei kameh akahei marakon iu. Kindrei hawe Nadu Sipsip tan kameh ado bolo kon tinan doh, ma atondrok iri mwan ma badih nane are aliy. Ma iri lohowan ta Kindrei kameh, amekes lahou tan ma atudun iy are aliy.
Len ta kon munyak ta ano ndrame mirihik labai, eme ma aha kabudon kamwenen, ma mada aha kaleu, ya aha katondrok iri kandriyen taha kamwenen. Idoh kameh aha winiyan asolom amwenen.

Ano udu kon Ataliya badeh, uru alakak ala hamon ala Antiyok. Kon tinan doh mene iri lau ta Kindrei suni uru ala a len, ta amekes lahou mene i kani uru i san ta tikisiy ta Kindrei. Uru ndramesekei lahou turu ndrano, ma uru ame hamon ame Antiyok ja.

Arile, buku ou atasou, ou bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe. Ya, buku ari badih bihin i tasou, idoh iy bamekes ari kandriyen ndra-in bwe le. Arile, jo asehek taha lau anya katasou, len marakon kameh aha bwese iri maha-an ta tasou. Eme ma jo aso-ok aha kabelekei iri maha-an doh.

Tasah? Taha badeh, bamekes bahun hawe iri lau le bwe. Taha badeh, amekes bahun hawe iri malawin ndra-in ere bolo kandrah. Ya, taha amekes bahun hawe iri kabin ma iri lau ta bwena, ma iri malawin ndra-in boto-on en, iri ale atondrok kandriyen ta lulik badu kon munyak dah.

Buku none rayah lau areu rewa ado, aso ta budon mwasin, oro badeh, kasolom ki ta Kindrei, ya Kindrei winiyan sebenei oro. Tasah, Kindrei ale edeu lakou solo-an eme tataha lau, hawe iy winiyan edeu budon mwasin ewek taha, ya iy winiyan babolosen bala tare lau nane ndremenya iy ta budon mwasin bwe.
Aha sasemete-ei jih ta Malawin Ndrabun udu ta koha aha.

Iri tutuni asiu balei i loken, iri apwai bolon ili la-uh na kolau tinan. No-on ranah ili manan doh iri aloh kon ndrabun. Udu bolon badeh, lakou ari ta ndrahune sun ere aliy, ma sau hawe jabi ramen ta adeu salom i ta Kindrei.

Eme ma, jo anya kedeu sahou dah kewek taha. Aha mara-ei badeh, kame le hawek kasih bek nyikilikin tek. Jih badeh, ndrasulumwi lakou marakon udu bwele-en ndra-au, ma bwidiy ndra nyikilikin mara-ei. Ma aha kameh asahan nadu batun. Ya, aha kame kasih taha kolau belen ta tubuloh bada aha, ma iri mwan ma badih winiyan banyolom bada aha ndrakane ja bwe. Ma mwasin ale, ta aha kame hawek kasih rayah ndrelekei tek, ta adeu i mada aha, ta aha kanyolom kon ja. Ma aha winiyan atanan, buku aha badeh, bateu lakou handru ta Kindrei bwe. Ma aha kameh winiyan anyolom aha are buku sah handru.
Jo atorou ewek taha, ta aha katanan, buku aha ndrakohok kohan mwasin winiyan bano bwe. Ou are lau ale atehei budon tam handru in ta Nadu Kindrei en.

Are lau iy asehek sahou na le budon tan amwenen badeh, iy ta atudun le nyaran. Arile, are lau iy anya katudun nyara ndramak nane iy suni iy eme, iy ndramak doh asehek sahou handru. Iy ta wendreya bwe.

Lakou mwasin doh badeh, udu bolo oda ahi mwan ma badih. Ma ahi badeh boto-on bwe, buku kun amekes na ndren. Arile, idoh iy mwasin, tasah iy leheyani iri mwan ma badih, ta boto-on ta sahou mwasin nane ahi atiye, idoh ta Kindrei ma boto-on tan sakalawi boto-on tiri lakou mara-ei ja. Ahi amwenen badeh, bwe.

Aha kawas tek, aha samekes losen sala tiri, ndri-iy, arile aha katehei ki kani Kindrei kamekes, tasah sahou mene ndratorowenei tiye i buku doh: “Jo kameh atehei maha-an ili tiri, ma jo konohei saba kandriyen nane iri amekes.”
Jises eme asehek i toro i buku doh, “Buku jo katudun nyarak amwenen, idah kameh basahan bala mwasin bwe. Iy ndramak nane masiye jo badeh, tama amwenen. Aha nane aloh iy Kindrei taha en?

Aha sasemete-ei lahou ta Kindrei na andres ta nyamon, ndri-iy. Handru, nyamon mari badeh, ndra mwasin le ta aimon. Arile, ndra-in badeh, i buku ou aimon nyamon ari, ma kandriyen tam doh amekes ndramak ari ja ato-ak ma taku.
Uru lau ma la-uh nane dah andrei bada kei eme andri, uru su-iy na iri kari kolau ma hawe adeu iri suluw i badan. Uru asu iy i buku kandriyen le tiri Juwis ta asu lau amak.

Aha amekes mwasin ili tiri lau ado bolo asiu lulik. Ma iri lau rayah akohok lokowa aha laleyah iu, arile aha babolosen ta aliy bwe, aha sekesek.
